la skyabar mthong ba'i shes pa dang/ khams rnams la myur du gag pa'i sbrul lta bur mthong ba'i shes pa dang/ skye mched rnams la grong stong par mthong ba'angeshis pa dang/ bden pa rnams la shin tu
rtogs par mthong ba'i shes pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang/ lta ba thams cad dang bral bar ma thong ba'i shes pa dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rnam
par smin pa la chud mi za bar mthong ba'ashes pa dang/ 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba la rtog par mthong ba'apheshes pa dang/ yang dag pa la 'jug pa ma thong ba'i shes pa ni lhag mthong zhes
bya ste 2 lhag mthong zhes bya pa yang chos rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'o// chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'o// chos rnams la de khon nyid du mthong ba'o// chos rnams la gzhon
ma yin pa nyid du mthong ba'o// chos rnams la stong nyidi dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med par mthong ba'o// chos rnams la mngon par 'du ma byed pa dang/ de bzhin du ma skyes pa/
dang/ ma byung ba dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag pa dang/ dben par ma thong ba'o// chos rnams la g.yo ba med pa dang/ byed pa med pa dang/ bdag po med pa
nga 'dzin pa med pa dang/ dper mad tsang re gcig pa dang/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang/ rang bakhan gyis mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba'o ]lhag mthong zhes bya ba yang yod pa'i rnam
par yang mi mthong/ med pa'i rnam par yang mi mthong/ skye ba dang/ 'jig pa dang/ gnas pa'i rnam par yang ma mthong/ dmigs pa'i mtshan ma'i rnam par ma mthong ste/ de mthong

mod kyi rtsi yang ma mthong ngo// nam mthong ba med pa de na mthong ba ste/ lhag mthong gis kyang mthong ba yang ma yin/ ma mthong ba yang ma yin par mthong ste nam de ltar mthong ba de na yang dag pa nyid
mthong ngo// yang dag pa nyung mthong bas lhag mthong la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong gis de ltar mthong yang mngon par 'du mi byed par yang ma lcang zhing dag
ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa las kyang ma ldang ngo// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong ma zad pa zhes bya'o// de dag ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
kyi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi zad pa'o// gzhan yang btsun pa sha ra ru ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa ma zad pa yin te/ de la gzungs mi
zad gang zhe na/ gzungs zhes bya ba na gang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i dran pas chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'dzin pa dang/ kun 'dzan pa rang/ mi brjed pa dang/
dran pas kun 'dzin pa 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o// gang gzungs zhes bya ba ni gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin pa dang
chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ nyan thos thams cad dang/ rnams can thams cad kyis smras pa 'dzin pa dang/ legs par smras pa thams cad
ma lus par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o// nam yang bskal pa gzhan du 'phos par gyur tam/ tshe gzhan du 'phos par gyur pa den yang byang chub sems dpa' re'i gzungs kyi
dran ra 'a yeshes ma rung bar yang ma 'gyur/ nyams par yang ma 'gyur te/ nam phyi ma'i mtha' bar du chos thams cad 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bru
pa'i 'dug pa bzhin du mthong ste/ 'di ni gzungs mi zad pa zhes bya'o// de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na/ spobs pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'di ma chags pa'i spobs pa dang/ thogs pa med
rgyu pa' spobs pa dang/ ma 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa dang/ ma rmongs pa'i spobs pa dang/ myur ba'i spobs pa dang/ dga' ba'i spobs pa dang/ spobs pa drag po drang/ mi 'gyur
ba'i spobs pa dang/ spobs pa rno ba dang/ spobs pa mgyogs pa ste// de'i spobs pa de ni las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/
lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung la/ khyad par lung bstan pa/ 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa// mya ngan las 'das pa 'a lam du 'gro ba ste/ de de lta bu'i spobs pa rdzo gas pa yin no//
gzugs su snang ba ji snyad par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo dang tshags su bcad pa bstan pa spobs par snang ba yang de snyed de// sgrar grags la ja snyad par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo
dang tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa la spyobs par snang ba yang de snyad re/ 'di bstan to// 'di bshad do zhes dem rtag cing mngon lar 'du byed pa med mod kyi/ 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro
yang rung ste/ gal te rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te bram ze'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te rje'u rigs kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te khyim bdag gi 'khor du 'am/ gal te dge sbyong gi
'khor du 'am/ gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor du 'am/ gal tu mtshe ma'i 'khor du 'am/ gal te dga' ldan gyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te
'phrul dga' 'khor du 'am/ gal te gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te bdud kyi 'khor du 'am/ gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor du yang rung ste/ de dang der do'i lhun gyis grub
pas sems can thams cad kyidad pa dang/ dbang po rnams la chos spobs par 'gyur te/ de 'dod na tshog zhananam/ bskal pa gzhan gyi bar du yang ma lcang zhange thogs pa med par chos ston to
de chos ston pa des kyang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par bya ba'i phyir 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa mi zad pa'o//
de dag yang btsun bar shA ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa mi zad pa'o// gzhan yang btsun papashA ra dwa pa'i du/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi chos kyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa ste/ razhi gang zhe na/ 'dra lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma da ra ra bstan ra shes pa la 'jug pa drang/
'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi zad par bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med ra ra byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi mi zad pa
bstan pashes pa la 'jug pa dang/ zhi ba mya ngan las 'das par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi zad par bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pa ste/ de la mi rtag pa'i don gang zhe na/ med
pa'i don gang/ ma chags pa'i don te/ dngos po rnam par 'gog pa'i don ni ma yin no// mi rtag pa'i don ni chos la bdag med pa ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir de la 'jig ra gang
yang mad de/ 'di na mi rtag pa'i don to// de la sdug bsngal gyi don gang zhe na/ dga' ba med pa'i donan sdug bsngal gyi don to// dga' ba thar pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to// sbyor pa
med pa'i donan sdug bsngal gyi don to// sdug bsngal gyi sgra rab tu bstan pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to// nam mkha' rang tu bzhag pa'i don na sdug bsngal gyi ren te/ 'di na sdug bsngal gyi/
don ces bya'o// de la bdag med pa'i don gang zhen/ bdag ni shin tu bdag med pa ste/ gang bdag med pa'i don de na gsob bo// gsog go/ rag lus pa'o// stong pa'o// stong pa'i/
don na bdag med pa'i don te/ 'di na bdag med pa'i don ces bya'o// de la zhi ba'i don gang zhe na/ zhi ba na zhi bas zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ zhi ba nyid zhi ba'o// ma rigs pa'i ng zhi bas zhi bar mi
'gyur te/ gang zhiba'i don de ni mtshan ma thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste/ 'di ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// zhi ban mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ 'di ni zhi ba'i don ces bya'o// de dag ni btsun pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa'o// gzhan yang btsun pa pahAr du ti'i 'u/ byang chub sems dapa' rnams kyi bgrod pa gcig pa'i
lam mi zad pa yin te/ de la bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gang zhen/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yin te/ bgrod pa gcig
pa'i lam zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing grogs med par bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu go cha gyon te/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang/
a/ @#// mthu dang/ stobs kyis yongs su gzung ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyi go skabs med par bdag nyid byed cing/ bdag gi mthu stobs kyis 'phags te/
[DI]/ des de lta bu go chagrwa ba bgos nas/ gang yang cung zad sems can thams cad kyis thob par bya ba yod pa de dag bdag gis kun red par bya/ gang 'phags pa thams cad dang/ theg pa la
gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang/'a rnams kyis thob par bya ba de dag bdag gis kun thob par bya'o// sbyanepa na bdag gi grogs ma yAn gyi/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i grogs so// tshul
khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang/ shes rapa na bdag gi grogs ma yin gyi/ bdag tshul khrims dang/ brjod pa dang/ brtson 'grus/
dang bsam karten dang/ shes rab kyi grogs so// bdag la na pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rim gror mi bya'i/ bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rim gror bya'o// bdag la ni bsdu
ba'i dngos po rnams kyis rim gror mi bya/ bdag gis ni bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams la ram gror bya'o// bdag la na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ram gror ma bya'i/ bdag gis na deg ba'i
rtsa ba thams cad la rim gror bya'o// gang 'di lta bu'i chos la grogs med par bdag 'ad byed cing gzhan gyi go skabs med par/ bdag gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing/ grogs med par rdo rje
sa'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud stobs dang bcas pa rnams btul la/ sems kyis skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrod pa gcig pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o/
gzhan yang btsun pa shAr dwa ta'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs ma zad pa ste/ de la thabs gang zhe na/ thabs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad rnam par sgrub cing slong ba ste/ thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar gzhog pa'o// thabs nabasam pa nges par rtog pa'o// thabs ni sbyor ba rgyun mi
'chad pa'o// thabs na lhag pa'i bsam pas bye brag tu 'phags pa'i chos 'dod pa'o// thabs ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thabs ni tshul/
khrims kyis skye ba thams cad 'dzin pa'o// thabs n bzod pas byang chub kyi phyir lus dang ngag drang sems kyi rgyanano// thabs ni brtson 'grus kyis 'jug pa dang gnas pa la brtson pa'o//
thabs ni bsam gtan gyis bsam gtan las phyir ldog pa shes pa'o// thabs ni shes rab kyis 'dus ma byas sbyong ba'o/ ]thabs n byams pas dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi skyabs so//
thabs ni snying rjes 'khor ba la mi smod pa'o// thabs ni dga' bas dga' ba drang/ ma dga' ba la bzod pa'o// thabs ni btang snyoms kyi dreg pa'i rtsa ba dang tshogs/
thams cad 'phel ba'o// thabs ni 'phrul gyi mge gsasangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// thabs n 'phrul gyi rna bas sangs rgyas kyi snyan thob pa'o// thabs ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas dbang po
mchog dang mchog ma yin pa thob pa'o// thabs ni sngon gyi nus rjes su dran pas dus gsum lags pa med pa'i yi shes so// thabs n rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob pa'o// thabs ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug pa'o// thabs ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o// thabs ni rgal nas 'jug pa'o// thabs ni nyon mongs
pa med pas nyon mongs pa'o// thabs ni khur bor bas khur thogs pa'o// thabs na tshod yodapa tshad med par ston pa'o// thabs ni tshad med pa tshad yod par ston pa'o// thabs na dbang po zhan pa
ba rnams la gsal bar byed pa'o// thabs ni dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa'o// thabs na lam dang lam ma yin par 'gro ste/ ngan pa'i lam la gnas pa'i sems can las lam bzang por
'god do// thabs na nyung ngu las mang por byed do// mang po las tshad med par byed pa'o// thabs ni bye ba'i sems can rnams 'dum par byed do// thabs n bla ma dang 'bring dang po la gnas
pa'o// thabs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i rig pa las 'khor ba'i rig par ltung ngo// thabs n thar pa las bcing ba tshol lo// thabs ni shes par bya ba zad pa med de/ shes par bya ba zad bar
yang ma lhung ngo// thabs ni spyod lam thams cad 'khrul bar byed do// spyod lam rnams las kyang mi nyams so// thabs n sems can la lta ba'i tshul khrims la ma yin no// thabs ni bsdu
bas ltar la rten gyi/ rtsod pas na ma yin no// thabs ni sgra 'byin pa'o// thabs n khams gsum las spyod yul ba'o// thabs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa'i mtshan nyid spyod yul ba'o//
thabs na 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dang 'dres pa'o// 'phags pa'i spyi bo dang ma 'dres pa'o// thabs namya ngan las 'das pa las gud du phyogs shing 'khor ba la mngon du bltas pa'o//
thabs ni bdud kyi spyod yul na nyon mongs pa med par snang ba'o// thabs ni thams cad nas thams cad de/ thams cad nas thams cad pa'i ng ma yin te/ 'di ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mi zad pa zhes bya ste/ de dag ni b+hAtsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi zad pa brgyad cu ste/ mi zad pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad rjes su chud cing 'dus pa'o// mi zad pa'i sgo'i chos kyi le'u 'di byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa na/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad sngon blo na med ro yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis na mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
toDa Da 'khor de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ me tog gi gdugs dang/ ma tog gi snyan gyi gong rgyan kha dog dang ldan pa//

dri dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems pa'i blo gros mi zad pa la mngon par gtor to// lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi nam mkha' la glu blangs te/ 'di skad du ched du
brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don/ byang
chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las ma zad pa'i rnam pas bstan to// sems can su ma zad pa'i sgo'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas mos pa dang/ kun
! 'dra ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang ma zud pa 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku las phrag pa'i ras phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad ra la chos kyi dgab pa'i phyir byon nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs/
so legs so// skyes bu dam pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so// khyod la re bzhin gshegs pa rjes su yi rang ngo// gang khyod la ngas rjes su yi rang ba de yang

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros ma zad pas phrag pa'i ras de lag pa ga'is kyis blangs te/ spyi bo la/
bzhag nas 'di skad du smras so// bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol pa 'di lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i mchod rten no// de nas phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i
gos dang/ rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rin po che'i bden rang/ lnga lha rin pa che'i rtsa ba can 'ongs par snang ste// de dag 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa 'a lus la mngon
par 'gebs par byed do// rin po che'i gos dang/ rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rin po che'i bden dang/ lce lci rin po che'i rtsa tshe can de dag las sgra 'di skad byung ste/ legs so legs so/
blo gros mi zad pa khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sgo'i le'u legs par smras te/ khyod kyis legs par smras pa la rjes su yi rang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dus 'ad skud/
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gos rnams dang/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang/ rin po che'i pa dar rnams dang/ lnga lce rin po che'i rtsa pa can 'di rig gang nas mchis 'di
lta bu'i sgra dag gang nas byung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pra/ shAr du ti'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i

[D] spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can gang blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dgad ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi brad pa la byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa tshor bar 'dzin pas skyes bu dam pa 'di'i yang dag pa la/
yon tan brjod cing/ 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang mchod par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dgab pa 'di dag bskur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
mi zad pa la rab tu dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ rimo shin tu cher bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// gang bdag cag gis byang chub sams dpa' blo gros mi zad ra la blta ba dang/
phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos bstan pa 'di la nga ma nyan pa red da ni/ bdag cag gis red pa rab tu rud do// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
ma zad pa'i ming tsam thos pa yang red pa rab tured pa yinon/ gang gis 'di mngon sum du sha'i rig gis mngon par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nga nyan pa dang/ mos par byed pa dang/ kun 'dri
[rz]ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa dang/ ku chu pa par byed ra dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus
kyis de dag thams cad kyis legs par smras pa la rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad de/ tshe nga ldan ra kA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal 'a/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi rigs
kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis tsho'i tshad bskal par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin pa byin la/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs yang dag par blang ba thams
cad la slob cing/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa yang bzod la/ mgo'i thod pa la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas te/ bsam gtan rtse gcig dang ldan la

shes rab kyi bye brag la mkhas kyang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral ba de 'khol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par ngas bshad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i thig pa can gyi rigs
kyi bu pho dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang/ mos pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed ra dang/
gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la zhugs shing gnas pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du dran med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra dwa tu 'du byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs
te/ gzhan la rgya cher rab tu ston ra 'dani/ do'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa rnams kyi nang na/ gang chos kyi sbyor pa 'di ni mchog go/
ka gang byang chub kyi sems ma nyams pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson shing/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ sdom pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'i tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las
bzod pa bstan pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang bskyod par ma nus te/ gang 'di chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bzod pa 'dani de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go/ gang chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug pa dang/ ston pa dang/ sbyor ba dang bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus dang/ ngagadang/ sems kyis brtson 'grus na de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems nges par rtog cing mi g.yo ba dang/ rtse gcig pa dang/ rtog pa 'din de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon sum
dung shes pa dang/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par shes pa rang/ rnam par 'byed pa shes ra dang/ nan tan shes pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog ste/ de ltar na shA ra dwa ti'i

du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab du sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nadaka' ba chung dus pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag la sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
'dris kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la yod pa 'am/ glegs bam du byas kyang rung sta/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de'i lag
mthal du phyin par shes par bya'o// gal te 'byung ba chen po rnams gzhan du gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub n mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi rgya ste/ byang chub sems dapa' de dag kyang rgya 'di 'i sa 'tshal bar gang rgya 'di'i phyir 'brang ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyi phyir/
'bring ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs dang bas/ 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi g.yog dang/ rim gro bgyi bar rab tu smra ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag la bdag dag gis ston par 'du shes bskyed par
bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa thams cad ni 'di las 'ong ngo// de nas bcon ldan 'das la/ brgya na lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces
ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi rnam grangs brgya stong mang po thos kyar/ shin tu gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi don 'di lta bu bstan pa bdag cag sdom nam yang ma
thos so// bcom ldan 'das grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang/ rab tu ston pa de dang der bdag/
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas te/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// chos smra ba de dag la yang chos kyi bsrung bar bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de dag ci nas 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur tsare
'khor gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir zhugs te/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/ mthu dang/ sprol dang/ spobs pa/
dang/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis chos smra ba rnams srung bar byed pa de ni legs
so legs so// ko'u shi kachos smra ba bzung bas ni dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas na sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dang tshangs ris kyi ltar bcas pas/ bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde ba

btang ste/ gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de dang der chos kyi rnam grangs de mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de chos skya ba de dag gis ltas bzhus na 'dir tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag mo/
tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas te chos nyan pa 'i phyir lhags so zhes 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ rag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snang ba chen po mthong bar ng/ lha rdzas kyi dri mnam pa dang/ chos
skya bdes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nges pa'i tshig gis nges pa'i tshig dang tshig gi mtshams sbyar par tshig gi mtshams su ma brjed cing/ dran par spobs pa dang/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang mi
g.yeng zhing chos la gus par yid la bgyid pas chos nyan pa ste/ ltas ba'i ngo 'di dag gis 'dir tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas te chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags so
zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bdag gi stobs dang bzhon par bcas pa thams
cang stobs chung bar bgyis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de na re nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' re bla na rer
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' de garas pa de na de ltar sangs rgyas zhes
bgyi'o// blo gros mi zad pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i gzi brjid kyi tshogs dang stobs bskyer pas/ bdag gi nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa rnams bcom pas/
chos sla ba de bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ smra ba'i phyir dam bca' bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der sems bskyed pa'i bag tsam gyis kyang bar chad mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zung zhig/ lcegs shage/ kun nub par gyis shag/
dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta bur bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bgyid/
mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'du rgyas par rnam par dbye ba'i phyir byed pa rlung bar gyis shig/ 'khor 'di na gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad rgyus

bar byed pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshogs shing 'khod do// de nas 'khor de nas byang chub semaM sa ra pa' bye ba phrag drug cus dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'o/
phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu ma lus par rdzogs par
rgyas par bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dam pa'i chos gzung ba'i slad du/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i slad du/ chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rna bar grags par 'gyur
ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dam pa'i chos kun

'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ legs so// skyes bu dam pa dag ji ltar khyod da ltar nga'i mdun du dam pa 'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ khyod gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma
sud kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par khas blangs pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dwapa' chen pa blo
gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bdag gi bla ma ldan pas yi ge ma rdzogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang/ ma zad pa'i chas dang/
ldan pa'i byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po 'di deg la bdag bzod pa gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mi zad pa so so yang dag par rage pa
thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dang/ chos dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ sbyongs pa rnams la 'khrul pa med de// 'gag pa la yang 'khrul pa med do// gang de lta bu'i chos rnams rtogs

par khong du chud pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dgan yang dag pa'i don rnam par gdon mi rwa bar thob pa yin no// blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni so so yang dag ra ra riger bzhi'i dam pa'i mchog thob cing/ dbang red

pa theg pa chen po 'di la gzhan gyi dring la ma 'jog cing rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dam pa'i mchog thob pa ste/ blo gros mi zad pa sa 'di thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lus kyi 'khrul pa dang/
ngag gi 'khrul pa dang/ sems kyi 'khrul pa gang yang med do// de dag thams cad ni ya shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang ldan pa yan no// blo gros mi zader khyer na

sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dgongs so// blo gros mi zad pa nga lta burnams kyis khyod 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la shin tu bzod do// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji lta bur gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ de'i phyir dga' bo khyod kyi rnam grangs 'di blo gros mi zad ng sa bstan pa dang/ mi zad pa'i don dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge mi zad pa bstan pa dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u dang/

blo gros mi zad pa'i le'u zhes kyang zung zhig/ dga' bo khyod kyis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung na/ de las chos la dran pa'i stobs kyi mthu bskyed pa 'bum 'gyur thob par 'gyur
ro/ rngagazhan dag la yang bstanan sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
tshogs de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'bum pa
las/ blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he d+hamatArAhA las zhus/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos
te gtan la phab pa/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta b+hA ga ta ma hA ka ru Nanar do gan mo ma hA yAn sU tA/ bod skad du/ ngopags pa de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'a mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ro sngon rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa// mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bun gyis
rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sa'i sAng po byang chub sems dpas mngon par bstod pa/ chos kyi gdan lci dang rgyu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i
sa phyogs dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskul ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba// chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba// yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byung
ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thamos cad kyi menyam pa nyidi na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo nipig tu bsgor/ slob ma shAn tu dul
ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/chos thams cad la mnga' dbang 'benas/ ge mas can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa' de rol du phyin pa na b.res/ sems
can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'dzom pa la na mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad rung/ dge slong stong phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge/
'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa// glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor pa/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par/
kun tu sbyor pa yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs
par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ chos dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyisangs par byang ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa/ phun sum tshog
pa sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po'i tshes kyi smran las lhag mthong dang/ rigs pa dang/ rnam par

grol ba'i glog byung zhing/ bdud rtsi 'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa// sems can thams cad la sems sa dang mnyam ra/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang srol

kha byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo tog yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lcag pange shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba
thob pa kun tu ston pa dang/ sems can gyi pad+makho 'byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ra byed pa dang/ srid pa'i chu skams pa dang/ shes pa'i las kyi
du mtha' la rar tu 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang zhi gnas kyi rgyu ba/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba/ thams cad la sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la
mkhas pas 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba kun tu ston pa/ ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rin po che shin tu brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyis rlung thams cad kyis ma bskul

cing/ 'jig rten gyi chos la mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgyu mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang/ dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi rgyus yongs su

tsi gang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang/ byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang/ zhi gnas dang
lhag mthong gi mig dang ldan zhing chos zab mo'i skrag pa med pas pa rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha' yas thug pa med par bdu chub sems

dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dar ba sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lta ba zhes bya
ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
las byung ba'i spyod pa'i bu gros zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dor 'a sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tog ga rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po gsar bzang po rnam par pas ga
pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba dung/ byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa 'o ren po shes rab kyi rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya bdang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya pa dang/ de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med ra/
dag dang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems rar 'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston du//
de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ le bcu drug bzhes te tshangs par sbyor ba rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa 'a 'dus ra chen po de yang gzigs
ba 7 @#// shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang nub sa mas dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin rar mkhyen nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sem
dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gzud pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
par 'phrul ba chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrub pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par
bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam dra ra sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston
pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms
rar zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sa ngas rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi loms snang par byed pa// sems can tshad med pa'i
bsam pa tshim par byed pa// lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba/ gzhi bai DUr+ya dkar po'i dbyibs dang/ 'dzam
bu'i gling gi gsar gyi khang pa dag dang/ dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang/ nor bu rin po cha' sAng ro 'i kha phyir dag dang/ rin po che drim mad
pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang/ rin po che kun nas 'od kyi 'ang ra brtse gas pa dag dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi dgab pa dang/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang rab tu dpua pa rang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba dang/ lha'i dar gyi lta lnga mngon par dbus pas bsngags pa bstan pa dar ga tu med cing thug pa med pa dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi

tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor gyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos bskus pa/ tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ dri'i mchog a ka ru dam pa'i snying pos
bdugs ra/klu'i mu tig dang/ rin po che'i me tog gos rnam par spras po/ me tog sil ma bkramal rin po che'i shang rang/ rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na rgyun mdzes pa bkod pa ji sudapa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyidi na kun tu snang ngo// der gdan seng ge 'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu
me da da// grangs med pa// sna tshogs pa/ bltan sdug pa/ mtho pa/ rab tu bzung ba/ yangs pa// rgya che la/ yid du 'dal/ yid dga' bar byed pa dag byang
bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'a jig rten gyi khams 'dir them skas kha khyer ma bdun gyi 'a yang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rin po che an rularang/ mthon ka

chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can/ tshangs pa'i mi tshe'am/ ci rang rin po che sar pos spras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dri ba kun tu sbyor/
pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa// drang ba/ ma g.yo ba/ bzhi stong byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rje

lta ba bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them skos chen po dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'dus ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug
tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs cig du myong tshub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
yongs su bskor rung/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar te/ lha dang klus mngon par bstod cing/ ma tog gi char chen po na 'debs/ na brda'i char chen pos na mngon par 'geb pa
phya ma rung/ spos dang/ byug pa'i char chen po na 'thor/ sil snyan dang/ sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu mad pa na rab tu g.yo bar mdzad 'jig/

rten gyi khams grangs med pa na snang bar mdzad cung/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu
gyur pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byan chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod
phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/ lha dang/ rgyu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnam mkha' lcang dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du ma

zham rang du 'brang zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
@#// mngon par bstod pa/ nyi zla me dung nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul pa ya lha 'od shin tu dri med pa// thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag
na kyang zhi bar mdzad/ ri bo lhun po dang na kho ra khor yug rtse mo b.rol te zhang rnams gsal bar gyur pas na// dga' zhing yang rnams m gnas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba lan skyabs su
mchi/ de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'dasu gshegs pa'i zham red du 'brang nga/ 'dems
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa' las kyi phyir lca'i spos kyi sprin gyi
char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dam pa b.res[‚Äú]shang rar du mtshungs pa mang pa rnam par 'phrul pa shAn tu ston// rgyal ba nya ma ja
'phags te shang rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rar du gda'// rgyal bas rang gi yon tan kun gyis zhing rnams thams cad rgyun te shin tu mdzes mdzad pa// gang zhig share tu mnyam med mtshungs pa/
med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis/ btsam ldan 'das la tshigs su nga ra pa 'dis mnger ra ra stong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam
rang du 'brang ngo// de nas lha'i dbang po rab 'thob bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir ]
lha'i na bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen//
mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi rnam gsum ga la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sams kyi sbyor ra thams cad mkhyen// des na srid pa gsum po dag
na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os// de nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcar pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du
'bung bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
kyi phyir/ lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rag tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gang gi slad du sgyurang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas//
khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma'i smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos ma chog gsungs ra sa na// chos kyi dngos po rang
bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstan pa/
du/bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang ngo// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan
'dus la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// chos kyi bong gis rang
gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang// thugs rje b.res nas byams pa'i dge ngas pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa// gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal pa
mtshungs par mkhyen// chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par
bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs
pa dang/ 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog ma g.yo ba// ma nyam med blo lda/
rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// rim gyis byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje yis na bden pa'i lam gyi rnams la rab tu gnas mdzad pa// rnam thar
gsum gyi lam gyi khyim na gnas ra 'a bde gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// sAng rje'i 'chu ba ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba// zhi gnas 'dab ma rnam par grol ba'i mi
tog rgyas// slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bstan gyur pa// bde gshegs pad+ma la na spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas//
brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags// yul gyi rlung rnams la ngas pa chen pos ma g.yos pa// sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag thugs
rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag lu// blo gter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa// sems can brgya dag gis ni mang mos mchod gyurar// bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag
phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa// shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing// skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad+ma kha 'byed pa// sangs
rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang// 'dren pa khyod dang mnyam ra dmages par ma gyur te/ khong ni yon
tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags// bdag cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par gyur ma lags// lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis ra// lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang drag mngon
bstod pa// bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa// bde bar gshegs pa bstod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstodanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham rang du 'brang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa tshad
med pas lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs de/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'dus gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them skos nas
'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs par shes pa de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshag
ba shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyi yongs su gzung pa rin po che bkod par gdan sa nga ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang/

nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba
la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba snyoms bar zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom/

ldan 'das kyi sku'i sku'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/ byung nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thar sa cad snang bar byas so/ 'de/
ba'an du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi phyogs rnams dang/ 'og dang/ steng dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sbyang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi
khams rnam par snang bar byas ma thag tu de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can ramal pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad de// dud 'gro'i su gnas pa'i sems can rnams
dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyu na chadad// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cig/ zhe sdang gi
ma yin/ gti mug gis ma pa ne nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang ganod par ma gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang la ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur to// byang chur
sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de sa tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo// gang gis brtson 'grus stobs
mtha' yas yas pa brtan pa kha rnams gyur te// gang gis brtson 'grus chen po stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs sbyangs// gang gis yo ni tan dugan phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan
rab brjod pa// shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa ma dzes// gang chos rgya chen bla med ma nyan slad de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni
khaskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan// zla rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tsham sbyar pa// thub pa des ni gang phyir sems can bde bar bzhed ra sa 'di dag phyung///
mnga' bdag ga nga zhig brtson 'grus kyis na bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas ram mdzad bus// pad+ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes// gang zhig
nyi ma bzhin du sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa// de ya chos kyi 'khor la bzhag pa don chen gson du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol// rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal
ba kun gyis bskor gyur pa// 'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can shugs brtse phyir na ri ring bskor ba mdzad// srog chags rnams kyis bsten pa red dka' legs pa rgya chen de rang 'byung bar 'gyur//
N+Digang dag dad pa dang kha che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de rang ltos// de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi 'ang thams car tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gang bar dus/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad yang dag par bskul/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/
mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdur kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs
te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri mad rnam dag rin chen 'od/ byang chub kyi ya na log dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun
ma 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin pa che'i bsod nams bkod pas// rgya che ba dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' me
tog dpal gyi sAng po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan
cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ skadatsagi thang cig datsam re la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan
'das kyi smran sngar 'dug nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tre/ 'a na khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
las kyi phyir/ lha'i nor bu bi zloma'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan rab tu ma tshungs med yon tanab rol
phyin// khyed kyi yon tan bsngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun n brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs ma chos zhing gang yon tan gter// der ni chos ston gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchis//
chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyan pa nyidi mkhyen kyang// shin tu bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal// sems can rnam
par dgrol slar bya dang bstan par mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bskor pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar phyogs
logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi snyan dag la 'khod de// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshags pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spyobs nga 'a sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sa ngas rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis
yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjeda'adir phyin te/ 'bor gyi
khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ do ma ldan 'das
mchod pa'i las byed cing/ gsar gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i
sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas// 'od kyi glog phyung stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing// dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal
gel ba 'phel bar mdzad/ bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas// ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de// lam yang bstan cing srung po dag kyang/
bskams par mdzad// thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis dam ldan
'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan rag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshags/
ra kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba rang ldan r na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mo zhes bya ba'od des ngaskul

bon ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de
la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing/ nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi 'phreng ba'i dra bas btsem ldan 'das la mngon par
bkapa/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sku yi 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing// smon lam dag pas dag pa bye ba phrag mang
lcan Da Dadri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// khyod kyi tshig rgyan chags gas la 'ang mtshungs pa ste// 'gro
ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshom bgyid// sems kyi rgyu rang rnam rtog gang la nga ma mapa' ya nga// sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung// de nas byang chub
sams dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs legs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag 'o 'khod do// danas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yasa'an chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis

smras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyad kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'dug nas/ de sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing/ ro
bu'i do shal dung/ rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 'dzam bu chu gser btso ma lta
bur ser ba'i sku// kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges rtogs pa// re dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/
gang gis lhun po brtse gas pa'i lta bu'i khrun tsam du// 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni// de yis rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus
kyin kyis/ rnam par sprul las rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
bstod nas/ byang phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas shar dang lho'i mtshams phyogasan/ de bzhin gshegs
pa mya ngan thams cad dacom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'

gang+ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma go bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor
ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed tsang/ rin po cha'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
par bstod do// spyi yis mtha' dbung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang// sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas// mag med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'//
sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing gcig phyogs la zhing mngarab 'byam ston mdzad de// kun tu bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// bsam pa chen
po dang ldan ci 'drar gyur de la// dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan
'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar dang lha'i phyogs mtshams lags su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho dang nub kyi
mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzin gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje/
chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi
snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams ma mchid 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas//
[des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing/
na bzu'i dra bus bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'dus la mngon bar bstod do// sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du
'a tshul khrims dri mad nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung// tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shan tu thugs rje zhing// bdag la stod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod
bstan bla ma rgya chen ston// chu gter zab mo bzhin du shar tu gting dpag dka'// srid pa dog par bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste// sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grog
denas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho dang nub kyi mtshan sa phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi

spyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi snyan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po 'asangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams mun pa dang bral bano// byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba son zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i byam snyad kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun
du bdar te/ lhan cig sas rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod
par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gse bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// srid pa'i rang bzir sgyu ma'i rang
bzhin rtogs mdzad nas// byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po me da par ston// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can khams na 'dul mdzad kyang// 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis mkhas ma mchis//
dpar nam zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na// gzugs na thang yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma 'gas// 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs// chos rnams sbyar
yang 'ad na chos la chags ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad ma de ra dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'a mngon par bstod nus/ nub dang byang
gi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi snyan ngag la 'khod do// de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na/ de bachen gshags pa/
nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa rnam ra ra sams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
blo mtha' yas dri ma med ces bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig du sangs rgyas kyi
zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'dug nas/ sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing//
rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// zab mo'i chos la mkhas
shing rab tu zhi la mos// khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen// khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyis bsam pa cho ga
mkhyen// sems can gcig gi spyodabazhin sems can kun gyi spyod// gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyis 'du shes min//
'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chu sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
bstod nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs na re bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen ud+ma la dmar po'i depa la gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed du snang bo na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des
khaskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan tsag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig
thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyan sa rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing/ nor bu rin po che'i gling ga 'phrang gi du bas bcom ldan 'das la
mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji sId rdul na chis pa/ de sA da bde gshegs sras po
rgyal ba'i drung lhags te// bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad// blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes
[D ]shin tu rdzogs// gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod namasamatha' yas te// bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang// skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' de drag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod patshad med pa dag gas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'og ga phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi

zla stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyus kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa no/

byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing ma dun du bdar te/ lca
cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyuranas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed 'di'i phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed de
rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do//
bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha' dang dbung ma mchis// bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa// de nas ngs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min// dper na
nam mkha'i mtha'i ma skye nges ma red bzhin// mtshungs med sbyod pa mtha' dbung med pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor la de bzhin 'od de mya ngan 'das// sa don ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung
ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshadram mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag las lung chub sa mas dpa'i bsto/ tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
par bstodanas/ steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'bod do// de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sams dpa' bcu 'dus pa
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rtan gyi khams mi mjed 'dir yin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkad par bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te ]gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/ gsung
ga/ bsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stongachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pas
po dang zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge'asAn dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa de gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bsAN 'i sgra de
thos nas/ lus dang sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i thim skas d gnas / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/
de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu ji ltar mthun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang/
tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'od chen dang/ 'od chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge
ba7 chung dang/ tshad med dge dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sprin med dung/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang/ mi che ba dang/ ma
gdung ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams ran po che bkod par phyin te/
de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan rab tu bstan pa dag la 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas/ smin mtshams
kyi mdzodaspu nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor ma snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' pa tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi

mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i me tog dpal gyi snying pos chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la soms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa 'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge 'i khri 'phang du shing
ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya cu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting pa/ me tog sil ma sna
tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa//
sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam ba tshig bar byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma tog dpal gyi snying po chos
thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan sar ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du tir
nga 'dzin de las langs te/ rgyus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'dras la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab
tu bgyid// lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'// tshungs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par madzes// sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul
pa 'di// chos rnams mi g.yonam mkha' rang bzhin ya ma brla// sgyu ma smug rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing// rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par// mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam
bar bsgrub pa ston// bkod pa sems kyi dbang 'gro rnams ni gzugs can min// rnam bsgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro// bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang
bzhin 'dra// rnam bsgrub bdag gi ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba// de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so//
rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang// sa stenganor bu rin chen
sna tshogs kun tu ston// gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bya ba 'dul 'gyur ba// khyod kyis seng ge 'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog
dang dar gyi 'phreng ba bsgrong// dan gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis// khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'dul ba mkhyen nas kyang// sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna
tshogs ston// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar legs shing shin tu bsrung ba'i gsung// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang// bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'jigs te
gdan la bzhugs// rga dang 'tsha dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol/ khyod la bsnyen bkur bag dang chos ni mnyan slad du// rnam dag sems hran 'ad rnams phyogs bcu d gnas
lhags// gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol// seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung chub sems dpa' me tog
dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ gdan seng ge 'i khridi la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bsus
ba bya@#// nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang/ yo shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor
che 'jug pa// so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la bab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i yi shes gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor la
mi skyo ba'i chos ston pa// theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi
bsam pa dang/ dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa sAng po dang ldan pa// chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed pa// tshul bzhin gyi chos
kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa// nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i yashes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thug pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas
pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chogs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin//
du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa// rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel/
par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa// sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ gsur dang/ thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs
pa dang/ mos pa dang/ shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa// nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa// rang sas rgyas kyi
theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sams rab tu dben par shes/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang/ bsad pa/
dang/ bshad pa dang/ bklag pa dang/ gsung ba dang/ rnam par shes par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang/ de bzhin
gshes pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang/ 'khor gyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge 'i khri de la bzhugs so//
bam po gnyis pa/// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyun bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags sogs
kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lA lha dag dang/ me tog gi skon bu rnams byani
gyis brlabs te/ me tog ga lnga lnga dang/ ma tog gi skyon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas

kyi mazlus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos dra bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi ]
snying po dri'i byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyi 'dabakod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang
0/ ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig ma 'dzums par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri mad kyis chos la mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga'/
ba dang/ mos par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi ma shus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i
rgyal pos brjod pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi
brjed par byin gyis brlobs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jomA pas bdur kyi
[Dr. ]dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jom pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin/
de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tsho stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyid pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang/
b.rus te/ myur ba myur bar rings su rang rang ga bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gis
@# bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnams brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal
zla/ mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdagatsag gsol ba 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa chos
bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mge gis mi rtse la bar 'gyur
ba 'a las mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das badrag cag la dbugs dbyung ba sol cig dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos mnyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom
ldan 'dus kyis bdud de dus dbug dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag legs so legs so// gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la/ de bzhin gshegA
pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob cig dang/ de nyid khyed kyis bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/
pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i
mun pa mun nag bsal la brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dperan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang/ nyi
ma'idakyil 'khor gcig dang/ nor bu rin po chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel te// grogs po de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa ga cig gis mi shes pa'i mun
ba mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ram gyis mi shis pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs las byan gyis brlabs pa dang/ kun tu bstan pa 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dang na de bzhin gshags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug ras/
nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed par the tshem ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di na che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa//
phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa// sams shin tu byang bar bgyis te/ dri ma ma mchis pa rig pa dang/ rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing/
bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son// thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges pa ra skyes pa/ bdud kyi
las dang/ rtsod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal lo/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ ga thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa//
shes pa la mkhas pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa// dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ mos pa dang//
gzungs dang/ ye shes 'og tu thob pa/ phyin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la
mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad/
la mkhas pa// mi 'am ci dang/ bya ka la bid dang/ khrung khrung gi sgra dang tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can ban+tan 'ang shin tu gnas la/ mi g.yo zhang ji skad smra ba de bzhin du bgyid pa/ chos kyi
rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa// rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi chags pa'i khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing
rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa// chad pa dang rtag bar mtha' gnyis ka dang/ lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcango pa/ tshogs can
bya// chen po 'tshogs kyi rgyal bo yongs su 'gugal/ dadadapon chen po bskal ba grangs med par chos dkon mchog gi bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal
po po chen po sems can khrums cad nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sbrul zhi'i rgyud dang/ spyi'i tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad
