pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gas nga ba la mi skrag pa// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod na brgyad pa thams cad la sems dpa' ba bdud
khazhi dang nyon mongs ba'i yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa// dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dung/ ting nge 'tsho/
la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyid pa// sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa ra lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po red pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang//
tshe grags pa dang ma grags pa dang/ smad pa dang/ bstod par ng/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang/ dang pa dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs
pa chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par brgyud pa/ pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
par dag pa/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ra btu thob pa// chos dkon mchog thams cad
la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma gnod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang/ 'dul ba'i go cha 'tshal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzad yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngagab mtha' phyin phyin pa 'di lta burnams kyi 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di
snyam du bcom ldan 'dasan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed pa snyam bgyid do//
bcom ldan 'das ji tsamadu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogapar gyur pa/ samos can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang ngo/
par bskyed pa// sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa longs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi
lcog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur da/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/
nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub la/ lag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams lam la 'dzed pa/ theg pa gsum
la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba na lha dang ma dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so// de ci'i

slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyuran/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi
khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byon gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sas rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo ma thog go/ bcom ldan

'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba bskyed pa'i

sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams

03 cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ dpar na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la dag ra ra ngu rin po cha bailta chu lor nas nor bu mching bu la dmages pa snyam du
sems pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la
gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhug pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang/ bskyar par 'gyur ba de dag/
thams cad kyis ring po mi thogs pa chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mar bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor
de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u 'o/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byung chub sems nga la 'dus pa 'di reg na tshos den du gnyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par

mkhyenanas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ma 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zar skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan spyi gtsu gnas rung ngo// khacom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/
ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/
'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la regamawag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug ga rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang/ seng ge 'i khri dang/ lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnananas/ lam me lhang nge lhan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug
gi rgyal pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gozar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi stong ga bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni bai skrun/ g.yogs
ma gser/ snying po na ni pa chen po 'am ci/ rtsibasan an+da ril las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu myos pa/ dar gyi lda lhas mdzes par byas pa// dril bu g.yaM kha'i dra ba 'khrol ba/
byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung pa/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegapal mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin pa/
che'i gdugs de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang/ sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyu na mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// bsam gyis ma khyab yon tan/
kun dang ldan// skyes bu khyu mchog gsan 'od zer phyung// zhal ya nga rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa des n bdag ga lus la yang// lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor ba//
ma yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang// blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs// rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyur/ bdag lus rang
sim sams ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi blagros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang// spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu
chen bstan par dka' ba la// nyam chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid ma nus// sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
[z]@#// dpa'i spyod 'jug dang// 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gis 'byung bdang// snang dang nges 'byung rnamakhar sprul bar ng// dbang bskur shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal//
[Or ]theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing// mtha' las rgya che ba la 'khor lcags dang// gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dog/ de dag Nan smad sangs rgyus la yang zhu// bdud kyi dkyil
'khor shin tu tshar bcad cing// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di shin tu bzung// bcom ldan bung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod// lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu
mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas// bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo ma chud// bde gshegs mkhyen ma shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas la yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom
rgyaldan khyod kyi mkhyen 'jug dang// ji ltar yun rang nas na bslabs pa dang// chos kyi dbang phyugargyalatsho ba bslabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa su la ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul na tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ba na gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing re bzhag
pa ni sems can thams cad ma gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan tA/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis
mi khyab pa thob nas/ gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tshom ma mchis pa dang/ chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
sams dpa' sems can thams cad ma gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags/
btsaldan 'dus ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i dag byang chub sems dpa' las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang/ legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang/ las kyi mtha' gdung ba mam/
pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tshom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal/
[¬©]// bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
pa yang dag bar 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du chos thams cad la rab ng sgyurar thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin tu rnam par nges pas/ byang chub sems dar 'i spyod pa la 'jug
bas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs por bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pa la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas/ khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bu s
de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob
bar 'gyur ba sa khyod la bshad do// byar chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal bos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// tshul khrims kyi rgyun dang/
ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang/ shes rab kyi rgyan dang/ gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyanan bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgya nagacig ste/ gcig gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa na sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi
tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go/ rigs kyi khu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa
bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan na gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'adzralta ste/ lus
rnam par dag pa dang/ ngag rnam par dag pa dang/ yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi pa 'di dag[4]
[. ]/// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor ba dang/ gang smon pa de yang drag par 'grub pa dang/ gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang/ gang rtsom pa/
de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan na lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khri/
dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes na theng ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
pa chen po bla na med pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ druge gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ yid la gcags

pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang/ 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir/ 'dres
bu ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang/ dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/ sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dung/ gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir gang dga'i tshul/
khrims dang/ gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i pishes pas/ rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te/ drug bo 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyanan bdun
po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang/ bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang/ brtson 'grus rnam par rig pa dang/ bsam
gtan rnam par dag pa dang/ shes rab rnam par dag pa dang/ thabs rnam par dag pa dang/ bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tshul rjes sa kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ sa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rnam par 'phro ba med pa
phun sum tshogs pa dang/ lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ khon du 'dzin pa mad pa phun sum tshogs pa rang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dal
ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ pargyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan na dgu pa/
'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhe po yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/
sams las su rung ba yin/ sems cang shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chul khrims kyi rgyan bcu po 'di
@#// dag ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rgyan dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag
gi rgyan dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ zhing gi rgyan dang/ bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin
par byed pa'i rgyun dang/ sdig pa thams cad ma byed pa'i phyir/ skye ba'i rgyun dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang/
nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ myung chub kyi snying bo'i rgyan dang/ tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang/
ma 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems ra'
rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi khu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyanan gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
byams pa ste// 'di ni gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ drang bdang/ mnyen
pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chur senus dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med pa dang/ g.yo med/
pa dang/ bcos pa med pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag che// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bsha bo 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin bar mi 'gro ba dang/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba yin par mi 'gro badrang/ gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba
ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan na lnga po 'di dag ste// lta gang khe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrub pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag
gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'jun ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ rmugs pa dang/ gnyid dang/ rgod pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o//
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge
'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
[s/ ]@#// kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan na bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa ste// dran pa/
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ba rtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rung/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
gshin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs
kyi bukhyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyanan brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam 5na lag brgyud pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang
dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang
dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi khubyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan na dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na//
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis sAng rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ soms can thams cad yongs su ma gtong bar gnas nas/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa//
sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa// rtog pa dang bcas pa/ rapyod pa dang bcas pa/ raben pa las skyes pa 'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par
byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dug ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i
dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing/ dran pa dang shes bzhin can yan te/
bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa 'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par
byas te gnas so// de bde ra yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing/ yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma ya du pa bdang
soms dang/ dran pa yo ngas su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi ba rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las ya nga dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i
'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
@#/// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par
bon byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med ra 'o skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
du rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skya mchod las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man skye mched rdzogs pa ra byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
med 'du shes med man skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang/ thabs mkhas pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i
mngon sum du yang ma byed la/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang langs nas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ tingange 'dzin gyi rgyan dgu po 'di dag go/ gos kyi bu
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par so mas pa dang/ zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang/ mngon par brtson par mi 'dor ba dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang/ sams dben pa dang/ lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang/
[4]/chos rnams la sems shang 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang/ sems la dbang sgyur ba dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs rab du 'thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge
'dzin gyi rgyunan bcu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyanan gcig ste/
gcig gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la the tshom med pa ste/ 'di na gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis
gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyunan gsum po 'di dag
ste/ gsum gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang/ mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba
dang rtswa 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal dang/ lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan
bya@#// bo 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang/ shes rab mchog gi bsam gtan pa yin pas/
ting nge 'dzin gyi lung po yongs su dag pa dang/ gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
@# lung bo yongs su dag pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas/ chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa sto/ lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ bdag ga 'khor yongs su dag pa dang/
rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas/ byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dge ba'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang/ brag cha lta bu 'angashes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang/ sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas
sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyis par smras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba med longs surag pa dang/ bstod pa dang/
bsngogs pa dang/ rjes su 'chags pa slong ba yongs su dag pa dad yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su/
dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa na 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur bos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan ma thams
cad las sgrol bas/ blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa na 'gyur bar shes pas/ de las ma
chags pa yongs su dag pa dang/ mngon par shes pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang/ mngon par shes pa spyod pas dmigs yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag
pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin ra ba gzungs yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas/

kyi zhing gi rgyan na phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyunan bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'dra lta ste/ dran pa/
nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang
gsems dben pa dang/ dbang po rnams la dbang por yongs su shes pa dang/ stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang/ lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun pa 'di dag go/ rigs kyi dubyang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi shes rab kyi
rgyanan brgyad po 'di dag ste// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zha ba'i phyir kha gnas shes pa dang/ rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang/ chos kyi phung po rjes su

rtogs pa'i phyir phung pa shes pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang/ grong stong ba dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye na ched shes pa dang/ bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtog pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag gi/ rigs

kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyun na dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi ma tha'o dag nga sa 'das pa shes pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dag ra sa ma 'ongs shes pa
rang par gyi mkha' dag pas/ da ltar byung ba shes pa dang/ rgyu chud ma za bas nges pa rnam pa shes pa dang/ rgyan phye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang/ yongs su smin par byed pas/

0 leg pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes ba dang/ chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa
nyid du shes pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni

bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyi'i rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang/ rnam par

'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyi'i smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang/ 'pho bamid pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs ranAn lta bur shes pa dang/ 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang/ rkyen gyi mtshan/

nyid kyi phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang/ de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang/ yang dag ra 'a mtha' ma 'khrugs pa'i

mtshan nyid du shes pa dang/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan bcu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sa mas dpa' rnams kyi
gzungs kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di na gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang
@#/ chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyanan gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste// kun tu 'dzin pa dang/ 'dzin pa ste// gnyis po 'di dag go//
mi rigs kyi tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzus kyi rgyanani gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang/ tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang/ nges pa'
tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyanan bzhi pa 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i
glu tshig dang/ rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang/ rab tu 'gro ba'i tshig drang/ brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi bo 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni
lnga po 'di dag ste/ lcagang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang/ yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang/ mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas
skyengs pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang/ gang zag ga sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten 'a sa 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi du
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang/ bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshig rab tu 'thob pa dang/

nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang/ g.yo re da ra sa rlung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang/ sAng rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang/ snod pa la mkhas pas chad par chos ston
ba dang/ 'jig rtenashes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang chen/ 'di lta
ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa drang/ shugs can gyi spobs pa dang/ myur ba'i spobs pa dang/ chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang/ rgyun chad med pa'i spobs pa dang/ 'khrul pa med pa'i spyibs
pa dang/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag gi/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan na brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

lha'i skad shes pa dang/ ku'i skad shes pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang/ dri za'i skad shes pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa

dang/ lta 'phye chen po'i skadzashes lanas/ sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgur 'di dag ste/ dgu gang

zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spa gang ba med pa dang/ smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang/ chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang/ 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang/ ma ngon
[h]@#// pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la lcel zhir bstan ba shes pa dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su mthun la bstan pa shes pa dang/ khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa/
dang Da mngon par chags pa rnams la theg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang/ yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
sa sems dpa' rnams kyi sa zungs kyi rgya ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang/ zlos chos bskyed pa'i sgo dang/ shes

[‚Äì ]rab kyi snang ba gzhan la rag ma las pa dang/ yi ge bstan pa ma zad pa dang/ donabastan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ba tu brjod ba dang/ kun
nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang/ rnam par byung ba bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang/ dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags ba med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i

zla so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa lta/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa// blo gros chen kho rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ na tu
0 rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs/ den lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dga'// lus dang ngag rnams dang yid dag cing// de yi rnam par ltung ba kun 'chad pa// 'din tshul khrims ldan pa'i/

rgyun yin no// lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye// de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub// nan tan snying por byed dang lo nga dag ldan// 'dani tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no// de yi ting 'dzin
sgyu ma ma yin te/ shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong// de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu mayAn// 'dan tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyun// tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag/
tshul khrims sra su ma yin 'dren ma med// de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang in// 'din gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag/
cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag/ bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag/ thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing gtan la shin tu gnas// sa mchog tho ri rnal 'byor
rnam 'azo med// lhod pa spangs shing dgang sla gso yang ma// 'di ni gang drag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste// de yi sems ni nam yang gdung ma
'gyur// de la yid la gcags par 'gyur med re// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// 'jigs pa mar cang ma skag ma zhum ste// bsam pa nges shing rigs la yid rab// 'dir de la
bcang ba lhod par gyur/ 'di na gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun// grags chen sha ma sa na las su rung ba la// da dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yin// 'di na
yin rang lus mtshan gyi rgyan byed pa// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// dunadzaskad smras pa de bzhin te// mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// den nyin mongs med pas rtag sems
rgyan// 'di gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing na legs par brgyan// theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin te// gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed las/

rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan pa byed// byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing// byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed// stobs dang 'jigs ra dag rgyun byed tsang// nga rgyal med pas shes pa 'gas
pa/ par rgyan// de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed// mkhas pa rtag tu dran pa ma nyen ba yin// g.yo med cingan sgyu med bcos pa med// gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ba yin// de sgrub pa
lnga po rnam par sel// bag yod gyur nas rjes su lam chug sgom// byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste/ mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed// rnal 'byor pa na zhi gnas nges
sems sbyor// den tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gzon// dben dngashin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dbangani sgyur ba yin// chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur// de la
kun nas ldang dwang 'gyod pa med// de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med// bden pa snang zhing yongs su shes pa shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste// shes rab dam pa bsam
gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis gsalanus na rnam par grol ba dag/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cingashes pa dag/ dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags// 'dod chags khral ba'i shes
pas chos kyang dag/ dra gnas 'di na di kha rlom sems med// 'di ni gang dag shes dang ldan pa'i rgyun// shes rab kyis na sbyin du brgyan gyur te// rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir//
bdag dang byang chub de bzhan sems can rnams// 'khor gsum po dag de na rnam par sbyong// shes rab kyisan tshul khrims brgyan gyur te// gzugs bar n sgyu ma brag cha 'dra ba'i phyir//
lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong// shes rab kyis ni bzod par brgyan gyur te// mkhas dang mtho ma ni dmo 'a bar 'gyur man dang/
dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu ra ba rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong// sher rab kyis na brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te// skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang// de ni
blang ba med cing der med pa// 'khor gsum po dag de na rnam par sbyong// shes rab kyisan bsam gtan brgyan gyur te// de la ma chags 'gyur dang lhag mthong dang// mkhas
dang mngon par shes pa bskyed pa dang// 'khor gsum bodrag dun rnam par sbyong// shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang rgyan byed de// shin tu 'dud dang bzungs dang ya ra
dag smon// 'khor gsum po dgaden rnam sbyong zhing// sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong// dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran ma 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de//
rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben// sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mishes// bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil ma non// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs//
de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro ba med// 'di na gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyun// de napishin tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas shes// de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te// chos kyi phung po ji bzhin
lung bo shes// khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes// des na stong pa lta bur skye mched shes// rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de// don dam bden par 'khrugs pa
mad par shes// tshul bzhin gyis na nges par rtogs par shes// dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug/ rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yongashes// dkon mchog gsum n mtshan

nyid gcig tu shes// 'di nigang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu ngashes// yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no// rnam 'khrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste//
'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste// rkyena rnams kyis nu khrag cha ji bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings na rtag tu ma 'dres shes// de bzhin nyidan
gnas med de rab shes// yang dag mtha' na rtag tu mi g.yo chosi/ 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med// shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yungs ra// brgyunanas sangs rgyas chos rnams
bar byed// de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med// chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud// chags

med tshog dung rdu ba pa ma yin dang// rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang brdzun med tshig thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang// mkhas pa de na ya shes rton par byed// nges don mdo sde rtog par rab tu shes/
gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing// 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// na gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// de yi tshig na bden pa'i rjes su mthun// gzung
bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin// de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod// chad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste// shug can drang ni myur dang rtag
ma chags// rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/ legs par brgyus pa'i 'phrangs bas legs brgyan bzhin// lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dra ze lha
min dang/ mkha' lding ma 'am tsadang lta'aphye che/ sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nas spagong med pa ste// smra ba mthong nas
zhum par 'gyur ba'ang med// 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi gtam yang brjod// 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong sne la zhi ya// gtam brjod
0 rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun// nga rgyal can la 'gan rdo rje ston// yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste// theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam ya nga brjod// dogs pa kun
lhagyi the tshom gcod pa ste// blo las chos rnams mngon sum gyur pa yin// de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad redashes// don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun
chags te// de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// den gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes// rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thug
pa med// de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas snang ba'i so so rig pa thego// den gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur ba ste// de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang// bskal
par rgyunachad med par rab brjod kyang// yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par ma nus so// kabam po gsum pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhan/
ma nga byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi ru snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing/ byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa sbyod par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba nabargyad po 'di dag go/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang/ blo gros kyi
snang ba dang/ rtogs pa'i snang ba dang/ chos kyi snang ba dang/ shes pa'i snang ba dang/ bden pa'i snang ba drang mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang/ sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/

byang chub sems dwapa 'a rnams kyi snang ba na brgyad po 'di drag gro/ rigs kyi bu de la byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran snang ba gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang
banabargyad po 'di dag sku/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa sogs pa dang/ thos pa'i chos rnams ma brjed pa
dang/ don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang/ yul drug gis mi 'phrogs pa dang/ mi dge ba'i chos sbyong zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa ra bya ba'i phyir/ dran pa rgya chen po phun sum
tshogs bar gyur pa dang/ de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang/ dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams
@#/ cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ban brgyad pa 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub se mas dpa' rnams kyi drwa gros
kyi snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi blo gros yan gyi/ tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang/ ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma/
yin pa dang/ chos kyi blo gros yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang/ rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyi/ 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang/ byang chub kyi sa mas kyi blo gros yani
gyi/ lan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang/ rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi/ dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi/ bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa
dang/ snying rje chen pa'i blo gros tshan gyi/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi
du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di drag ste// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa ra 'gyur ba dang/ dgongs te bstan
pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes ra rnams rtogs par khong du chud par

'gyur ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ snul zhi'i rgyud bstana' rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ spyi'u tsugs kyi rgyur brtan pa rtogs
par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa ra 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag go/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pa sa 'jig rten pa'i
chos kyi snang ba dang/ thar pa 'dod pa rnams la ye shes kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang/ lam shin tu bsgoms ra'i phur sgrib pa no da ra 'i chos kyi snang ba dang/
'dod pa dang/ srid pa dang/ ma rig pa dang/ lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyi'i rtsag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang/ 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir/
'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi snang ba dang/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ kun nas niyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang/ sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/
rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang/ chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni
brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang pa na brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad pa'i
shes pa'i snang ba dang/ rgyun du zhugs ra 'di shes pa'i snang ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong btIshes pa'i snang ba dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba 'di shes pa'i snang pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i
snang ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyishes pa'i snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang bo dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi
du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba na brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di
lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po 'thob par 'gyur bde la de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom
rgyupa gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa 'thob da ra 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum ra 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang
gas 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de lade'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang

chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur pa de lta de'i snang ba dang/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba na brgyad pa 'ang reg ge/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba nirgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang
zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang drag par na thod pa'i phyirigasal ba'i snang ba dang/ lha'-irna bas sgra thams cad thos pa 'i phyir/ nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba
dang/ sngon gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sa mas la lta ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar snang ba
dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' sgrab pa med pa'i snang ba dang/ brag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyire shes pa'i/
snang pa dang/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snod
ba ste Da rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag ste/
dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang/ sgrub pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang/ sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang/ sgrub pas yang dag pa'i
lta ba'i snang ba dang/ sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang/ sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang/ sgrub pasasems can gyi bsam pa'i snang badrang/ sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems
rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang/ sgrub pas shin du mthar thug po'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ban dgur 'di dag go/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dran pa de dang yang dag 'phros pas na// sngon chad las dag bsagasar chud mi zon// phra ba sngo ba'i phun sum tshogs pa
de/ phyi phyir zhing na lang dag sgrubapar byed// thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed par med// rnam par nges pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni smras// dran dang
ldan pa ma dge rnams dang bral// dran pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags// bya ba bye ba dgan rnam par 'byed// dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni// rgyal ba rang byung dag gis byin gyis rlob//
dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa// de na 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus// shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnam bral te// lha dang ma rnams kyin don kyang byed// blo gros bzang ldan snang ba
thob gyur nas// dogs pa dang ni dzi tshom rnams kyang gcod// dran pa ldan pa rang byung ye shes kyis// byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed// de ni don gyi blo gros can yin gyi// tshig 'bru'i
rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min// sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can// rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin// chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de// nyon mos blo gros sel cing
gti mug brel// shes rab dang thabs kyi tshul shes pa// de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed// de na sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan// nyan thos 'gyuramin rang rgyal 'gyur ma
yin rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi// den blo gros chung du 'dod ma yani// sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi// bdud kyi blo gros sun 'gyur ma yin// blo gros ldan pa
snying rje cher gzhol gyi// sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min// chos 'ga' bstan po gang yin de la na// the tshom med cing rtogs pa khong du chud// den dgongs te gsungs la/
mkhas 'gyur zhing// sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan// so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan dang// de yi shes pa 'jug ba chags pa med// skyon byung byed ba po dang rnam bral
bar// rten pa'i chos rnams dgan rab tu shes// de ni snul zhi'i rgyud la mkhas gyur cing// spyi'u tshugs tshulan rtogs par khong du chud// sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bshad ji snyad pa//
thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud// 'jig rtenapa ya chos kyi snang ba yis// lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba zhes// 'jig rten las na 'das pa'i ye shes kyis//
shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin// kha na ma thor bcas dang ma tho med// ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug lamanangashin tu bsgoms drar gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'bras bu yod pa'i
chos ston to// zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi// chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug/ de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing// lha dang mi rnams kyi na don kyang byed// 'dus ma byas
dang 'dus byas chos rnams la// de yi shes pa rtag tu rayatu 'jug/ de na de yis dri bral rab 'ab med// skyonamadu thob nas spud pa rnams kyang spyod// rnam par byang dang kun nas 'on mongs
la/ de yi dam pa sgrib pa mang pa 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis na sams 'od gsal ba dang// kun s nyon mongs pa yi tshul yang shes// ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur pa ni// skye ba med cing
'byung ba med par shes// 'di 'dra 'di na theg pa chen po la// chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin// dan brgyad pa yin pishis pa dang// rgyun du zhugs la shes pa 'jug pa dang// lan cige
phyir 'ong ba yi shes pa dang// phyir ma 'ong 'ashes pa 'jug pa dang// dan dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang// 'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag/ kun la de yishes dang sgrub pa rnam/
lhag ma lus pa med par rab tu 'jug gang gis 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ 'khrugs mang don dam nges par 'byang 'gyu la/ de la rab bsgor sa smra ba dpa' ba rnams// bden pa'i//
snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin// bden ba dag ni bsgom pa byas pas na// skyon med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po 'thob// gnyis dang gsum dang de bzhin bzhi ba dang// rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras
bu thob par 'gyur// bsgom pa gang gis sun smra ba'i rtag/ de dag bzod pa dag ni thob 'gyur dang// gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang rgya ba// bden pa de dag la ni snang bar 'gyur//
lha yi mig gis sun de yis kyang// gzugs kyi rnam pa rag ni thams cad ma thong// lha yaM rna ba nges par rtogs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag gi sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur// sngon gyi gnas
shes pa yi snang ba yis// bskal pa khrag khrig ragan rjes su dran// 'od gsal ba yi shes pa 'i snang ba yis// gzhan gyi sar sakyi spyod pa rnams la mkhas// rdzu 'phrul gyin shes pa'i
snang ba yis// phyogasabcu'i nang na khrig khrig rnams su 'gro// zag pa med pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin// bsod nams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas
pa'i/ mngon shes thob pa 'gro ba nye bar 'gro// de yi shes pa chags pa med pa yis// 'gro ba'i dogs pa dag ni gcod par byed// nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor ra// dran rang
blo gros rtogs dang chos shes sbyang// bden pa ya na snang ba mtha' yas te/ mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur ba yin/ de sgrub pas yashes dang shes rab dang ka/
rgya chen blo dang globs pa mtha' yas dang// lang dag lta ba dang na lhag mthong dang// shin tu 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur// snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa brgyad// 'di dag mthu chen gang
skyal yod pa na// re zhig byang chub 'thob par ma gyur kyang// de ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa bcu drug gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o// bcu drug gang zhe na/ rigs

kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di reg na 'jig tshogs la lta bas ngatsangs pa lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/ lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan

klu par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sa ma sa can 'di dag na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas/ ma rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/
sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'dushes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/ phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'i
[z ]snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa// dngos po med pa la dngos
bor 'du shes pa dag ste/ ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sAng rje chen po skye ba dang/
kye ma sems can 'di dgan sgrib pa ltas bsgrubs te/ 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa/ khong khro ba med de/ rmugs pa dang gnyid la chags pa/ dam pa ma yin pa la 'gyod pa kun nas langs
pa/ zab mo'i chos rnams la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/ sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnam la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje/
chen po skya ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni skye mched drug gi chags pas chags te/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas/ mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa yin rna
bas sgra thos/ snas dri bsnams/ lces ro myangs/ lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg/ yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas/ mtshan mar 'dzan tsang mngon rtags su 'dzan pa
dag yin te/ skye mched drug gis chags pa spang ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dang 'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang kye masems can/
'di dag ni nga rgyal dang/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang/ cung zad snyam
[D] pa'i nga rgyal dang/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pas/ chung du dag pas bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa// mtshungs pa dag pas ni cho/ che ba dag pas kyang bdag
ches che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa// gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ ma thob par bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/
lhabadag cag 'phags pa'o sAn du bdag la sems pa/ log par lta ba yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o/
snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kyemasems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa// 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/ lam ngan pa spang zhing

mo 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dgan srid pa'i khol po/
chung ma dang/ bu lo dang/ bu mo la yongs su zhen pas spags pa/ rang dbang med pas/ bdag la mi dbang ba dag ste/ rang dbang yod cing bdag la dbang bar bya ba dang/ gor dga'

00 ]bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye masems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi 'phrod pa khro ba dang/
zhe sdang dang/ gnod sems mang bdag ste/ khro ba dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gnod sems spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems
dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang kyi ma sems can 'di dag na sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/ dag
ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang/ sdig pa'i grogs la yangs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje/
chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag na brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ chog mi shes shing 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi gnas pa dang bral ba dag ste/ chags pa spang ba dang/
'phags pa'i shes rab skyed pa'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las kyi rnam
bar smin pa med par lta zhing/ rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas pa dag ste/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo dang/ las dang bya ba la gzur pa'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan pa ra
bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen ro skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang/ gti mug gis ldongs pa/ bdag
dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso bdang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag la mngon bar zhen pa dag ste 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ lta par
gyur pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen pa skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag na 'khar ba la
mngon par dga' ba/ phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/ khams gsum thams cad las dbyang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sam sa can rnams la byang chub
sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag na bdud kyi zhags pa'i 'ching bas btsangs pa g.yo ba dang/ rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/ bdud kyi zhags pas
bcings pa thams cad las rnam par dgrol ba dang/ g.yo ba dang/ rlom sems spang ba'i phyir/ de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
po skye ba dang/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad cing ngan 'gro'i sgo phye pa dag ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dbye ba dang/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcad pa'i phyir/

[a/]de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag gis sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i/
sA nga rje chen po skye'o// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma 'dres pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ de dag la brtsonan byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las
byed pa rnams yin no// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dag gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang/ bdag shes rab kyis ga da pa mthong nas/ shes rab kyis
sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las ma 'dres pa dang po'o// sa mas can dge chung du la mos pa dang/ bdag rgya chen po la mos par mthong nas//
theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sems can dag chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang/ bdag chos la gnas par na thong nas/ sam sa can rnams chos 'dod
ra la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang/ bdag 'tsho ba yongs su dag par mthong nas/ sems can rnams 'tsho ba yongs su dgar la sbyor ba dang/
sems can dag lta bar gyur par bying ba dang/ bdag yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs par ma thong nas/ sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can
dag ma rig par gyur cing// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bsags par mthong zhing bdag rag pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yad la byed pa la gnas par rig
'a nas/ sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang/ bdag yang dag par chos la zhugs
par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ sems can dag ser sna can du gyur te kun tu 'dzin pa 'i si mas dang ldan pa
lha dang Da bdag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la sbyor ba rang/ sems can dag ngang tshul ngan pa can du gyur te/
sngom pa la mi gnas pa dang/ bdag tshul khrims yongs su dag par mthong nas/ sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag gnod sems mang
zhing khro ba'ishas che ba dang/ bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang/ byams pa la gnas par ma thong nas sems can rnams bzod pa'i stobs dang/ byams pa 'i gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin
du 'jug pa dang/ sems can dag le lo can du gyur te/ brtson 'grus chung pa dang/ bdag le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas/ sems can rnams brtson
'grus rtsom pa la sbyor ba dang/ sems can dag sems g.yengs shing dran pa nyams pa dang/ bdag mnyam par bzhag ste/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas/
sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng ba dang/ dran pa dang shes bzhin la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dga shes rab 'chal par gyur te/ doman Tang gdi mug dang ldan pa
dang/ bdag shes rab dang lcan zhing gti mug dang bral bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang gti mug dang bral cha yang dag pa 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sems can
dag rigs pa ma yin par ltung zhing yang ba'i phyid pa brtsams pa dang/ padag thabs mkhas ba dang ldan zhing/ yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas/ sems can rnams
thabs mkhas pa yang dag pa'i las rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ba dang/ sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun tu rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ yongs su
rtog pa'i spyod yul par gyur pa dang/ bdag na mongs thams cad las log par mthong nas/ sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spong pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can
dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings shing dmigs pa rab tu gnas pa dang/ bdag 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang ldan zhing dmigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol
0@#// par mthong nas/ sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang/ dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang/ sems can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te/
byang ba ma yin pa dang/ bdag dul zhing spus te byang bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams dul ba dang/ sbasapa dang/ byang la la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag byas pa mi
gzo zhing byas pa mi shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang/ bdag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams byas pa
gzo ba dang/ byas ra shes pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chud ma gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag chu bor ltung zhing/ sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang/ bdag
chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'das par mthong nas// sems can rnams chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang/ sems can dag bka' blo mi bde zhing/ mthun
N+NaM par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang/ bdag bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin par mthong nas/ sems can rnams bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ba dang/
sems can dag po sa pa mang zhing dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang/ bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral
zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par sbyor ba dang/ sems can dag dbul zhing 'phags pa'i nor bu dang bral ba dang/ bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong
nas/ sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can n+tas rtag tu na zhing khams rnam pa bzhi po'i sprul gdug pas zin pa dang/ bdag nad mad cing
bde la 'gyur ba med par mthong nas/ sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sems can dag ma shes pa'i mun pas kun tu gtibasagang/ ma
shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang/ bdag ya shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas/ sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sa mas can dag khams gsum la
chags pas chags shing rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba'i 'khor le'i rjes su 'jug par mthong zhing/ bdag khams gsum yo ngas su shes pa la mkhas pa rashes nas/ sa mas can rnams khams gsum
lo ngas su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sems can dag ga len phyogs kyi lam du zhugs shing g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang/ bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la
gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag lus dang srog lachags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang/ bdag lus dang srog
#// la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas// sems can rnams lus dang srog la ma lta ba dang/ nyes ba mthong ba la rab tu 'god kha dang/ sems can
[O]/ dag sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang bral ba dang/ bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams dkon mchog
gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang/ sems can snagasadam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang/ bdag dam pa'i chos longs su 'dzin par gnas par mthong nas/ sems can rnams
dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang 'ang du gnas shing rjes su dran pa drug dang bral ba dang/ bdug rjes su dran ba drug ma btang bar
mthong nas/ sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang/ bdag las dang nyon mongs pa
dang bral bar mthong nas/ sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang/ sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing/ dge ba'i chos thams
cad spangs pa dang/ bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong nas/ sems can rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong pa dang/
/ dge pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a 'as sum cu rtsa ba nyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag
yul yin te/ de dag la gnas nias byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' lasan tshad med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo ji snyad bar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba yang de snyad do// rigs kyi du gal te gang dag

gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi thag pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi
las gang yin pa de/ soms dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong ga cha dang/ brgya stong gi cha dang/ bya ba'i cha dang/ bya ba
brgya phrag stong gi cha dang/ grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dgan
rang gi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dag na so mas can thams cad kyi nyon songs pa spong bar nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de lta na
sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas 'dir byang chub sems dpa' las 'di mchog ces brjod do

daci'i phyir zhe na// phyis ba so so'i spyi bo rnams kyi las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las ni nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin rgyu/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni
phyin ci log med cing tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non
de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal mo tshem zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de mtshan gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i
rgyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sAng rje chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' las legs par gsungs ba de dag ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shug
za rje chen po 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs rjechen po ni jitsam/ rnam pa na gang lags/ rtogs na gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas na gang lags/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'phrin las na ji ltar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las na ji tsam/ rnam pa na gang la ga sa/ rtogs na gang lags/ mtshan ma na
gang lags/ gnas nii gang lags/ de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas/
mngon sum du bdag la legs par yang dag par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad/
ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i 'phrin las la
'jug pa tsam cung zad cag khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi du sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rjechen po skye ba yang med/ 'jug pa yang med do zhes
brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro// de ni bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pas yang dag
par bskyed pa ste/ 'jug pa yang med/ lcog pa yang med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po na ma btang ba/ sems can tham
cad la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshags pa'i thugs rje chen bo de ji tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du tshad med/ de tsam du bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ de tsam
@# dum khrod tsang de tsam du ring du song ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gas kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ byung
chub tsa 'dra ba thugs rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob cen/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang/ gnas med par byang chub 'thob bo// de la
rtswa ba na gang gnas na gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// mang dgakha ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so// de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid
kyis mnyam par yongs su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang/ gnas mad par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// sems can
'di dag gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang/ gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub na zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o// de la zha pa ni gang/ nye bar zhi ba na gang zhe na/ nangan zhi pa'o// phyi na nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
mag na bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ den pa'i rang bzhin no// rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ dre nadi'i rang
bzhinano// mag stong par yongs su shes nas gzugs rnams la ma rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// rna ba stong par yongs su shesanas sgra rnams la ma rgyug ste/ de'i
phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sa stongarar yongs su shes nas/ dri rnams la mo rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// lce stong par yongs su shes nas/ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/
da 'i phyir nye bar zhib zhes bya'o// lus stong par longs su shes nas reg bya rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// yidi stong par yongs su shes nas chos rnams la ma
rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sems can 'di dag gis na zhi ba dang/ nyapar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gsheg
pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir byang chub rang bzhanegyi 'odogasal ba'o// ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhen/ rang bzhin
[rh]@#// gang yin pa de nakun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzhol ba/ nam mkha' dang mnya5
ba ste/ rang bzhin de shin tu 'od gsal ba nyid do// byis pa so so'i spyi bo rnams kyis ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba 'di khong du ma chud pas/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon
mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni chung ba mad pa dang dor
ba med pa'o// de la blang ba med pa ni gang/ dor ba med pa na gang zhen/ blang ba mad pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma 'dor
'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba med par chu bor 'jug pa na/ ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang/ la la med pa ma yin par yang dag par rjes su
mthong ba de ltar rgyal te// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad pha rol med pa dang/ pa rol dang bral bar mngon par rdzogs par sa sa rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshags pa
zhes bya'o// byas pa sos lta skya bo dag gsan blang ba med pa dang/ dor ba med pa 'di khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[ne ]thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni mtshan ma med pa dang/ dmigs pa medu ba'o// de la mtshan ma med pa na gang/ dmigs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes
pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba na dmigs pa med pa'o// na pa 'a rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa// sgra matan
du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes bdamag su med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// dribasnamadu med pa ni dmags pa med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs med bzhi mtshan ma
med pa'o// ro myang du med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// lus kyi rnam par bshes pa dmigs su med pa namtshan ma med pa'o// reg bya reg par byar med pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par
shes pa dmigs su med pa na mtshan ma med pa'o// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba na dmigs pa med pa'o// de ltar na mtshan ma med pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa ni 'phags pa rnams
kyi spyod yul lo// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ gang kham sa gsum pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul la// de ltar n gang spyod yul ma yin pa de ni
'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'bags pa'i spyod yul 'di phyis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin
@// gshegs pa 'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi tu byang chub na 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa//
'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jugs pa dang/ da ltar
khyung po la yid la byed pa ma 'jug pa'o// de sems dang yid dang rnam par shes na mi gnas pas 'das pa la rtog par mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa la mi sems/ da ltar byung ba spros par mi byed do//
de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems tsan rnams la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi du byang chub ni lus med cing 'dus ma byas pa'o// de la lus med pa ni gang mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam ra ra shes par du ro ma yin/ rna ba
dang Da sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'i bang kha skye ba med pa dang/ 'jig pa med/
pa dang/ gnas pa med pa ste/ de ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral ba'i 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de bzhin du khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir
0 zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de na med pa'o// mad pa gang yin pa de la ni gnyis med do// lus mar pa dang/ 'dus ma byas 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo dag gis khong du/
ma chud par/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam ru sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje che na ro 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de ni dbyer med pa dang gnas so//
de la gnas ni kang/ dbyer med pa ni gang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings na gnas so// thard pa ma yAn pa ni dbyar me da
pago/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so// g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// stong pa nyid ni gnas so// dmigs su mer pa na dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so//
rnam par rtog pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni gnas so// smon lam 'debs pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sems can madar nyid ni gnas so// sems can ngo bo nyid
med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// nam mkha' na gnas so// dmigs su med pa ni dbyar med pa'o// skyekha med pan gnas so// 'gog pa med pa ni dbyer med ba'o// 'dus ma byas na
gnas so// rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// byang chugana gnas so// nye bar zhi ban dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa na gnas so// mngon par grub pa med pa ni dbyar med pa'o//
de ltar dbyer med pa ni/ gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gsheg
pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi du byang chub ni lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ sems can gyis kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lus n bem
po'o/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu 'o// gang lus dang sems 'di lta bur khong du chud pa de ni tha snyad btags nas byang chub ces bya'i// byang chub na lus sam/ sems sam/ chos sam/
chos ma yin pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba na yonano// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ byang chub n chos tham/
cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin no// byang chub ni gang gis tshig tu tha snyad gdags par 'gyur ba'i dbyibs na ji'ang med de/ ji ltar nam mkha'i dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin pa re
! bzhin du byang chub kyang dbyibs med cing brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ltar yang rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su btsal na chos thams cad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ chos la tshig
med do// tshig la yang chos med do// chos kyi tshul gyi rnam ba 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni gzung du med pa dang/ gzhi med pa'o// de la gzung du me dban gang/ gzhi mad pa ni gang zhe na/ mig yongs su
shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// gzugs dmigs su med pa ni gzhi mad pa'o// rna ba yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// sgra dmigs su re da pa ni gzhi med pa'o// stsa yongs su shes
pa ni gzung du med pa 'o// dri dmigs su med pa ni gzhi mad pa'o// lce yongs su shes pa ni gzung du med pa'o// ro dmags su med pa ni gzhi mad pa 'o// lus yo ngas su shes pa ni
gzung du med pa'o// reg bya dmigs su med ba ni gzhi med pa'o// yid yongs su shes pa na gzung du med pa'o// chos dmags su med pa gzhi med pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gsheg
pas byang chub gzung du med pa dang/ gzhi med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mig gzung du med pa/ gzugs gzhi ma
yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do// rnab gzung du med/ sgra gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa mad do// sna gzung du med/ dri gzhi ma yin/ rnam par
shes pa gnas ba med do/ lce gzung du med/ rogazhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa mad do// lus gzung du med/ reg bya gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas
pa med do// yid gzung du mad/ chos gzhi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gnas ba med do// de rnam par shes pa gnas pa med pas sems can thams cad kyi
sems kyi gnas rnams rab tu shes so// sems can dag gisoms kyi gnas rnams gang zhen/ sems can rnams kyi sams kyi gnas na bzhi po 'di dag go/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
lta ste/ gzugs sems can rnams kyi sams kyi gnas dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dag sems can rnams kyi sams kyi gnas te/ sems kyi gnas de dag
kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnas med par mkhyen to// gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ces bya ba de stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa'i stong pa 'ar des chos thams
cad stong ngo// stong pa rjid ji lta ba de bzhin du chos de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas
