gang dag de dang 'gal bar byed pa de dag nyid rab tu thar par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang/ ji tsam gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang ji tsan du dbul bas 'khongs bar gyur
[n/]// kyang chos sbyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dwapa' rnams kyi mos pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur na bdag gi longs spyod kyis
na chog shes pa dang/ gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang/ rab tu byung na 'phags pa 'i rigs kyis tshog shes pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bskungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go
lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o// bzhi gang ba'i/ chos sbyin pa dang/ zang zing sbyin pa dang/ shog shog dang/ snag tsha dang/ smyug gu dang/ glegs bam sbyin/

pa dang/ chos smra ba las nan tan snying po nyid dang/ longs spyod pa zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong po nyid do/ 'di gang zhi
na/ thos pa la sanan tan snying po nyid dang/ longs spyod pa rnams las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang/ lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i srung po nyid dang/ srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyar
rgyu pa'i snying po nyid de/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// ba' gang zhin/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su gtang bar mi
bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gtong bar mi bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba yongs su gtang bar
ma bya ba ste/ rata lo de dag gi/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal la/ khazhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang/ dben pa la mngon par dga' ba
dang/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang/ thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med
khang ngo// bzhi gang zhen/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang/ 'khel ba'i gtam gyis chos nyan pa la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang/ stongal nyid la nges par se mas pa dang/ skye bo rigs mthun pa dar 'du
ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bkaM po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o// bzhi gang shAn/ thos pa'i nor dang/ chos ston pa'i nor dang sems can dbul po
sdud pa'i nor dang/ byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i nor te/ bzhi po de rag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs kyi gter dang/
spobs pa'i gter dang/ chos kyi gter dang/ longs spyod zad mi shes par yongs su spro ba'i gter te/ bzhi pa de dag go/ lhu'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las rnams kyi
mngon par 'byung bgo/ bzhi gang zhen 'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang/ yul thams cad las 'byung ba dang 'phags pa ma rig pa'i bsam pa las 'byung ba dang/ khams gsum thams
cad las 'byung ba ste// bzhi po de dag na mngon par 'byung// bzhi khro de dag na mngon par 'byung ba'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdu/
kha'o khazhi gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang/ yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ni
ba'i bde ba dang/ sems can mas cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga'
ba'o gzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga' ba dang/ tshes thos pas mchog tu dga' ba dang/ sbyin pa la 'gyod ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba dang/ sems can thams
cad la bde ba skyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'o// ba'i gang zhe na/ byung chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang/ ya ram
las ma nyams pa dang/ spyams su song ba dag yongs su mi gtod bdang/ ngag bsdams pas tshig zams cad bden kha ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
dge ba'i chos so// bzhi gang zhen/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang/ ma bslabs pa thams cad la mi brnyas pa dang/ gsol pa ma btab par sems can thams cad/
0 la bshes gnyenadugyur ba dang/ yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa la myur bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ge/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
rnam par dag pa'o// bzhi gang zhen/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang/ sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dgarwa dung/ srog med pa'i phyi shes rab rnam
par dag pa dang/ gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o// bzhi gang zhen/ chos

kyi rkang pa dang/ don gyi rkang pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dwang yakhyad bsnyungs pas 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pa'i rkang pa ste bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi
po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o// bzhi gang zhenA/ dad pa'i lag pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang/ thos pa'i lag pa dang/ shes rab kyi lag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
lha'i bu bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig go/ bzhi gang zhen/ las legs par byas pa'i phyir sha'i mig dang/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig
dang/ shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mag dang/ chos thams cad las nges par sems pa'i phyir chos kyi chog ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sa yoms pa'o// bge gang zhe na/ sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang/ dgon pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang/ chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang// byang chub gnas gnas
dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa ste// bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba
rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang/ dbul po la 'dog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bsam pa dka' ba byed pa rang/ yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i
ses mas dka' ba khyed kyi steng du/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang/ skye ba mi rtogs pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nadamed pa'o// khazho gang zhen/ khams mnyam pas nad med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang/ sems can thams cad bde bar mnyam
par gzhog pas nad med pa drang/ chos thams cad la the tshom med pas nad med pa lta/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi badrag gis phyogs so// bzhi gang
zhen/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa'i phyogasadang/ sdig pa'i thams cad ma bya ba'i phyogs dang/ bgaM
0 po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma bskyod pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sa mAs mi bskyod pa/ yi dam ma bskyod pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de
bzhin du byed pa las ma bskyod pa dang/ yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod kha ste// btapo de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dgan byung chub srims rala'a rnams kyi tshogs so// bzhi gang zhen/ zhi gnas
kyi tshogs dang/ lhag mthong gitshogs dang/ thos pa'i tshogs dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dragani byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung
'brel bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel ba dang/ gtong ba dang sngo ba zung du 'brel ba dang/ byams pa dang snying rje zung du 'brel ba dang/ thobs dang shes
rab zung du 'brel ba sta/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ khron pa rdul can mthong zhing/
da' gtang na'ang bla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang/ mtshe'u dang/ jing du 'am/ khron la rtog pa can mthong zhing de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong pa dang/ bar snang la sprin chen
pos yog cing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang/ bar snang la rlung dang/ rdul dang/dubs 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/ bzhi po re ragago/
lha'i khu ba zhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhen/ g.yang sa chen po nas bdug g.yang du lhung bar mkhodra ba
dang lam mtho dman can du mthong ba dang/ bdag lam srung rdog par zhugs par mthong ba dang/ rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/ bzhi bo de dag go/ lha'i bu
rgyu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhenA/ dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang/ gcan gzan gtum po pha la po
che'i sgra thos pa dang/ bdag ga yon can gyi nang na gnas par mthong ba dang/ bdag gi lus tram can dang/ gos dri ma can du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub/
sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba mthong ba dang/ rdzong du me tog pad+ma rgyas pas longs su gangs
mthong ba dang/ badrag gos dkar po'i thugasarnyed par mthong ba dang/ lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsu gnas gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi bo 'di dgan byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// khu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang/ nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po khal kar gyi khyu skar
'byin cing 'grokhar mthong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog par mthong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegags pa me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad/
par mthong ba ste/ bzhi'i dedag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dgan sbyong nub sems dpa' rnams kyi dar gnagshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rna lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char

bar mthong ba dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang/ me tog pad+ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam ma thong pa ste/ lha'i bu ba po de dgan byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// lha'i bu bzhi lo 'di dganabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi
gang zhen/ shing sA la chen po'i 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang/ 'khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong bdung/ nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ bar n gyis gang bar mthong ba dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud
'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam go/ bzhi gang zhen/ gyad chen pos khyad thams cad manananas ]ba dan thegs te 'gro bar mthong ba dang/ dpa' bo chen po g.yul las 'das te 'gro ba mthong
kha dang/ rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong 'dang/ bdag ra khyang chub kyi spung lo la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba ste// bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyum thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhen/ mgro la thod dkar khos btsungs par mthong ba dang/ bdag gtan ba med pa'i mchod sbyi'i
byed las mthong bdwang/ bdag chos kyi snyan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu
bzhi bo 'di dgan byung chub sems dba' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying bo thobala'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmilam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ bum pa mthong bdung/ byatsashas bskor bar mthong ba dang/ gang dang

ts+tso gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid dus gang thams cad dang ldan zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bor byed pa dang/ gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen po mthong ba ste/ lha'i shu bzhi bo 'di dganabyang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhi ba sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan/ lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan dga' mgu
yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' khong dga' ba dang yid bdel skyes nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog mnar ba dag dang/ ut+pal dang/

pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dag gis bloms cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor ro// me tog de dag gtor ma thog tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ltang ga bar snang la me tog pad+ma/

shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi tshad bstan sdugal/ bsung dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to// me tog de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa' lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di
dag gang nas lhags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i ru me tog 'di dag ga las 'ongs pa nyid nas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste// bdag gis khyod la/
mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i smad gtor to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du blta'o/

denas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe'adzum pha mdzod pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshog
kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar pa dang/ le brgan dang/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo// de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ steng du tshangs ba'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas slar
log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar sa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa// gser bzang dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid
ldan 2skyes chen mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'// yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal yas gzi brjid can// mgon po ru lo smad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad// sgra snyan 'byin
bar mdzad cing rab tu bo/sung 'brel ba// tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshogs gsungs// nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros ldan// ka la 'da'i gsung a ni slar
'dzum la gsungs// ma mchog skyes bu dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can btul// bdud kyi stobasan rtag par mtha' mar 'byin par mdzad/ lce dang lha minam mkha' lding gis rtag mchod pa// stobs

bcu ldan pas tsa mi smad du 'a dzum pa bstan// dri med dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa// zla ba nya ca'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zhal rgyas la// mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i dul gyi nyes gcod nga// bde dang bde
ldan sbyin bar mdzad pa'i dzul don gsungs// bde bar gshegs pas dang lha lha yul phan pa mchog/ bde dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa// mtshungs shing 'brel la legs gsungs
gsal ba'i gsung ldan ga 'dzul bstan 'di la donan ji ltar rtogs par bgyi// lang tog skyugapo mun pa rab rib rnams bsal ba// shes rab sgron ma 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan pa'o/ glang chen
khyu mchog skyabs dang seng ge 'i stangs ltar ba rjid 'gro ba'i// den 'dzum dam pa'i don bstan du gsog mi yi dam pa mya ngan tshogs chen 'dul mdzad pa// zab cing mthong bar dka' la gting
tshod dpag dka'ar// srid pa'i tshuni skams mdzad mnyam pa med pa can// rgyu med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci smad bstan// rga shi'i bar brgyab bdud rtsi'i don stsol ba// zhabs ni
'jam zhing dra ba dag dang 'khor lo ldan// rgyun pa sbyong mdzad srid pa gsum na mnyam med pa/ yi shes chen po mnga' bas 'dzum don bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ com ldan
'dus kyis ]lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng ge 'i khri pad+ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon/
nur gyur pa'i chung du chos mnyan pa dang/ bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lhags so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin

te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ming sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bus
gso la la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgan grwas rtogs par rngo ma thogs na ji snyad tsagan mtshos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
du la bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dirag gi gras rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
zla 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni skad cig thang cig yud tsam cigagacig gis bgrang bar spro'o/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dar 'a 'di dag
lo brgyar yang bgrang bar spro ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang rdul za rab de
00 dag bgrang ba'i tshur gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ tsong chub sems dpa' 'di dag nibagrang ba'i tshul gyis mthar rtogs par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag de tsam du tshad med
do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'dri dag gang du byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu kha rog 'dug de skad ma smra zhig/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gaMng tshad med padag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo// hA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa ba zungan gal te

de bzhin gshegs pa'i tsho'i srid bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ zhwa mare ra thams cad la'ang chos bshad pa gang+gA'i klung gi ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing/ chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang

byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par gyur la gang gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byim snyed 'dasan byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar gzhag kyang
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams re razhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal pas gzigs par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag ga sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis stong pa lta ci smos/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dgade ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che ba/ de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ bdag cag
gis rnyedapa legs par rnyed de zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa stong gi bar snangal 'khod pa de dag bar snang de las babs nas/
bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan/
gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi byang la yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos las brtsams te thogs par mdzod cig/ 'a rngam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i 'kha ra chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs
su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o// sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su skul ba dang/ tshod la skul ba dang/ ran par skul ba dang/ dbang po la skul
ba dang/ brtan par skul ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa la skul ba dang/ thabs la skul ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba ring/ byams pa chen po la skul ba dang/ snying rje chen po la/
03 skul ba dang/ theg pa chen po la skul ba dang/ theg pa dman pa la skul ba dang/ bden pa la skul ba dang/ de bya ba la skul ba dang/ chos la srung bar skul ba dang/ zos pa bstan par bskul
ba dang/ sems can sna tshogs su mi 'bya bar skul ba dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dwang tshulakhrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang/ bdud kyi las bstan bar skul
ba dang/ dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang 'khor las yongs su mi skyo bar skul ba dang/ bdud 'dul bar skul ba dang/ byas pa shes pa dang/ byas pa gzo bar skul 'o
dang/ rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi'i rdzogs par skul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya bar skul ba dang/ sems can thams
cad la ji lta bya snyam pa la spro bar skul ba dang 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par stsol ba dang/ dgon pa la dga' bar skul ba dang/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes par skul ba dang/
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ma grol ba dgrol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzo bar skul ba dang/ dkona mchog gsum gyi

gdung ma 'chad par skul ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa blang bar skul ba ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos n sum
ru rtsa lnga po de dag go/ lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byas pan rla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la skyon du med pa yin te/ de na phas kyi rgol ba/
thams cad kyis thul bar mi nus so// den khyonachad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i drigs pa bcus dregs par mi 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang/ thos pas dregs pa dang/
spobs pas dregs pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad s dregs pa dang/ dgon par gnas pas dregs kha dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bskyungs pas dregs pa dang/
gzugs dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ ga log 'khor gyis dregs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyor ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang/ bsam gtan/
dwang mngon bshes pas dregs pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la dad pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang
rgyu mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bsngags par byed pa des kyang bsnyems pa med pa yin te/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'idrigs pa bcu po de dag gis mi
snyams/ rab tu mi snyams so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpa la bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod phyogs gang na gnas pa dang/ chos

[4 ]kyi rnam grangs de gangan spyod pa der ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ba lta'o// de nan chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de de bzhin no// lha'i bu de de bzhin te/
ji skad smras pa bzhin// phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa den stong pa ma yin par mngon// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos
kyi bdag po nyid brtson par mdzad do// gangan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni da' yin par 'gyur ro/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang/
mos pa'i sa mas can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal/
pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ bshad pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyed la gtad do// ran ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan
las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par gyis shig/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
[s/ ]@#// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang cilags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzhi pa bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/
lha ma yin dang/ dra zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags par kha bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mde rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a kAlpa pra be ga nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ com ldan 'dasargyal bo'i 'ban/ khams gsum pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa
rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshes kyi dbyings kyi snying po' khang bzangasan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen podang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ bya/
[c/]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa dang/ rnam par mi rtog snang ba dang/ rnam par mi rtog zla ba dang/ rnam par rtog med dpa' bo dang/ rnam par rtog med chos ston mkhas
dang/ rnam par rtog med ngo bo nyid dang/ rnam par rtog med blo gros dang/ rnam par rtog med nga ro dang/ rnam par rtog med khyab byed dang/ rnam par rtog med dbang phyug dang/ rnam
par rtog med dbang phyug chen po dang/ rnam par rtog med byams pa chen po'i dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang phabasagacig go
donas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su khaskor to/ mdun gyis bltasanas/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la chos rnam par mi rtog pa nyidalas brtsams te/
ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed
kyis rnam par ma rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zung zhig/ de bzung na byang chub sems dpa' myur ba myur bar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub cing/ rtag tu khyad par du'ang 'gro'o// de nas
'khor de nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog snang ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ lus tsho ga las pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
'i/ @#// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
gang thos nas 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la brgyud pa dang gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston par 'gyurapar/ rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs bshad do/
bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyanar dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to rigs kyi bu dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbang du bya ba'i chos thos te/ rnam par mi rtog pa la bsam re bzhags nas/ rnam par rtog pa'i
zla mtshan ma thams cad yongs su sgong ste/ de thog ma nyid du 'di lta ste/ gzung ba 'am/ 'dzin pa'i ng rung/ rang bzhin la rnam par rtog pa'i 'tshan ma thams cad yongs su spong ngo// de la
gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po'i mtshan ma denarang bshen la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma'o// zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos bon bar len pa'i khung po lnga rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po dang/ rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po'i
ji ltar rang bzhin la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma de dag longs su spong zhe na/ snang bar 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mngon du 'gyur ba dag yid la ma byed pas yo sa su slong ngo// derang bzhin la rnam par
rtog pa'i mtshan ma de dag rim gyis yongs su slong ban de ma yin pa gzhan gnyen po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams snang bar 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis kun tu 'byung zhing mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di lta
ste/ sbyin pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ tshul khrims la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ bzod pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ brtson 'grus
la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ bsam gtum la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ shes rab la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ste/ 'di lta ste/ ngo ba nyidi la
dpyod pa 'am/ yon tan la spyod pa 'am/ snying po la spyod pa'i ng rung/ des de dag kyang yod la mi byed pas yongs su spong ngo// des de dag yongs su spong ba na/ gzhan de lon la dpyod
pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams snang bar 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis kun tu 'byung zhing mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ de bzhin
nyid la dpyodab rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa 'amtshan ma dang (mtshan ma med pa dang/ don dam pa dang/ chos kyi
dbyings la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ste/ 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid la dpyod kha 'am/ yon tan la dpyod pa 'am/ snying bo la dpyod pa 'ang rung/ des de kho na la dpyod pa rnam par
rtog pa'i mtshan ma de dag kyang yid la mi byed pas yongs su spong ngo// des de dag longs su spong ban/ gzhan 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams snang bar 'gyur ba'atshul
rgyas kun tu 'byung zhing mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang po 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma nas/ sa bcu pa'ilar du 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma
dang/ mi skya pa ni chos la bzod pa 'thob pa la dpyod ba rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ lung bstan pa 'thob pa la dpyod la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs dag pa
'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang/ dbang bskur ba 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par
rtog pa'i mtshan ma nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa'i bar la dpyod pa rnam rar rtog pa'i mtshan ma ste/ 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid la dpyod pa 'am/ yon tan la dpyod
[o]]ba 'am/ snying po la spyod pa 'ong rung/ des 'thob pa la dpyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma de dag kyang yid la mi byed pas yongs du spang ngo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad yid la mi byed pas yongs su spong bas na/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs la na ma reg mod kyi/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la shin tu brtson
pa yin te/ re zhig rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings lan ma reg mod kyi/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs la reg par 'gyur ka'i tshul bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin med do// de yang dag par sbyor
ba de dang bstan pas rjes su 'gro/ sgom pas rjes su 'gro mang du bya bas rjes su 'gro/ yang dag par yid la bya bas rjes su 'gro bas na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med cing/ lhun gyis grub
pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la reg ste rim gyis yongs su sbyong ngo// ci'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs la rnam par ma rtog pa zhes bya zhe na dpyad pa'i rnam par brtag pa thams cad las
ban tu 'das pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ dper rnam par brtag pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ dbang por rnam par brtag pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ yul du rnam par
khartag pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ rnam par rig par rnam par brtag pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnas
[r/]@#// med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya'o// rnam par mi rtog pa de 'ang gang zhe na/ rnam par mi rtog pa na gzugs med pa//
bstan du med pa/ rten med ra/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa gnas med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas
pas ni/ shes bya dang khyad par med par rnamapar mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong ngo// rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes pas ni/
chos thams cad sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ rmi lamadang/ mig yor drang/ brag cha dang/ gzugs brnyanadang/ chu zla dang/ sprul pa dang mtshungs par mthong ngo// bde ba chen po
la gnas pa shin tu rgyas pa'i ng 'thob pa// sems phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i ng 'thob bo// shes rab dang/ ye shes che zhingayagar tu rgyas pa'i ng 'thob bo// bshad pa chen re
la dbang ba shin tu rgyas pa'i ng 'thob bo// dus thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi don gyi rnam pa thams cad kyang byed nus par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa bung
rgyun ma gcod do// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ dpan brag gcig tu mkhregasapaging sra ba'i 'ogan yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs 'od gsal ba 'di lta ste/ dngul rin po che
dang/ gser rin po che dang/ rje 'a snying po rin po che tha dad pas yongs su gang ba'i gter chen po zhug yod la/ de nas gter chen po 'ded pa'i ma la la zhig 'ongs pa de la/ gter chen po mngon
par shes pa'i mis 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu khrag gcig tu mkhregs shing sru ba de'i 'ogan rin po che 'od gsal bas yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i gter chen po yod de/ de'i 'og na yid bzhin gyi
nor bu rin po che'i gter yod kyi/ khyod kyis thog ma kho nar rdo'irang bzhin thams cad rkosashig/ dbarkos dang/ dngul du snang ba'i rdo khyod la snang bar 'gyur te/ de la khyod kyis gter chen por
'du shes mi bya'i/ de yongs su shes par byas te gos shig/ de bskos dang/ gsar du snang ra'i rdo snang bar 'gyur te/ de la'ang khyod kyis gter chen par 'du shes ma bya'i/ de 'ang yongs
su shes par byas te rkos shig/ de bskos dang rin po che sna tshogs su snang ba'i rdo snang bar 'gyur te/ de la'ang khyod kyis gter chen por 'dushes ma bya'i/ de'ang yongs su shes par byos
terkos shig/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis de ltar brtson par byas na/ brko ba'i mngon par 'du bya ba med cing 'bad ma dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter chen bo mthong bar 'gyur ro//
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter chen po de rnyed na/ khyod phyugatsangano che la/ lengs spyod che bar 'gyur te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mthu yod par 'gyur ro/ zhes smra ba ltar rigs kyi bu/
dag ji tsam du don 'di shes par bya ba 'a phyir 'di dper byas te/ brag gcig tu mkhregs shing sra ba zhes bya ba de na 'du byed kyi rnam pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang gnyis la so sor

lta bar gnas pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'og na yid bazhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter chen po zhes bya ba de na rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings kyi tshig zla dgasaso// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter
wA chen po 'dod pa'i sa zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig bla dgas so// gter chen po mngon par shes pa'i ma zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas so// brag ces bya bden rang bzhin la rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnam sa kyi tshig bla dgas so// rkos shig ces bya ba de yid la ma byed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// dngul du

snang ba'i rdo zhes bya ba de na gnyen po la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// gser du snang ba'i rdo zhes bya ba de na stong pa nyid la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyi tshig bla

dogs so// rin po che sna tshogs su snang ba'i rdo zhes bya ba de na 'thob pa la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter chen po red ces bya ba de rnam par

ma rtog pa'i dbyings la reg kha'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar dpe nye bar bkod pa 'dis rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar na yang byang chub
tsha0 sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ji ltar bstan la de dag la nye bar rtog cing/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings su 'jug cen/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs su rab tu gnas pa ni/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma mngon du gyur// 'di ltar nye bar rtog ste/ gang bdag gi gzugs zhes

spyodan rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa go/ gzhan dag gis gzugs zhes spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// gzugs 'di la da do zhes spro dan rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o gzugs skya'o// 'gog go/ kun/
nas nyon mongs pa'o/ rnam par byang pa'o zhes spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa// gzugs med ces spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// gzugs ngo lod kyis kyang med/ rgyur yang med/
'bras bur mad/ las su'ang mad/ ldan bar lang med/ 'jug par yang med ces spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// gzugs la rnam par rig pa tsam zhes sbyor na/ rnam par rtog pa la sbyong
pa'o/ ji ltar gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par 'ag pa'i ng med de shes spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa'i ng mi dmigs mod kyi/ rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chud gzon pa na ma min no// rnam par rig pa la ma
gtogs par chos gang yang dmags la/ rnam par rig pa de rang dngos po med par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ rnam par rig pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pas yang yang
dag par rjes sum mthong/ gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rigapa med pa de dang/ rnam par rig pa de dag gcig par yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ tha dad par yang yang dag bar rjes su mi mthong

sh+tsa rnam par rig pa dngos po med pa de la dngos por yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ dngos po med par yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rigasakyi bu dag rnam pa thams cad pa'i rnam par rtog pa

thams cad kyis/ gang rnam par ma brtags pa de rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings so zhes kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa'i tshul na
te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes radang/
de bzhin du sbyin pa'il la tu phyin pa drang/ tshul khrims kyi la rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag 'di la byang chub sems
[s]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mngon du gyur na/ 'di ltar nye bar rtog ste/ gang bdag gu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces spyodan/ de
rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// gzhan dag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces sbyor na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid 'di'o zhes spyod rnam par rtog pa la spyod

pa'o// rnamar thamasu mkhyen pa nyid 'thob cis spyod na rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad sbyong ba'i nyes spyodan rnam par rtog

pa la sbyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid napa shin tu rnam par byung ba'o zhes spyodan/ rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do zhes spyodan/ rnam par rtog pa la sbyor
pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid kyis kyang med/ rgyur yang med/ 'bras bur yang med/ las su'ang med/ ldan par yang med/ 'jug par yang med do zhes spyod na/

rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par rig pa tsam mo zhes sbyod na/ rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o// ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba'i rnam par rig kha lang med dozhes sbyong n/ rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar rnam pa thams
dmkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ der snang ba rnam par rig pa'i ng mi dmigs mod kyi/ rnam par rig pa shAms cad kyi thams cad du chud gzon pa ni ma yin no// rnamar ra
rig ra ma gtogs par chos gang yang mi dmigs la/ rnam par rig pa de 'ang dngos po med par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ rnam par rig pa ma gtogs par dngos po med pa'i ng yang dag par rjes su

rgyu mi mthong/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba'i rnam par rig pa med bde dang/ rnam par rig ba de gtsag par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes mi mthong/

rnam par rig pa dngos po med pa de la dngos por yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ dngos po med par yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong aste/ rigs kyi bu dag rnam pa thams cad pa'i rnam par rtog pa tham

cad kyis/ gang rnam pa ma brtags pa de/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings so zhes yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de ltar 'di'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyangs la 'jug pa'i tshul yin te/ gas kyi

sku bu dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ 'chang

ba dang/ klog pa'i bsod nams rab tu mang gi/ lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su btang banadi lta ma yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byin pa na de

lta ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che las byas te/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su bkang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no// de nas de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dam chos 'di la rgyal ba'i sras// rnam par mi rtog bsam gyur nas// rnam rtog bgrodadaka' rnams 'das te/ rim gyis mi rtog thob
par 'gyur// de las rab zhi mi g.yo mchog dbang byed mnyam la mi mnyamar// rnam par mi rtog bde ban// byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dar
ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog snang ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za ra bcas pa'i 'jig rten yar ngas te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rnam par mi rtog par 'jug pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/
Ar+ya ba ma la kAr tanor de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'gado/ sangs rgyas drang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/
'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang/ da ltar gyi dang/ ma byon la thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das langs pa'i grong
khyer na a mra srung ba'atshalan dge slong brgyad stong gi dege slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu la zhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med//
pa dbang dang ldan pa gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol la/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cangashes pa/ glang po chen po/ byar byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor la/ bdag gi
wA don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dgapa'ishes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i ba rol tu son pa sha stag go/ byang
chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ste/ mngon par shes pa mngon pa shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sgyu ngas ba las nges

bar byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi khyon gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi grong khyer bsrung// dam pa'i chos longs su'adzin pa/ seng ge 'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ phyogs bcur sgrashin tu grags ba/
shA gsol kha ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dgeba'i bshes gnyen du gyur// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par byed l/ bdur deng phyi la ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad/
kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ sgrub pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang
khral ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas la/ spobs la rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ ma'agyur ba dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang//
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ smon lam dang/ stobs dang/ ye shes kyi kha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/ mi dmigs pa dang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
ba dang ldan la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ sems can khos cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'khor thams cad kyis zil gyis man
pa'i mi 'jigs pas rnam par gnon pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus legs par brgyanakho/ gzugs dam pa 'dzin la/

rgyun dang bral ba/ ri rab kyi rtse mo mtho ba bzhin du snyan ba dang grags pa mngon par 'phags la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar thukhas sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mi phyad pa'i dad pa rnyed
pa/ chos rin po che'i 'od zer las bdud rtsi'i charan tu 'bebs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi skad zla ba dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ sla rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa (chos zab mo
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jugacing/ mtha' dang mtha' med par lta ba'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcod pa/ soge ltar 'jigs pa med cing sgra mngon par sgrogs pa/ chos chen po'i
ku 'a brug sgra sgrogs pa/ mtshungs pa dang/ mi mtshungs pa'i chos las mang dag par 'dus pa/ chos rin po che 'a shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mang dag par bsgrub pa'i ded/
dbon chen po/ drang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ phra ba dang/ mthong bar dka' bdang/ rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'ong ba dang/ 'gro kha dang/ sems can gyi bsam re rgyu ba'i rjes
su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa la nye bar gyur pa/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang/ ngan 'gro log par lhung ba'i 'jigs pa'i las thams cad las rgal bas/ bsam bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba ston ra/ sman pa'i/
rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ sems can thamasaMcad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam par rtog pa/ ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyar bar ba tu sbyor ba/ yon tan mkha' nas
sgo ba'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/ sas rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ mthong ba dang thos pa 'bras bu yod la/ gom pa do'od 'bras bu yod pa/ bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yon tan yongs su brjod kyang/ yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas ra sha ga la ka da lta ste/ byang chub sems dba' mnyam par lta zhes bya ba dang/ mnyam mi mnyam lta

[c]dang Na ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ chos kyi tog dang/ 'od kyi tog dang/ 'od bkod pa dang/ rin po che bkod pa dang/ bkod pa chen po dang// spobs pa brtsigs

pa dang/ na lo pa rtsegs pa dpaM/ lag na rin po che dang/ phyag na phyag rgya rin po che dang/ rtag tu lag brkyang dang/ rtag tu lag ba teg dang/ rtag tu gdung dang/ rtag tu dga' dgor dbang po dang/ mchog
tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang/ lha'i rgyal po dang/ smon lam la zhugs las phyin pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu bsgrags pa thob pa dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ rin chen sgron ma 'dzin dang/
gachen dpa' dang/ rin chen dga' dang/ rin chen dpal dang/ mig 'phrul can dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od dang/ dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang/ shes rab brtsegs dang/ rin chen gtong dang/
bdud 'dzoms dang/ glog gi lha dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang/ mtshan brtsegs yang dag 'das dang/ seng ge 'i nga ro mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang/ ri'i rtse mo kun tu 'dzem pa'i rgyal/

po dang/ smos kyi glang po che dang/ smos kyi bal glang po che dang/ rtag tu 'bad rang/ brtson pa ma 'dor dang/ rab kyi blo gros dang/ mdzes par skyes dang/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang/ pad+ma bkod dang/ spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob dang/ tshangs pa'i dra ba can dang/ rin chen mdan dkar can dang/ bdud las rgyal dang/ zhing snyoms brgyan dang/ nor bu rin chen gdugs dang/ gtsug na
ku/ gser dang/ gtsug na nor bu dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ngo// gling chen kho bzhi pa'i
'jig rtenagyi khams mya ngan med pa nas/ tshangs pa ral pacan 'asogs pa'i tshangs pa khri bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa

de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so// glingachen po bzhi pa'i so sos kyang brgya byin khra'os stong lhags te/ de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so// de bzhin du gzhan yang dbang che' dbang che bar grag
pa'i tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ 'jig rtan skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po
rnams kyang 'khor du nyid 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bson dang/ dge bsnyen A rnams kyang der lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
lci dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs te/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs subaskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas tshes ston to// rgya mtsho'i nanas ri'i rgyal por rab mngon par 'phags pa ba/
du 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ lhamam/ lhan me/ lhang ngor dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs so/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lo tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas/

la tsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ a ma srung ba'i tshal ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba rdor song/
sa lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas/ rin po che'i gdugs ji lta bu thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan/
'dus la mngon par bkal lta/ mngon par bkab nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// napo che'i gdugs de dag phul ma thag tu/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mkhrus rin po che'i gdugs de dag/

gcig tu gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen por 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri thams cad rebs par snang ngo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'a 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu zheng de dag kyang/
rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo// stong gsum gyi stongachen po 'a'ajig rten gyi khams 'din/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa rnams dang/ gangs kyi ri dang ra btang/
bzung dang/ btang bzung chen po dang/ spos kyi ngad ldong dang/ rin po che'i ra dang/ ri nag po dang/ khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po dang/ de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs
chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo// stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgya mtsho chen po gang dag yod pa rnams dong/mtshodang/ mtshe'u dang/ rdzing dang/ 'bab chu
dang/ chu rngan dang/ lu ma 'bab pa de dag thams cad kyang/ rin po rje'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang du skyung ngo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
nA nyi ma dang/ zla ba'i gzhal med 'ang dang/ skar ma'i gzugs dang/ lha'i gnas dang/ klu'i gnas dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma lan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'a na
ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'a gnas rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i gnas dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ lul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag thams

cad kyang/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyis chos ston pa gang 'byung ba de'ang rin po che'i gdugs chen
po gcig po de las 'byung ba'i sgra grag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur to/ tshim zhing mgu nas/ yi
rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod do/ de nas lo tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'khyud
gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas/ pus mos g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga lakha de logs su thal mo sbyar btudanas/ bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gtsang zhing mdzes pa pad+ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa'i sbyin// dgongs pa dag cing rigs gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes// dag pa'i
las bsags yon tan rgya chen dpag mi lang/ dge sbyong zhi bu'u lam 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa'i rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing mchog
rab gsal kun kyang gda'// khyod kyi chos kyi bka' mchid rgya chen 'chi med 'gro// de dag thams cad nam mkha' 'di la dkyil na gda'// khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal srid mchog 'di chos
kyi rgyal// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi nor yang sprul// chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa// chos kyi dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/
mchis pa ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma lags dang// chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas byung ba dang/ 'di la bdag med tshor ba po dang byed med cing// dge sdig las ci'i nga chud mi za nyes

gsung gis ston// thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas// byang chub mchog rab zhi ba mi 'chi bde ba brnyes// del tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba mad// mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun
kyis de mi rtogs// rmad byung chos kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du// lan gsum bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam mang po// shin tu zhi pa rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor// de tshe dkon mchog gsum po
dag kyang nye bar bstan// khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyis legs par gang btul ba// de dag rtog pa ma mchis rtag tu rab tu zhi// khyod skye rga na 'chi la thar pa'i sman pa'i
khaste stang legs par bgyis pas mi skyod rirab bzhin// tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrims 'chal la mtshungs pa byams
mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing thugs kyang nam mkha' bzhin// sems can dkon mchog 'di las su zhig mchod mi bgyid// thub pa chen po 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ni// khyod kyi kha la
du rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis lta// thams cad kyis kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdunan mthong// den rgyal ba'am 'dus sangs rgyas mtshan lags go khacom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig
rab tubyung ba yang// 'khor rnams kyis gsung la tha dada rnam par rig/ 'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa// de na sgyur ba'i ma 'dris gangs rgyas mtshan lags so// gsung
gcig rab tu bsgrags la mdzad pa de gi/ kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtog par bgyis// som nyi'atshal ba 'dren la rab tu zhi mdzad de// de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas
mtshan lags so// stobs bcu 'dren pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal go/ 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshol lo/ ma 'dres pa yi tshosa rnams nges par rab rtog
pa3 'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu sbyor ba'i bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyi nas skam la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// dub pa'i 'gro ba sgrol/
ba khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'khor ba'i 'gro bar mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams dang 'gro bar zhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang// 'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol
ba'i shugs// pad+ma dag ni chu skyes tshu las yong ma gos// thub pa'i rangs stong pa nyid ni nges par bsgom// mtshan ma thams can rnam pa kun tu rab tu bsal// khyod ci la 'ang smon par/
mdzad pa yong mi mnga'// sangs rgyas dag gi mthu chen bsam gyis mi khyab ste// nam mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la latsa byi gzhon nu dkon
mchog 'byung gnas kyis/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par kha stod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la tsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po ba de dag thams

cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dwapa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yo sa su dag pa gang lags zhes sangs rgyas kyi
shing yongs su dag pa kun/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/
@#/// khacom ldan 'das kyis la tsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// gzhon nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag pa las brtsams te de bshan gshegs pa lagrib legs so// de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu skyon la rid la zung shig dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing lotsA/
su dag pa las brtsams te ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ la tsakyi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ latsa byi gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom
ldan 'dus kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can gyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo// de ci'i phyir na/
byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam dusems ca rnams la rgyas bar byed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yos su 'dzin to// sems can rnams ji lta bu s 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su 'dzin te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bu s sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi yashes la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kyi

zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bu s sems can rnams 'phags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dar rdo rnams

tsa kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro// dkon na chog 'byung gnas 'di lta ste// dper na nam mkha' la ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de bzhin du byed mod kyi/nam mkha khra la na/
byar mi rung zhing brgyun du'ang mi rung ba de bzhin du/ de kon mchog 'byung gnas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shesanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir

sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi skong byed mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha' na byar mi rung zhing brgyan du ma rung ngo// dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'on kyang bsam

pa'i zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta/ debyang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gams can g.yo med pa dang/ sgyu med ba rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam

pa'i zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dudage ba'i rtsa ba dang/ tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i
zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dpa'i sems bskyed pa rgya chen pon sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro//
ka/ sbyin pa'i zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub blob ra'i gsargyas kyi zhing dera'adog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams skye bar/

ban 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bsam pa thams cad dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yong

ny+tsasu bsrungapa'i so mas can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
brgyan cing/ bzod pa dang/ dul ba dang/ zhi gnas dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi gon byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/
dbyang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i tshos thams cad l brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/ khasam gtan gyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems can rnam skyekhar 'khyura'o/ shes rab kyi byang chub sems dpa sangs

rgyas kyi zhing// de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der la nga dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bag rnams n byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
[z]ste rnga de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byams pa dang/ snying rje dang dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms la gnas pa sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams /
byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi yong ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnam par grol ba thams cad kyis lo ngas su zin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// thabs lamakhas

ba ni byang chub sa mas dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi shing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ thabs dang dpyod pa thams cud la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur go/ byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi gong ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi lan lag dang/ lam bsgrubs pa shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bsngo ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa na u0f7a/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing ma 'om pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas shing pha rol gyi
ltung bam gleng ban byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ltung ba'i sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur go// dge ba bcu'i las

kyi lam yongs su dag pan/ byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi gong ste/ de byang chub thob ra'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshe nges pa dang/ longs spyod che ba dang/ tshangs bar spyod pa dang/ bden pa'i rjes/
su 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa dang/ ngag 'jam pa dang/ 'khor mi phyed pa dang/ bye ba sdum pa la mkhas pa dang/ phrag dog dang bral ba dang/ gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang/ yang dag

zhi par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed la ci 'dra bar bsam pa'i ng de 'dra'o/ khasam pa ci 'dra bar sbyor ba
yang de 'dra'o// sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa'i ng de snyed do// lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed bar nges par sems pa yang de snyed do// sa par sems pa ji snyed par sgrub pa'i ng de snyed do//

zhe sgrub pa ji snyed par yongs su bsngo ba'ang de snyadago yongs su bsngob ji snyad par thabs rnams kyang de snyad do// thabs rnams ji snyed par khu'e yo ngas su dag pa'i ng de snyed de/ shing yongs su dag la
dzi lta ba bzhin dus mas can yongs su dag pa'i ng de bzhin no// sems can yo rAsu dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ye shes yongs su dag la'ang de btu// ye shes yongs su dag pa ji ltar bzhin du/ bstan

pa longs su dag pa'i ng de bzhinano// bstan pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ ye shes bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'i ng de bzhin no// ye shes bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sems yongs/
su dag pa'i ng de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 'dod pas/ rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o// de ci'i phyir ten

ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag ra de 'dra bar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyimathus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du se mas te/ gal
te ji ltakhur sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems
yongs su ma dag gam can sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag par snang snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu'i gi mas kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs
kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma drag gam cin/ dmus long dag gis mi mthong/
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ltam lags so// de ni dmus long gis nongs kyi/ nyi ma dang zla bas mnongs so// khaka' stsal pa// hasA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin gshegs
[z ]/ pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa ma mthong ba de ni/ sems can rnams kyis ma shes bas nyes kyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs khas nyes pa ni ma yin no/
na ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na longs su dag mod kyi/ khyod kyis de ma mthong ngo// de nas tshangs kha ral pa can gyis/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/
btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shing yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste/ dpar
na btsun pa bzhi'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyizhing gi bkod pa'i ng kho bos de dang 'dra bar mthong ngo// de
zlo sa gnas brtan shApa'idus/ tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'dis bo dman dang/ tsher ma dang/ gal nga sa dang/ 'a rtsa mo dang/ ma
sku grog dung/ mdzan ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo// tshangs pa la lo can gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong banaM/ btsun pa shar 'i
bu'i sams la mtho dman yod cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so// gang dag btsun pa shAri'i bu sems can thams cad la sems mnyam zhing sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par ma thong ngo// des bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/

khams 'di la zhabs kyi mthe chos bsnan pa dang/ bsan ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin kho che du ma 'artsegs pa dang/ rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dang/ rin po che brgya stong du ma so so bkod
par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan na chen matha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra bar snang ngo/ de nas

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur cing/ bdag nyid kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bkod ba la 'dug pa snyam khyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal
pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i bkod pa 'di dag gda' 'o//
bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dan rtag tu 'di 'dra mod kyi/ sems can dman pa rnams longs su smin khar bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta
bur nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags par ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu rnams rin po che'i snod gcig tu zas za yang bsod nams ji lta bur bsags pa'i bye brag gis lha'i
zas bdud rtsi nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du/ shAri'i bu sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes pa dag kyang/ sems ji ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sa ngas rgyas
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa 'di snang ban/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems skyes so// lo tsa byi gzhon nu gang dag latsa byi gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang lhan cig tu lhags pa lnga brgya po de dag kyang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag brtul ba dang de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi zhong de phyir sngon gyi rang bzhin du rgyur par snang ngo/ den nyan thos kyi zig btsan gyi lha dang mi rnams 'di
mi snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag go snyam du rig nas/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag
go dge slong brgyad stong na len pa med par zug pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen lo la chos pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang chos thams cad/
rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing longs su dag pa gleng gzhi'i
le'u ste dang po'o// yang de'i tshe yang pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ li tsa phyi dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas/
shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyedal/ sangs rgyus mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod la thob pa/ spobs pa blob kha/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtsen pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ma
'jigs pa thob pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba kartsom pa/ chos kyi tshul zab mo la shin tu zhugs pa she sar ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par gyur 'a/ thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du
chud pa/ spobs pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa las nges par byung ba/ so so ni rags par
tshos ston pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la brtson par byas shing nges par byas pa/ shin tu brtags te las byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam la gnas pa/ blo dam pa/ rgya mtsho lta bu'i rjes su
zhugs la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur te rab tu bsngags la/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ga thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de sems can longs su
sman par bya ba'i phyi'i thabs la mkhas pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po gnas te/ sems can mgon med pa dang/ dbul po rnams bskul 'i phyir longs spyod zad mi shes la/ sems can tshul//
khrims 'chal pa rnams bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims longs su dgal/ sems can snang ba dang/ rab tu sdang ba dang/ gnod sems can dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/
khro sems can rnams bsdu'i phyin bzod pa dang dul thob pa/ sems na le lonana rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus khar ba/ se mas 'khrugs pa'isems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bsam
thAgatan dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas la/ sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams bsdu ba'i phyi'i shes rab rnam par nges la the la/ gos dkar po gyen la/ dge sbyong gi
spyod lam lun sum tshogs la/ khyim gyi gnas na gnas pa// 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang ma 'dresal/ budang/ chung
ma dang/ slas rnams ston kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyodal/ g.yog can gyis yongs su bskor bar snang yang rtag tu dben par spyod la/ rgyan gyis brgyan par snang yang rtag tu mtshan dang ldan/
ba= zas skom gyi zas za bar snang yang rtag tu bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas za ba/ rtsedamo dang rgyan po'agrwa thams cad n snang yang rtsed mo dang rgyan gol chags pa'i simos can ms yongs su mi
bar byed cing rtag tu don yod par spyod kha/ ya mtshan can thams cad tshor yang sangs rgyas la mi phyad ba'i bsam pa dang ldan l/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags
dang bstan bcos kyi rnam bshes kyang/ rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos la/ 'du 'dzi kun gyi nang na snang ya nga thams cad kyi nangan gtso bor mchod// 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya
ba'i phyir/ rgan rabs dang/ bor ma dang/ gzhonanu'i grogs su gyucing tshes bzhin du slar/ zla snyad thams cad du 'jug kyang red pa dang longs spyod la re ba medal/ sems can thams cad
gdul ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi mdodang/ sum mdo phamasacad na'ang snang ba/ sems can rnams bsrung ba' phyir rgyal po 'khyab rnams la'ang zhugs pa/ theg pa dman pa la mos pa bzlog

cing theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag bar gzud pa'i phyir chos nyan pa dang/ yang dag par brjod pa thams cad na'ang snang ba/ byis ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yi ge 'a grwa khang
thams cad du'ang 'gro ba/ 'dod pa'i nyes pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ smad 'tshong gi khyim kun tu 'ang 'jug pa/ dran pa la yang dag par gzhag pa'i phyir chang 'tshod pa'i sa tham sa cad
du'ang 'jug pa chos kyi mchog bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi nang na'ang tshong dpon du kun gyis bkur ba/ 'dzin pa thams cad kyi len pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir khyim bdag gi nang du'ang khyim
bdag tu kun gyis bkur ra/ bzod pa dang/ des ba dang/ stobs la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir rgyal rigs kyi nang du'ang rgyal rigs su kun gyis bkur ba/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/
ma @#// dregs pa shin tu gzhom pa'i phyir bram ze'i nang du yang bram zer kun gyis bkur ba/ rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad chos dang mthun par bkod pa'i phyir blon po 'inang du//
blon por kun gyis bkur pa/ rgyal bo'alongs spyod dang dbang phyug la chags pa bzlog pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i nang du'ang gnonu kun gyis bkur ba/ bud med gzhon nu longs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
btsun mo' 'khor gyi nang du'ang nyung rum du kun gyis bkur ba/ tha mal pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir skye bo khol kha dang langamathun par 'jug pa// bang phyug
ga bdag por bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin gyi nang du'ang brgya byin du kun gyis bkur ba/ ye shes kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i nang du'ang tshangs par kun gyis bkur ba/ sems can M

thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang du'ang 'jig rten skyong du kun gyis bkur ba ste/ de ltar lab kyi dri ma med par grags pa tshad medala'i thabs la mkhas pa'i lashas/
dang ldan te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer chen pon gnas shing 'dug go/ de thabs la mkhas pas bdaganyid na ga lta bur bstan nas de la nad 'driba'i phyir yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas rgyal po dang/
blon kho dang/ dbang po dang/ gzhon nu'i 'khor dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ grong pa dang/ lul ma dang/ de ma yin pa srog chags stong phrag mang po
nad 'dir 'ongs te/ der lhags pa de drag la/ li tsa byi dri ma med par gra gas pas 'gyur ba chen po dra ki lus 'di nyid las brtsams nas chos ston te/ grogs po dag lus 'dinI 'ad ltar mi
rtog pa/ 'di ltar ma brtan la/ 'di ltar la de brtan du mi rung ba/ 'di ltar nyam chung ba/ 'di ltar snying po med pa/ 'di ltar zhags pa/ 'di ltar yun zung ba/ 'di ltar sdug
bsngal ba/ 'di ltar du mang ba/ 'di ltar 'gyurakha'i chos can no// grogs po dag 'di ltar lus 'dand mang de'i snod de/ mkhas pas de la gnas par mi bya'o// grogs po dag lus
'di ni rang rigs brjod pa ste// lta ba rdos pa lta bu 'o// lus 'don ring du ma gnas pa ste/ chu'i chu bur lta bu 'o// lus 'don na mongs pa 'a sprod pa las byung ste/ smig rgyu lta bu 'o//
lus 'don snying po med pa lta/ chu shing gi sdong po lta bu 'o// kye ma lus 'di'i rus la rgyus pas sbrel ba ste/ 'khrul 'khor lta bu 'o// lus 'di'i phyi'i ci log las byung ba ste sgyu ma lta bu 'o//
lus 'di na yang dag pa ma yan pa mthong ba ste/ rmi lam lta bu// lus 'adi ni ston gyi las kyi gzugs bar n snang ba ste// gzugs brnyan lta bu 'o/ lus 'don rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir
brag cha ltakhu'o/ lus 'din sems 'khrugs shinge 'gyes pa'i mtshan nyid de/ sngon lta bu 'o/lus 'din skad cig tu 'jigakha dang ldan zhing mi gnas pa ste/ glog dang mtshungs so// lus 'din/
rkyen sna tshogs las byung ba ste/ badrag po med pa// lus 'di ni sa dang 'du ste/ byed ba med pa'o// lus ba ni chu dang 'dra ste/ bdag med bgo/ lus 'di ni ma
dang 'dra ste/ srog med pa'o// lus 'di rlung dang 'dra ste/ gang zag med pa'o// lus 'dinanam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ rang bzhin med pa'o// lus 'din 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi/
h+pha gnas te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ lus 'di ni bdag dang bdag ga med pa ste/ stor ba'o// lus 'di rtswa dang/ shing dang/ rnag pa dang/ 'ong ba dang mag lor lta bu ste//
khams po'o// lus 'di ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor dang ldan pas 'byung ste/ tshor ba med pa'o// lus 'di rnag dang mi gtsang ba bsags pa ste// gsog sgro/ lus 'di'i rtag tu bsku ba dang/
mnyeb dang/ 'jig ba dang/ 'gyes pa'i chos can te/ gsob bo// lus 'di ni nad rigs brgya rtsa bzhis gtsos pa'o// lus 'di ni rtag tu rgya bas zil gyis gnon pa ste/ khron pa rnying la
dang 'dra'o// lus 'di ni 'chi ba'i mtha' ste/ mthAr mi gnas pa'o// lus 'di'i lung po dang/ khams dang/ sbya mched kyis yongs su zin pa ste/ gshed ma dang/ sbrul gdug kha
dang/ grong stong pa lta bu ste/ khyed kyis de lta bu'i lus de la yid byung ba dang/ skyo ba skyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mos pa bskyed par bya'o// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku na chos kyi sku ste/ ye shes las skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams las skyes pa/ sbyin pa las skyes pa/ tshul khrims las skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzan las skyes
pa shes rab las skyes pa/ rnam par grol ba las skyes pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las skyes pa/ byams pa dang/ snying rjedang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
las skyes pa/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdom pa las skyes pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las skyes pa/ bzod pa dang des pa las skyes pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa las skyes pa/ thosapa dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs las skyes pa//
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum u0f74 rtsa bdun las skyes pa/ ' gnas dang lhag mthong las skyes pa/ stobs bcu las skyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi las skyes ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad las skyes pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las skyes pa/ mngon par shes pa dang rig pa las skyes pa/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba las skyes pa/ dge ba'i chos
thams cad yang dag par sdud pa las skyes pa/ bden pa las skyes pa/ yang dag pa nyid las skyes pa/ bag yod pa las skyes ba'o// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun dag ba'i las
tshad med pa las skyes pa ste// khyed kyis de lta bu'i sku de la chos ra bskyed par bya// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag/
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin du li tsa bya dri ma med par grags pas de ltar nd 'dri ba tshogs pa de dag la/ can s sems can brgya stong mang po dag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mngon par bskyed pa de lta de lta khur chos 'chadra do// thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa go
de nas la phyi dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du sams te bdag nan zhing ma bde ste/ khri'i steng na 'dug// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis bdag la ma dgongs te// thugs brtse ba'i phyir nad 'dri ba 'ga' yang ma btang ngo snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis latsa phyi dri ma med par grags pa'i sems kyi rtog pa de lta bu
mkhyenas/ bcom ldan 'dusakyis/ tshe dang ldan pahAra'i khu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod la tsaphyi dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag lo tsa phyi dri ma med par grags pa'i zo dri zhing mchab r mi spro'o// de ci'i slad du
zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na/ bdag shAng zhag gi drung nang du yang dag po'ag par gyur pa na/ latsa bya dri ma med par grags pa yang shing de'i rgyu
drung ga la ba der mchis nas/ bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// btsun pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis nang du yang dag bzhag pa de lta bu'i nang du yang drag 'jog pa la nang du yang dag gzhag bar
mi bya// ji ltar khams gsum du lus dang sems ma snang bar 'gyur pa de ltar nang du yang dag gzhug par gyis shig/ ji ltar 'gog pa las kyang mi ldang zhing/ spyod lam kun tu yang snang/
bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag bar gyis shig/ ji ltar thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dor la/ so so'i skye bo'i mtshan nyid du snang ba deltar nang du lang dag gzhag par gyis shog/ ji
ltar khyod kyis sems nangana'ang mi 'dug la/ phyi rol gyi gzugs la'ang mi rgyu ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyisashig/ ji ltar lta bar gyur pa thams cad las kyang mi g.yo zhing/
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams la'ang snang ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig/ ji ltar 'khor kha na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang ma slong la/ mya ngan las
'das pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig/ btsun pa kA ri'i bu gangade ltar nang du yang dag bzhag pa la nang du yang dag 'jogan/ de dag
la bcom ldan 'das kyis nang du yang dag 'jog par bka' stsal to zhes mchinas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos 'di de thos nas/ de la slar tshig lan ljon pa'i rje ma
