[so/ ]bya ba de 'ang ston to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang bdag cag gang du bcug ma shes so// rdzu 'khrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems gzhan dag gis ni ri'i

rgyal po ri rab de yungs 'bru 'api ngadu bcug par shes shing mthong ngo// de ni btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems drapa' rnams kyi rnam par thar ba khasam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa'o// btsun
pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rnam par tharapa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' n rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'o chu'i phung po rnams ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu lhags te/
tu dang/ rus sbal dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ sbal pa dang/ chu las skyes pa'i srog chags gzhan dag la'ang gnod par gyural med/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/

lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gar btsud snyam yang mi sems la bya ba de 'ang snang shang sa mas can de dag la gnod cing 'khrugs par gyur pa'i ng med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i/
'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nga rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin lag pa g.yas pas blangs te bskor nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad du 'bangs kyang sems can rnams bdag cag
gang du phyung/ gang nas 'ongs ma shes so// slar yang zlangs nas gnas bzhin du bzhag kyang 'ong ba dang 'gro bar mi shesamod kyi bya bde'ang kun snang ngo// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'khor
khatshad med pas 'dul ba'i sems can dag kyang yod/ 'khor ba bskyung bas 'dul ba dag kyang yod de/ de la rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub/
sems dpa' na 'khor ba tshad med pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir zhag bdun yang bskal pa 'das par ston to// 'khor ba bskyung bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams/
lan bskal par ng zhag bdun rgyus 'das par ston to// de la 'khor ba tshadamed pas dul ba'i sems can rnams na zhag bdun la'ang bskal pa 'dus pa snyam du sems so// gang 'khor ba bltung bas
'dul pa'i sems can de dgan bskal pa'i ng zhag bdun gyis 'das par shes so// de ltar rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu ston te// sems can thams cad kyang lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ sems kyis mgyogs
pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
ji snyad yod pa de thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu ston to// phyogs bcu na zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu ston to// phyogs

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams bsregs pa'i bskal pas tshig pa'i mi'i phung podi kun rang gi ltor bcug kyang/ gang des las bya ba de 'ang byed do// 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
ga phyi ma snyed 'das pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de steng du phyung ste/ gshegs nas gyen du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das par steng du 'jog ste/ 'di lta ste

brtan shA ri'i bu 'ar rtog cing rnam par rtogago/ btsun pa shAri'i bu gang dag legs par gsungasapa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyun gnas / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog par de dag nga ba ma yin
[s Ôºå ]/ba'o// gnas brtatsha rtog ci rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang dag gi rtog pa de dag narung ba'o// btsun pa shar 'i bu 'di lta rtog pa dang/ rnam bar rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir/ byang chub/
/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'diteg gi lus l me togam chags pa la ltos/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mo le na ma ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rodado// de bzhanidu/
'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa rnams la ni gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg byas glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang dag 'du byed thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang
bral ba de dag lan/ gzugs dang/ sgradang/ dri deng/ ro dang/ reg byas ci zhige byar yod/ gang dag bag chags ma spangs pa de dag la ni mi tog kyang 'chags kyi/ gang dag bag chags
spangs pa dedag galus la me tog gi 'chags te/ de bsan bag chags thams cad spangs pa rnams kyi lus la name tog ma'achags so// de nas tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ lha mo de la 'di skad ces u0fb1sa
so lha mo khyod khyim 'di'i nang du zhugs nas yun ji srid len/ lha mos smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis rnam par grol ba la zhugs nas yun dzasrid pa'o// smras pa/ lha mo khyod khyim 'dir gnas nas
ring po ma lon pa lta 'ge/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis rnam par grol zhugs nas ji sridelin/ de nas gnas brtan cangami zer bar gyur to// smras pa/ gnas brtan shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i
mchog ce'i phyir mi skye zhing/ da dus la baban/ dris pa'i lanam na/ smras pa/ lha mo rnam par grol ba ni brjod du med na/ de ji skad du brjod mi shes so// smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis gangaya ge
brjod pa de thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i bya ba gang yin pa de zhing na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
de bzhin du yi ge denang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'angamad gnyis kachod par yang tsha demages so/ de lta bas na'atsunab shAr bu yi ge btsal bsa rnam par grol bam stogi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sa thams cad mnyam ba ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yine pa'i phyir ro/ lcas pa/ lha mo 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdangadang/ gtimug dang bral ba'i phyi rnam par grol ba ma yin nam/ lha mos
lcam pa/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya'o zhes khyu ba 'dazhi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la bstan ba ste/ gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa
dedag lan 'do chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi rang bzhinenyidi rnam par grol ba'o/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/ lhamo de la'adiskad ces smras so// legs so legs so//lhamo khyod kyis
ci thobacings la mngon sum du byas na khyod de lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan/ lcam ba/btsun pa shAri'i bu bdag gsen ci'ang thob pa'i ng med/ mngon sumadu byas pa'i ng yod de/des bdag gi spobs pa 'di
[r/ ]@#// 'dra'o// gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gis thos cing mngon sum du byas so snyam pa de dam legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba lang rgyal can zhes bya'o/sas pa/ lha mo khyod/

kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa 'am/ smras pa// bdag na nyen thos kyi theg pa ston pasazha/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o// bdag ni rten pa'i chos la 'jug pas

na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o// bdag nasnying rje chen po mi getong bas na/ theg pa chen po pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang btsun pa shAri'i bu ston tsam pa ka'i tshal du zhugs na/ a ban de'i dril ma snom gyi/ saMm pa

ka'i tshel du zhugs na 1 tsam pa ka nyid kyi del sgom pa de bzhin du/ tsun pa shAri'i bu khyim 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi yon tan gyi dri deng ldan pa gnas pa sa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dri la ma sgom mo//
btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'di'i brgya phyi'i dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma ni dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am deng/ lto 'phya chen

po gang dag khyim 'di'i lhags pa de dag kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i chos thos pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi yon tan gyi drise byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'dong ngo// btsun pa shAri'i bu ba dag khyie 'di
ni lo bcu gnyis tshun chad gnas te/ byams pa chen po dang [0f10 ]snying rje chen por ldan pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i gtam sngon ma thos so// btsun pa shAri'i bu byas 'dazhi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa brgyud rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par snang ngo// brgyad po gang zhen/ ma 'di'i gser gyi kha

dag gi 'od rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pas na/ mtshan mo dang nyin bar du'ang ma mngon/ khyim 'di'i zla ba dang nyi ma'ang mi mngon/ ma sgang ste/ de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o// btsun pa

shar 'i bu gzhan yang gang dag khyim 'dir zhugs pa de dag zhugs ma thag tunyon mongs pas gtsi ba med de/ de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes gnyis pa'o// btsun pa shA ra'i bu/zhan ya nga khyim 'dan

tshu brgya byin dang tshogs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral te/ de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o//

btsun pa shAri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bsgrags pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam dang/ phyi ma ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i gtam dang ma 'bral te/

de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes bzhi pa'o// btsun pa shar 'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di ne rtag tu lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang/ glu'i dbyangs dang rol mo byed de/ sil snyan de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos tshan med

kha bsgrub pa'i sgra dus thamA cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes lnga pa'o// btsun padaAra'abu gzhan yang khyim 'di ni rin po che thams cad kyi gang ba/ zad mi shes pa'i gtachen po bzhi yod de/
[‚Ä¢ ]@#// de'i mthus sems can dbul zhing bkren pa thams cad kyis khyer te dong yang zad de shes te/ de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'achos drug pa'o// btsun pa shari'i bu gzhan yang khyi 'ad/
nade bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang/ 'od dpag med pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ dkon mchog dpal dang/ dkon mchog 'od 'phro dang/ konamago zla ba dang/ dkona mchog bkod ba dang/ bzod/
dka' dang/ don thams cad grub pa dang/ rin chen mang dang/ seng go bsgrogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge sgra la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i dubazhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams skyes bu dam pa
'dis bsams ma thag tu gshegs te/ gshegs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa bstan nas/ slar gshegs te/ dran ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun

pa'o btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'din lha thams cad kyi gnas kyi bkod pa dag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad snang ste dan ngo mtshar rmad du byung bo'i chos brgyad pa'o/

btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'din ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad po de dag snang ste/ 'di lta bu bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i chos mthong na/nyan thos kyi chos la su zhig 'dod par 'gyur/smras pa/ lha mo khyod bud

mod kyi dngos bo las bsgyur na ci zhes/ smras pa/ bdag gis lo bcu gnas kyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po btsal na'ang da dung ma rnyed do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma mkhan gyis bud med sprul pa de la/ 'di ltar khyed/

bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci zhis zhes byan/ de ji skad zer bar 'gyur/ smras pa/de la yang dag pa yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/ smras pa// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad
yongs su ma grub pa ste/ sgyu mas sprul pa'i ngo bo 'di la bud med kyi dngos po bstsalen zhig zhes khyod de snyam sems/ de nas lha mo des 'di khyu bur byin gyi rlabs pas byan gyis brlabs nas/ ji ltar

gnas brtan shA ri'i bu lha mo de ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar snang ste/ lha mo de'ang gnas brtawaM shA ri'i bu 'dra ba de 'dra bar snang ngo// de nas lha mo Ari'i bu'i gzugs su gyur pa des shA ri'i khu lha mo'i gzugs su

gyur pa de la 'di ltar btsun ba kA ri'i bu bung mdakyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci tes zhes dris so// shA ri'i bu lha mo'i gzugs su gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes bu'i gzugs ni mi snang gyur te

kho bo bud med kyi lus su grub na gung bsgyur ba mi shes so// smras pa// go la te gnas brtan gyis bud med kyi gzugs las slar bsgyur ba nusan na bud med dems cad byang bud med kyi dngos bo las 'gyur ro//
ji ltar gnas brtan bud mong ma yin pa los bud med du snang ba de bzhin du/ bud med thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs su snang sto/ bud med ma yin pa las bud med kyi gzugs su snapago/ de la

dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bud med kyang ma yin/ skyes pa'i ng ma yin zhes gsungs so// de nas lha mo ris byan gyis rlabs te btang ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu slar yang bdag gi/
ka/ gzugs dang ldan par gyur to// de nas lha mo des/ shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bud med kyi gzugs su byas pa de ga re/ smras pa// bdag
gis byas pa'i ng med/ bsgyur ba'ang mad do// smras pa/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang byas pa'i ng med/ bsgyur ba'ang gdad// gang ma byas shing/ bsgyur ba med pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'o//
smras pa/ lha mo khyod 'di nas ga'i phos na gang du skye/ smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa de gar skye bar bdag kyang der skyego/ smras pa// deb zhigshegs pas sprul pa ni 'chi 'pho'ang med/

skye ba 'ang med do// skyes pa// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ 'chi 'pho med cing skya ba med do// smras pa/lha mo khyod ji srid na byang chub men par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur/ smras pa/ gang gi

tshog nas brtan khyod so so'i skye bo'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa// lha mo kho bos so so'i skye bo'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni

gnas ma yin// smras pa// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni gnas ma yin no// de ci'i phyi zhen/ byang chub ni gnas pa med pa la gnas pa'i
'i/ de la khas khams ma yin pa la na sa ya[=z]na tshogs pa 'a 'am nga ca de/ kaza ka dag la sa[v]pa// nga bache gshegs pas sa sangs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye masrang rgyu de
bzhan bo/ gas pa rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// lha mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA/

pa'i bu 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba de na yig dang bgrang ba'i brda'i tshig bla dwags te/ sangs rgyas rnams 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs ba dang/ da lta'i
khyung ba ma yin te/ byang chub ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o// gnas brtan gyis dgra bcom pa thob bam/ smras pa// thob pa med pa'i rgyus thob bo// smras pa/ de bzhin du mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub ' nod pa'i rgyus mngon par rdzogs par byang chub do/ de nas la tsa byi dri ma med par grags pas/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas partan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa
shA ri'i bu/ lha mo 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la rnam par rtse ba/ smon lam las yang dag par byung ba/
bzod pa thob kha/ 'i ma ldog pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ soms can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du gnas so// lha mo'i le'u ste drug/
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ la tse phyi dri ma med pa'i grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams la 'gro bar song ba ma yin/ smras pa// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ma yin bar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
ka/ chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba ma yin no/ smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ma yazhi bar 'grob gang/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ gnod sems dang/
rnam par 'tsho ba dang/ rab tu sdang bar mi 'gyur ba yazhi/sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral ba yin/ dud 'gro'i 'gro bas 'gro yaglen ba'i mun ba mun
ga dang bral ba yi/ lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa med pa yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gro yang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
thams cad blangs pa yin/ ma g.yo ba dang gzugs med pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang de'i 'gro ba la yang dag par 'jug pa ma yin/'dod chags kyi 'gro ba 'gro yang/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod
thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba yin/ zhe sdang gi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med ba yin/ gti mug gi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ chos thums cad la shes rab kyi dris
pa' sems dang ldan pa yani/ sar sna'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ lus dang srog la mi lta bas/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong ba yani/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'gro bar 'gro dang/
kha na ma tho ba cung zad la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing/ sbyasu pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsungs pa thams cad la gnas pa yin/ gnod sams kyi zla ba dang/ khong khro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ gne/
du gnod sems med cing byams pa la gnas pa yin/ le lo'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ brtson 'grus rtson pa rgyun mi 'chad cung dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yan/dbang/
bo 'khrul pa'i 'gro khar 'gro yang rangabazhin gyis snyoms par zhugs shing bsam gtan don yod pa yAni/ 'chalepa shes rab kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gro bar song zhing/
'jig rtin pa dang 'a rdzig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag byad pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ ldem po ngag la mkhas shing thabs mkhas ba'i

spyod pa tshar phyin pa'i ng yin/ nga rgyal gyi 'gro ba'ang sngon la/'jig rten thams cad kyizam pa dang stags su 'gyur ba'ang yan/zhonamongs pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ shazhi tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med
cing rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i ng yin/ bdud kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ng yan/ nyan thos kyi 'grobar 'gro yang/ sems can
rnams la ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa'i ng yani/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po las byung ba'ang yin/ dngul
bo'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ longs spyod thad bshes pa'i rin po che lag na thogs pa'i ng yin/dbang po zhas pa'i 'grobar 'gro yang/ gzugs bzang zhing mtshan gyis legs

ba'aborgyan pa'i ng yin/ rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas de bzhin ga shegs pa'i gdung rab du skyobar 'gyur ba'ang yazhi/ na chung zhing mdog nganapa/

zla zhan pa'i 'grobar 'gro yang/ blta na sdug pa dang/ sred med kyi bu'i lus lta bu thob pa'i ng yin/ sems can thams cad la rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ mi bde ba'i spyod pa'i ng ston la/ 'a ba'i 'jigs pa las shin
tu 'das shing rab tu choms pa 'ang yin[Y]longs spyod kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ btsal ba thams cad mar cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la so sor rtog pa mang ba'ang yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sras dga' bas

ts+tshA mang bo ston kyang dbon par spyod cing/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las rgyal bu yang yin/ khams dang skye mched kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ gzungs thob cing spobs pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yang yin/ mu stegs can/
rgyu gyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ mu stags su ma gyur pa'i ng yani/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang/ 'gro ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa yang yin/ myan las 'das pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang/

'khor ba'i rgyun yang mi gtong ba yin te/ 'jam dpal de lta na byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ma yin bar 'gro ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yazhe no// de nas la tsa byi dri ma med pa'i grag
pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs gang yane/ smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
sheg go// ma ragu pa dang/ sridapa'i srid pa ni rigs so// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug na sdigs so// zhi ci phogaTazhin rigasaso// sgrib pa lnga ni rigs so/// skye mched drug ni
'gag so// rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun ni rigs so// log pa brgyad ni rigs so// kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgun rigs so// mi dge ba'i lasakyi lam bdun rdzogs so// rigs
kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs te/ rigs kyi bu mdor na lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs so// smras pa/'jam dpal ci la bsams te de
smad/ snyas pag rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas mthong ba nges par 'jug pa la gnas pas na blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed mi nus so// nyon mongs pa'i 'byung gnas
'dus byas ' gnas pa// bden pa mthong bas ni blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed mi nus so// gsakyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na dgon dung gi sa phyogs su ma tog ut+pal dang/ cha

mu da dang/ pad+madang/pad+ma dkar po dang/ dri mchog rnams mi skya ste/ 'dam bu dang chu gling dubaskyang na/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ dri mchog rnams skya'o/
'gas kyi bu de bzhin du 'dus ma byas/ nges pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la ni des argyas kyi chos rnams mi skye'o// nyon mongs pa'i 'dam bu dang chu gling du gyur pa'i sems can rnams

lan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skya'o// 'di lta bu dbar na/ nam mkha' la sa bon mi skye'i/ sa la gnas nig gi de skye ba de bzhin du/ 'dus ma byas nges pa thob pa'i g.yas zan la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi skye ko

wA 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mnyam pa brgyadan/ byang chub kyi sems skyo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skya'o/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis nyon mongs pa thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi

gas su ga par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen par ma zhugs pas/rin tang med pa'i rin po che dun ma nus so// de bzhin du'on mongs pa'i rgya mtshor ma zhugs bgazhi thams cad mkhyen
pa'i sems bskyed par mi nus so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin legs so legasaso// 'jam dpal tshig 'di ni legs par smras te/

'dzin yang dag go/ zhen mongs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs te/ bdag cag lta bu n byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar ga le nus/

mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pas ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed par yang nus/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so// 'di lta ste/ dparan skyes budabang po ma tshang ba la 'dod pa'i
yon tan lngani/ yon tan med cing nus pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du kun tu sbyor ba thams cad sbyangs pa'i nyan thos lan sangs rgyas kyi chos thugs tsad bon nam cing zhus pa red de/ de la phyir dmigs pa

zhus so// 'jam dpa la de lta bsan/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo'o// nyan thos rnams la byas pa gzo ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so'i skyo bosanas nigs rgyas kyi yon

tan thos bas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyi blan med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed kyi/ nyan thos kyis ni ji sring 'tsho ba'ibar dus sam+b+hasakyi chos stobs
dang ma 'jigs pa rnams thos kyang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba

'khor der 'dus te 'dug pa des li tsa phyi drom med badragrogs pa la 'di skad ces smasaso// khyim bdag khyod kyi pha ma dang/ budang/ chung ma dang/ bran pho dang/ ban modang las byed pa dang/ zheshas 'tsho
ba rnams ga re/ mdza' bshes dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams ga ro/ g.yog dang/ rtangang/ glang po che dang/ shing rta dang/ dpung bu chung dang/ bzhon pa rnams ga re/ de skad ces

smras pa dang/ li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs thams cad ston pa la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gi/ mni shes rab pha rol phyin//
@# @#// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// 'dren pa rnams n de las skyes// chos la dga' ba chung ma ste// byams dang snying rje lu yani// chos dang bden gnyis bu pho la'i// stong pa'i don sems khyim

yin no// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad ni// ci dgar dbang byed slob ma 'o// mdza' bshes byang chub yan lag ste// des ni byang chub mchog rig 'gyur// de grogs rtag du 'grogs pa// pha la phyin pa drug rnamu

so bsdu ba de la bud meng khyam// glu dbyas chos rnams bstan pa 'o/ gzugs rnams de yi skyed mos tshal// byang chub yan lag me tog rgyas// 'bras bu rnam grol ye shes te// chos kyi nor chon gtong ba 'o/

rnam par thar pa rdzing yun te// ting ngo 'dzan gyi chu yis bkang// rnam dag pad+mas kun khebs pa// de la 'khru ba dri ma med// mngon shes de ya bzhin pa ste// thug pa chen po bla na med// kha lo sgyur dbyang
chub sems// lam na ni ba yan lag brgyad// deyaM ban mtshan rnams dang// dpe byad bzang po brgyad sku 'o// bsam pa dag dag de dag gis// gosan khrel yod ngo shes// de dgadamasmonor dang ldan/ 'ab

tu sbyor ba tshos ston pa/ nanatanAdagan rid chen te// yongs su bsngo ba byang chub phyir// mal na bsam gtan ngan dug ste/ 'tsho ba dag pas kun tu bating// de dag sad pa ye shes te// rtag du thos pa mnyam pa
bzhag/ de dag byas na bdud rtsi ste// rnam grol khu ba btung ba yin// bsam pa rnam dag khrus yin te// smosakyi bsku ba tshul khrims so// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom pas na// de dag dpa' bo mo dam pa//

0 bdud bzhi dag kyang rab tu btul// byang chub dkyil 'khor rgyal mtshan bsgreng// bsams bzhin skyo ba ston yod kyi// skye ba med cing 'byung ba yod// zhing kun tu yang snang ba// zhis shar ba bzhin du go/ 'dren//

pa mchod pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod nas kyang// bdag dang sangs rgyas rnams la// nams kyang gnas par yong mi byed// ji ltar sems can phan pa yang// sangs rgyas zhing rnams sbyang mod/
kyi nam mkha' lta bur zhing rnams gyur// sems can sems can 'dushes med// sems can kun gyi gzugs rnams dang// sgraskad gang rnams 'byon pa dag/ 'jigs mdabyang chub sems dpa'
rnams// skad cig gcig gi ston par byed// bdud kyi 'o ma rnams shes mod kyi// bdud rnams kyi yang rjes su 'jug/ thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa dag/ de yi bya ba kun kyang ston// sgyu ma'i chos
rnams ma rtsen pas// sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir// rga ba dang nin par 'gyur// bdag zhing gi bar rab tu ston// sa rnams rab tu tshig par ni// bskal pas bsrog par kun ston te// sems can
rtog par 'du shes pa// mi rtag pa na re ba bstan to// sems can bye ba sbyong rnams kyang// yul gcig tu namagron du gsheg/ thams cad khyim du zan byin te// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o//
sngags dang rig pa ci yod dang// bzo gnas rnam pa mang po dag/ thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin// sems can thams cad bde thob byed// 'jig rten ya mtshan ji snyed pa// de dag kun tu rab byung nas//
lta ba tha dad gyur pa yi// sems can rnams ni yongs su 'gro la// zla ba'am 'amar de gyur te// brgya byin tshangs pa skye dgu dang// chu dang mar yang rab gyur te// sa dang rlung du'ang de

bzhin no// nad kyi bskal pa bar ma la// de ni rtsi mchog dam par 'gyur// des na sems can rnam grol zhing// nad rnams yod cing bang bar 'gyur// muga' bskal pa bar ma la// zasadang skom dubasprulogs su//
bkres shing skom pa chudabyas te// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// mtshon gyi bsal pa bar ma la// dedag byams pa gom gyur te// sems can bye ba brgyagang bo/ gnod sems yod la 'dzud par byed/
g.yur chen 'dres pa'i nang du ni// de dag phyogs la mnyam par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams// 'dum zhing 'dul bar dga' bar byed// sangs rgyas zhing na ji gad pa/ bsam
gyis su khyab dmyal bur yang// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bsams bzhin dun der 'gro 'o/ ji skad dung 'gro'i skya gnas kyi// 'gro bar rab tu bstan pa// thams cad du yang chos ston po/
pa'i phyi rnam par 'dren ces bya// 'dod pa'i 'angs spyod rnams kyang ston// bsam gtan la yang bsam gtan skyon// bdud rnams da du 'go byang byang/ de dgaglags red 'gyur ma byed/ ma
dbus nas ni pad+ma ltar// yang dag ma yin de ston na// de bzhin 'dod dang bsam gtan yang// yang dag ma yin de ston to// bsams bzhin smad 'tshong rnams su bsgyur// skyes pa rnams ni bsdu ba'i
'dod chags lcags kyus brjod nas su// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'god/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i yi// grong mi dang ni ded dpon dang// mdun na 'don dang blon po dang// blon po rin po
rtag tu 'gyur// sems can dbul po rnams la// zad ma shes pa'i gter du'agyur// gang la sbyin pa byin pa yang// dodag byang chub sems bskyed btsud// nga rgyal khengs pa'i sems can la// de dag
mtshan chen mchog gyur te// nga rgyal kun kyang bcom nas su// bla med byang chub tshol du btsud/ 'jigs skrag sems can rnams la ni// rtag tu de yin nan 'dug/ dengag mi 'jigs byin nas kyang//

byang chub tu smin par byed// de dag lnga mngon shes pa yi// drang srong tshangs par spyod gyur te/ bzod dang des pa tshul khrims dang// sdom pa la ni sems can ngagod// mi gro ltar byang sems can rnams//
'jigs pa mang pas 'dra'i mthong nas// bran dang g.yog tu shan 'gyur// slobamar yang na nye bar 'gro// yan lag gang dang gang rnams kyis// sems can chos la dgar gyur pa// thabs chen shin tu bsubs
pas dag/ bya ba dag ni thams cad ston// de dag slob pa mtha' yas shing// spyod yul rnams kyang mtha' las te// ye shes mtha' yas rdzogs pam//srog chags mtha' yas grol bar byed// bskal
pa dag ni bye ba dang// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar ni// bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang// de yi yon tan mtha' rjod dka'// gang rnams shes rab med pa yi// sems can dman pa ma
gtogs par/mkhasabs chos 'di thos gyur nas// byang chub mchog la su mi smon// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi le'u ste 'dun pa'o/
de nas li tsa byi drim med par grags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pagang yAni/
spobs par rgyas dgag/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba der 'dus pa nges 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu skyob dang 'jig panas te/ gang ma skyes ma byung ba de la 'jig

pa gang yang med de/ sa skya ba'i chos la bzod pa rdzong pa ni/ gzhis su med pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dpal sbas kyis smras pa/ ngadang nga'i pa zhes bya ba de na gnyis te/ bdag tu sgro btag
bamedun/ zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ gang sgro btags pa med pa de na gzhis su med pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal brtsegs kyis smras pa// kun nas ten mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba zhes
bya ba de ni gnyis te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su shes nas rnam par byang ba la rlom sems su mi 'gyur zhing/ rlom sems thams cad legs par 'dzom pa dang/ mthun par 'gro ba'i lam de gnyis
su med pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' skarab thangs kyis sbas pa/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems de gnyis te/ gang g.yo ba med pa rlom sems su ma byed/ yid la mi byed pa lhag par bya ba med pa lhag

par bya ba dang bral ba de ni grazhis su med par 'jug pa 'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag bcangs kyis smras pra/ byang chub kyi sems dang nyan thos kyi sems kyis bya ba de'i gnyis te gang stsama'i sems dang/

mtshungs par mthong ba de ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mad/ nyan thos kyi sems kyang medu de/gang sams kyi mtshan nyid mtshungs pa de ni/ gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' ma zhe dzums
kyis smras pa/ lapa dang mi len pa de ni gnyis te/ gang mi len pa de ni mi dmigs te/ gang ma dmigs pa de la rtog pa dang/ bsal bar mi byed/ chos thams cad mi byed ma myong pa de na/ gnas
gu mad par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mig bzas kyis smras pa/ mtshan 'di gcig pa dang mtshan 'di med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis so// gang rtogs par mi byed/ kun rtogs par mi
byang mtshan nyid gcig par mi byed mtshan nyid mang par mi byang ngo// gang mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba la/ mtshan nyid mtshungs par 'jug pa de ni/ gzhis su mad par 'jug pa'o//

byang chub sems dpa'i skar rgyal gyis smras pa// dag kha dang mi ngag ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis te/ gang dge ba dang mi dug ba mi slong nang/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa la gnas sumed par rtog pa nAgazhis
su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' song gis sbas pa/ kha na ma tho bar bcas pa dang/ khanam tho ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/ gang gis rdo rje ltar rab tu 'bags pa'i ye shes kyis
mi ra rmi mi 'khrol ba de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis smras pa/ 'din thug pa dang bcas pa// 'din zag pamed pa'o zhes bya ba
de na gzhis te/ gang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thob pas brag pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su mi byed/ 'du shes med par gyur pa'i ng ma yani/ ma'am padi lu ma'umapa'i du thob pa'i ng mang tsang/
zla 'du shes kyi 'dun pa mang pa de ltar gang 'jug pa la// gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byung ba soms dang pa'i 'de mos kyis sbas pa/ 'di ni bde ba 'di ni mi bde ba'o zhes bya ba de gnyis te/ gangs
zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i/ grangs thams cad dang bral zhing blonam mkha' dang mtshungs pas ma chags pa de ni/ gzhis su mang par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sring mang kyis ang/
'di'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'ad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o zhes bya ba de na gnyis te/ gang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin stong pa de la/ cung zad kyang rgyal pa'i ng yod/ 'jug pa'i ng med/ 'gro ba'angamade/
mi 'gro ba'ang yod de/ gang la ma rdul/ mi 'jug/ 'gro ba'ang med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ 'khor ba dang

mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de na gzhis te/ 'khor ba'i ngo bo 'di mthong bas/ ma 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' ste/ gang de ltar rtogs pa de ni/ gzhas su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub
0 gams dpa' mngon sum du mthong gis smras pa// zad pa drang mi zad pa zhes bya ba de na gzhis te/ zad pa ni tu 'du ba ste/ gang na tu zad pa de la/ zad par bya bam yin pas na/ de'i phyi'i mi zad pa
zhes bya'o// gang mi zad pa de ni skad cig pa ste/ skad cig pa la zad pa med do// de lta bur rab tu zhugs pa dini/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sbas kyis

smras pa// bdag dang bdag med do zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/ gangabadrag gi dngos po ma dromigs pa de ci zhig/ khadagamed par byed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo ba 'di mthong bas gnyis su med pa// gnyis su med

bar 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lhas sbas pa/ rig pa dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gzhes te/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ltar rig pa'i ng de bzhin te/ ma rig pa gang yin pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa//
bgrang du med pa/ bgrang pa'i lam las 'dras pa'o// gang 'di la mngon par rtogs pa de na gzhis sumad par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngags smras pa/ gzugs nad stong ba ste//
gzugs bshag pa las stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs kyi ring bzhin ni stong ba ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni shes so//

rnam par shes pa ning na stong ba 'ad de/ rnam par shes pa bshis pas stong pa ma yin gyi// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 'di la gang gis len pa'i phung po lnga la de bzhin shes shing/ de lta bur pa
shes kyis rig pa dan/ gnyis sumad par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sams dpa' 'od kyatog gis smras pa// khams bzhi po'angagazhanal/ nam mkha'i khams kyang
gzhan no zhes bya ba danaganyis te/ khamasu bzhaponanem mkha'i rang bzhinano// sngonatsamatha' yang nam mkha' rang bzhin no// phyi ma'amatha'aanganam mkha'i rang bzhin no// de
bzhin du da ltar yunganam mkha'aring bzhanitra/ gang daltar khams la'ajug pa'i ishas dan/ gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rab kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/
mag dang gzugs so zhes bya ba de na gnyis te/ gang migayongs su shes pas/ gzugs la ma chags/ ma sdung/ marmadas pa de nazhib zhes bya'o// de bzhin du na ba dang sgra/ sna dad
dri/ lce dang ro// lus dang reg/ yid dang chos de dgan gnyis// gang yang de yongs su shes nas chos lamachags/ ma sdung/ ma rmongs ba da na zhi ba zhes bya'o// de ltar zhibal
gnas pa ni nyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo grosamazad bsasmras pa/ sbyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bad ni gnyis te/ sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyiden
thams cad mkhyen pa'o// thams cad mkhyen ba'i ngo bo nyid ni yongs su bsngo ba'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab
thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasasu bsdo pa don gnyis so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nagasarab kyi red bzhin no// yongs su bsngo ba yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'id bzhin te/ gang/
tshulagacig pa 'di la 'jug pa de na gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo zabacas smras pa/ stong ba nyid kyang gzhan la/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa 'ad
gzhan no zhes bya ba de na gnyis te/ stong pa gang yin pa de la mtshan ma gangayang mad do// mtshan ma med pa la smon pa med/ smon pa med pa la sams dang/ tshade dang/ rnam par shes pa
rgyu ba med de/ gang rnam pa ra thar ba gcig gi sgo de la rnam par thar pa thams cad kyi sgo rnams su blta bar byab dan gnyis su med pa'i sgor 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bzhi
posasmras pa/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun no zhes bya ba de ni gnyis taM/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhan nu chos so/ chos kyiring bzhanan reg 'dun te/ de dag thams cad kyang
'dusemakhyas pa'o// 'dus ma byas nAnam mkha'a'o// chos thams cad kyi tshulananam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ gang da ltar rjes su 'gro ba dan/ gas su med par 'jug pa'o//
byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i mgagasesmras pa/ 'jag chogs dang 'jig tshogs 'gog pa zhes bya ba da ni gnyis taM/ 'jig tshogs nyidi na'i gog pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/
'jig chogs su lta ba bskye ba med cing/ gang lta bde 'jag tshogs so zhes sam/ 'jig tshogs 'gog ces martog sku/ dmartog/ rnam par m rtog// shin mi rtog
bzo pas 'gog pa 'di nga bzhin du 'gyur tu/ ma re byung ma'ajag ba de naganyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dang 'ashin tu dul bas smas ba/ lus dang/ gdang/ yad kyi sdom kha
zhes bya ba nganaganyis su med da/ da ci phyir zhen/ chos 'di dag na mngon par 'dum byed pa/'amtshan 'aded/ lus mngon par 'du ma byed pa gangayin pa// dug ga mngon bar 'dum byed btang
da'amtshan nyid do/ mdakyi mngon par 'dum byed pa'i ng de'i mtshan nyid do// gang chos thams cad kyi mngon ng ra 'dum byed pa de yin par shes par bya/ rjes su rageg bar bya ste/ gang 'di la
mngon par 'du med par shes pa de na gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams zhadegs smos pa/ bsod nams dang bsod nams na An pa dang/
g.yo ba mngon par 'du bya ba mdon par 'du byed do zhes bya bad na gnyis te/ gang bso danams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang/ mgayo ba mngon par 'du me da pa da na gnyis su med
pa'o// bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang/ ma g.yo ba 'du byed rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyidistong pa ste/ de la bsod nams kyang med/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i ng med/
0 ma bi yo ba'ang mad/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i ng med ]gang de ltar ma sgrub pa danaganyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas smyos pa/ bdag kun nas/
ldang ba las skyes ba de ni gnyis te/ bdag yongs su shes pa de naganyisami slong ngo// de ltar gnyis su med par gnas pa la/ rnam par rig pa med pas/ rnam bur ragal med pa den
gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi lho bos smras pa/ dmags pas rab tu byab da na gnyis so// gang ma dmags pa de na gnyis sumad pa ste/ de'i phyir
gang len pa med tsang dor ba med pa de gnyis sumed par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sams dpa' zla ba'i bla mas smras pa// mun pa dang snang ba'o zhes bya ba don gnyis te/ mun pa'i ng med/
snang ba 'ang med pa da nAganyis su med pa'o// daci'i phyir zhan/ 'diltar 'gog par snyoms par zhugs pa la mun pa'i ngamed/ snang ba'ang med do// chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin
te gang mnyam ba 'di 'di la 'jug pa dan gnyis su med bar 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po ches smras r myang n las 'das pa la mngon par dga' zhing 'khor
la ma dga' ba de naganyis te/ gang mya ngan las 'das ba la yang mngon par dga' ba'ang med/ 'khor ba la yang ma rega' ba mad pa da naganyis su med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang bcas pa
las ni grol bar bstan gyi/ gang shanitum bcanges pa de thar pa ga la tshol/ mabatsadis ma grol ba'adeg slong na dga' kha dang/ mdeg2la'ang ma skyed de/ de na gnyis su
med par 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa// lam dang lam ngan pa'o zhes bya ba de naganyisito/ lam du zhugs pa lan lam ngan ba ma spyod do// ma spyod
rgyu pa la gnas panAlam gyi 'du shes sam/ lam ma yAn pa'i'adu shes su ma 'gyur ro/ 'du shes yongs su rag kha na blag nayis su ma 'jug ste/ da ni gnyis su medabar 'jug pa'o// byang chub
sems dpa' bdon dgas smras pa/ bden pa dung brdzun pa zhes bya ba da na gnyis taM bden pa mthong bas kyang bden pa gnyis yad dag par rjesasu ma mthong na/ brdzun pa lta ga la mthong/ de mi'o
phyir zhan/shA'amagags nim mthong gsa shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ste/ ji ltar ma mthong/ rnam par m mthong ba dag de ltar mthong ngo// gang la mthong ba'ang med/ rnam par mthong ba'ang
med de/ gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dgags rang rang gi bstan pa bshad nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras no/// 'jam dpal
byang chub sems dpa' gnyis su med par 'jug ba gang yani/ 'jam dpa las lcas ba/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kun gyis kyang legs par smras mod kyi/ khyed kyis bshad pa de thams cad naganyis
so[Ôºö]bstan pa gcig nam gtogs te/ brjod du med pa/ smaramadab/ bshad dumed pa// bsgrag tu med pa/ bstan du med pa/ ga dgas su med pa de na gnyis su med bar 'jug pa'o//
da nas 'jam dbal gzhon nuragyur pas/ la te bya drim med par grags pa la'adaskad ces smras so// kho bo cag gsanard rang ga bstanapa bshad zinan/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang gnyis su med pa'i
chos kyisgebastanab la spobs bar gyis shig/ donas latsabya drim med par grags pa cang mi smabar gyur to// de nas 'jam dbal gzhonanur gyur pas/ li tsa bya dril me dpar grags pa la legs
so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legasaso// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dba'a rnams kyi gnyis su med par 'jug pa an te/ dal yi ga dang/ sgradang/ rnamapar rig pa 'a rgyubamed do//
bstanapa 'dabebud Na na/ byang+kachub sems dpa' lnga stong gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs pasamaskye ba'achos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs
pa'i le'u sta brgyad pa'o// 4/ de nas tshe dang ldan ngashwara'i bus 'disnyam dubasams te/ gdugs chod la'ang baban/ sems dapa' chen po 'di dag ma ldang na 'dod//zan
garaza snyam mo// de nas l tse byi dri ma med par grags pas tsho dang ldan pa shAri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog ba soms kyisaMshosanas/ tshod ldan pa shar 'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsunapa shar 'i
bu de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par thar ba brgyad po gang dag gsungs ba'i rnam par thar ba de dag la gnas par sa la/ zang zang dang 'dris pa'i rgyud kyis chos ma nyan ci/
btsun ba shura'i buyud tsam zhag sdodacig dang/ ston ma myong ba'akhazasaza bar 'gyur ro// donas de'i tsho latsa byi dri ma med par grags pa dalta bu'i ting nga 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di 'dra

ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so// gang stong gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang+gA'abyung ba'ang+gacu rtsa gnyis kyi khyim sAd 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
gyi khams spos thamasacad kya pra mchog ces bya bayod de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos chen bo de dag gal bstan to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa khros mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba
da ltar bzhugs ta 'tsho zhing gnas so// 'jig rtagyi khams der phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas kyizhingathams cad kyi mi dang/ lta'i dro'abyung ba da pas 'jag rten bya khams de'adeshade las ches khyad par du
'phags pa 'byung ngo// 'jig rtenagyi khams de na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med de/ byang chub mas dpe'a'aba' zhig gi tshogs 'dus pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa/
spos mchog brtsigs pa dachos ston to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ khang ba brtsags pa thams cad kyang spros pa byas/ 'chags dang/ rgyadamos tshal dang/ gzhal med khang thams cad kyang
la a spros la byas so// gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag zas za ba'i zas de 'dres 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa khyab bo// de batshodacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchogakhartsa gas pa
byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol ba'i phyir zhugs te/ donas lha'i bu spos bkodapa'izas zhes bya ba thogapachen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de bcom ldan 'adas dang/
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rim gro dang/ bstanabakur byed parab rtsonano// danas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khorades/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nangacom ldan 'das de dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' de dag bshos la bkod de bzhugs pa mthong ngo// de nas 'atsagyi dri ma med par grugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes du
dam pa khyed kyin ng nas nigs rgyas kyi zhing de nas zas len par su sbyo/ den 'jam dwabal gyi khyon gyi rlabs kyis su yang globamed do// dunas latsa bya dri ma med par grags pas/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'daskad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi 'khora'adi 'dra ba ngo mtsho 'am/ smras ba/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ma bsrubs pa la bar s pa ra ma
bya'o zhes ma gsungs sam/ do nas latsi bya dri ma med par grags pa mal de nas ma langs par/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gamadun du sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus gsar
rgya kha dog lta bur mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan ba zhig sprul te/ gang gis 'khor de dag thams cad tshog mog por byas par 'gyurang da lta bu 'o/
nga gzugs su snang bar gyur to// de nas li tsa bya dri ma mdu bar grags bas/ sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod stang gi phyogs su song la
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi phyam snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog ces bya ba yod de/ dan dubazhin gshegs pa spos mchog/
brtsags pa zhes bya ba da ltar bshos gsol ba'i phyir bzhugs pa der song la/ de bzhin gshags pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag tsholal/ 'di skad cag gsol cig/ latsa
bya dri ma med par grags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan brgya stong du mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang
ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ khan ma tho ba ma mnga' zhing bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol zhing 'di skadacas byar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsol ba'i ma phabs bdag la stsal bar bgasol/ des 'jig rtan mya khams ma mdzad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// dman pa la mos pa'i sems can/
'di dag kyang rgya chen po la dang bar bgyid do// de bzhin gshags pa'i mtshan kyang rgyas par bgyis par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dus la
tsa bya dri ma med par grags pa la legs so zhes zhes byas nas/ de mnyan te/ byang chub sums dpa' de dag gamadunanas bzhin gyen du bltos tu song na/ byang chub sems
dpa' de dag gis de 'gro bar ma mthong ngo// de nas sprul pa'i cing chub sems dpa' das 'jig rtan gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dris chog ces bya bder phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'adas
da bzhinagshegs pa chos mchog brtsags pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalato/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a dram med par grags/
pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngas/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ 'tsho 'am/
stobs dang/ bde ba dang/ kha nas tho bam mnga' zhing bde bar rog sna la gnas sam zhes bstan gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan brgya stong du mgo
bos phyag 'tshal nas 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas gsol pa'i zhal zas kyi pham phabs bdag la stsal bar gsol/ das 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzod 'dir
sangs rgyas kya mdzad pa bgyid bar 'tshal la// dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la blo gros mos par bgyidi rung/
sangs rgyas mtshan kyang rgyas par bgyis par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sposa mchog brtsegs pa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sem
dba' de dag dromatshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa rwa la'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can chen po 'di lta
bu ga las mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khamasam mdzad de gang na mchis/ dman pa la mos pa zhes bgyi ba da lags zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' de dag
gis de skad zhus pa dang da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chubs mas dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rags kyi bu'og ga phyogs na/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gda' klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'dus pa na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams ma mdzad s bya ba yod de/ don da bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
thub pa zhes byabasAgasam lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhingan/ dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to// dan byang chub sems dpa' drim med par grags pa zhes bya ba
rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma khyabapa la gnas ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to/ des nga' mang yongs su bsags pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bstags
pa rab tu bstanapa dang/ byang chub sems dapa' de dag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba shin tu 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btang ngo// donas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
gis 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i cha ba ja snyad nadu'i sprul pa'i di yang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa 'dalta bur
gyur bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' da' che ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dusprul pa 'gyed da/ sprul
pa da dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// dunas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchoge
brtsalags pas/ drithams cad dang ldan pa'i snod du drithams cad bsgos pa'i zas blugs te/ da sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la byin no// donas pa'i tshe byang chub
sems dpa' brgya stong phrag dgu bsuangadar 'gro bar chas te/ bcom ldan 'adas bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la
blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ dri ma med par grags pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du/
mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag da du'adus la bab par shes na dang zhag/ rigs kyi budag sems can de rnams myos shAng bag med par gyur
ta re/ dra rnams med par gyis la dung zhig/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad pa'i sems can de dag spa gong bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ rang gi gzugs kyang sgyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi
khams da la'ang ngan par 'dushes bskyed nas/ khong khro ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ da pa'i phyir zhan/ rigs kyi busangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i zhing// sems can rnams yod
su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mi ston to// de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dang 'dus zhalabras de thogs nas/ byang
rgyu/ chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag dgu bcudang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ drim med par grags pa'i byon gyi rlabs kyis skad cig udatsam thar cig da nyid la 'jig rten gyi
khams sposathams cad kyi dri mchog donasam snang bar gyur te/ btsa byi zhimad bar grags pa'i khyim na'adugago/ de nas li tsa byi dri med paragrags pas sa dga' khri lcam
'drapa de lta bu'i seng ge 'i khri brgya stong phrag dgu bcu byin gyis brlabs te/ dral byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod do// de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des zhal zas kyis
bkang ba'i snod dam med par grags pa 'byin no// de nas zhal zas de'i sayangs pa'i grong khyer chen po bdugs par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du dri zhim po bsnam
par gyur to// gang yangs pa'i grong khyer bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams dwang/ li tsa byi rnams kyi dbang po latsa byi zla ba gdugs kyis dril bsnams nas/ ngomatshar du gyur/
rmadadu gyurato/ lus dang sems sam par gyuranas/ la tshadu brgyad khri bzhi stong chang ba dang lhan cig tu/ latsapa dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du zhugs so// de dag gakhyim den
byang chub sems drang 'gang dug seng ge 'i khrid tsam du mthob/ da tsam du che zhing yangs pa la 'khod pa mthong sta/ mthong nas de dgashin tu mos share rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de
dag thams cad kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ sems can chen bo de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sa la spyod pa'i lha'abu rnams dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa
dang/ gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang dri dus bskul nas/ la tsi bya dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du lhags so// de nas 'in drim med par grags pas/ gnas brtan
@#// shA ra'i bu dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas bdud rtsi thugs rje chen pos yongs su bsgros/
[r ]pa zol/ 'tsho ba' spyod pa la soms nye bar ma 'dogs shig/ sbyin pa tsanam nusaar/ de na nyan thosad/'dasnyam dusems so// zhal zas nyung du 'di la 'di lta bu'i 'khor
t+tA 'dis ji ltar ba za' snyam mo// dunas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des/ nyan thos dadag la 'di skyed ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa dag khyed rang g shes rab dang/ bsod nam
po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rape dang bsod nams sum snyoms dag/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ da 'di lta ste ( dbarAn rgya mtshochan po bzhi nad kyang sAd kyi/ zhal zus
'di la zad pa nyungaTad kyang med do// sems can thamasacad kyis zhalazas 'di kham rare btsam du bskal pa ra zos kyang/ 'dizad par m 'gyur ro// daci'i phyir zhen/ tshul khrim
dang/ shes rab dang/ tari de 'dzin mazad pa las byung ba dngazhin gshags pa'i zhalazas snod du las pa 'dazed bar minus so// danas zhal zas des 'khor thams cad l chim
par byas kyang zhal zasade zad par ma gyurato// byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs ba dang/ 'dzagartan skyong ba rnams dang/ sems can
[z/]gzhan gang gisazhal zas da zos ba de dag dkyad ji ltar 'dzag rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bde ba ci'adra ba de lta bu ' bde ba/
lus la skyes so// de dag gi spu'i khung bu nas kyang 'di lta bu'i dri 'byung ba 'di lta sta/ dpar na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog da na shing rnams la dri 'byung ba bzhin no//
do nas lam gyi dri ma med par grags bzhes bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
la'adi skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dwagag de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa de'i chos ston pa ci 'dra/ de dag gis smas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa da na yo ga dang des
pa' tshig gas chos ma ston te/ dri de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dul bar 'gyur te/ sos kyi shang gang dang gang gi drung du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dug pa de dang de dag
las 'di 'dra ba'i dri 'byung ste/ gang da ba snamasamathag tu byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ti de de 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// ting du 'dzin
dathob ma thag tu de dag thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' yin tan rnams skya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gas/ li tsabya srim med par grags pa la 'di skad ces
smras so// 'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa chos bstan pa ji lta burab tu ston par mdzad/ smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams sems can 'di dgan gdul
dka' ste// sems canedamu rgod gdul dka' ba 'di rnams la dmu rgod gdul dka' ba'i gtama rnams rab tustan to// dmurgod gdul dka' ba rnams gdul ba dang/ dmu rgod
gdul dka' bgadul ba'i gtam de gangazhan/ 'diltasta/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas so/ 'di ni gshanarjo2'jagaN+Dinano// 'di ni mi khom
rako/ 'di'i dbang po nyams par skyo bko 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'o// 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa' rnam par smin pa'o// 'din rig gas nyes par spyod pa'o////
'di ni ngag gsanyas par spyod pa'i rnam par sman pa'o/ 'dan[W]de kyis nyos par sbyor ba'o// 'di na yid kyis nyes par sbyor ba'a rnam par smin pa'o// 'di na srog gcod ba'o// 'di nas
byin par len pa'o// 'do na 'dod pa lalog par g.yem pa'o// 'dAnibardzun du sgruba'o// 'di niprama'o// 'dani ngag rtsub pa'o// 'di nitshig bcol pa'o// 'dIn brnab sems so//
'di ni gnod sems so// 'di ni log par lta ba'o// 'din de dag gi rnam par smin pa'o// 'a dane ser sna'o// 'din saMr sna'i 'bras bu'o// 'dana'ichal pa'i tshul khrims so//
ka 'di ni khro ba'o// 'dan la le'o// 'di ni g.yeng ba'o// 'di ni 'chalapa'i shes rab bo// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyig bras bu'o// 'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi las 'das pa'o//
'dun so sor thar pa'o// 'dani bya ba'o// 'di na mibya ba'o// 'di ni rnam par 'byor to// 'din spong ba'o// 'di ni sgyub pa'o// 'di ni sgrib pa med pa'o// 'di na ltung ba'o//
'dani ltung ba las byung ba'o// 'di ni lam mo// 'ad ni lamangan pa'o/ 'din dag ba'o// 'dan ma rago ba'o// 'don khanam tho ba dang bcas pa'o// 'dan khan ma tho ba med pa'o//
'dan zog pa dang bcas pa'o// 'dune zag pa med pa'o// 'dane'ajig rten pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// 'di ni 'dus byas so// 'di ni 'dus ma byas so// 'di
ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// 'din rnam par byang ba'o// 'di ni 'khor ba'o// 'di namya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes de lta burachos rnam pa du mar bshad pas/ rta dmu rgod lta bu'i
sems rab tu gnas par byed do// 'di lta ste/ dpar na rta 'am/ bal gling dmu rgod gnad du brdab pa tshun chad kyis dul bar 'gyur ro// da bzhin dusamasacan dmu rgod gduladaka'/
ba rnams kyang/ sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa'i gtam gyis dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'adas shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi chab
bzhag ste/ ran cang dbul bas sems can dmu rgod rnams 'dul ba ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' gapa 'di lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs pan 'khod pa da/
dag gsAre rje chen po' nga bsam gyis ma khyab bo// de nas latsi bya drim mad par grags pas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa drug dad bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// gang 'dare skyes ba'i/
byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgag snying rjechen po shAn tubartan no// de dag 'jig rtan gyi khams 'dir tshog cig la sems can gyi don shin tu mang du byadade/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos/
thamasacad kyi dri mchog dor bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang soms can gyi don da ltar byed ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhan/ skyes budamapa dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed 'dir gang do
dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i degababasags pa'i chos bcu yodare/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na med do// banu gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ dbul po rnams lan na bus
sdud do// tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams lanatshul khrims kyis sdud do// khong khro ba rnams la na bzod bas sdud do// le lo can rnams la nibartson 'grus kyis sdud de// sams g.yang
ba rnams la ni bsam gtan gyis sdud do// shes rab 'chal pa rnams la shes rab kyis sdud do// ma khom par 'gyur ba rnams lan mo khomab brgyad las 'da' ba ston to// nya che bar
spyod pa rnams lan thog pa chen bo ston to// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyod pa rnams lan dag ba'i rtsa bas sdud do// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis rtag tu rgyunam 'chad par sems can yongs su smin
par byed pa sta/ dag ba bsags pa'i chos bcu bo 'di dag rab tu 'dzan par 'gyur bad dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na med do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis smras pa/ chos du
dang ldan na/ byang chub sums dpa' 'jig rtenagyi khams mi mjur 'dunas shi 'phos nas/ ma smas masnyad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur/ smras pa/ chos brgyud/
dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rtenagyi khams mimajed 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ ma smas ma snad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhen/
sems can thams cad la bdag gis phan bar bya ste/ 'di dag las na phan pa cung zad kyang ma btsal lo/ sems can thams cad kyi sdugakhasngal thams cad bzod par byasta/ sa dag pa'i
rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ sums can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston pa lta bur dga' kha
dang/ thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos na ma spong ba dang/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang/ bdag gi rAd bsam sAms shange samasangs bar soms pa dang/ bdag gi
'khrul pa la so sor rtog cing gzhan byanyisab mi byed pa dang/ bgayod ba la dga' zhing yon tan thamasacad mang dgabar lenapa lta/ chos brgyad pod dag hAr ldan na/ byad/
chung sams dang 'a 'jig rten gyi khamasama mdzad nas sha'aphosanas/ masmras ma smad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas latse bya dri ma med par grags pa dang/ 'jam

sh+tsa dpal gzhonanur gyur pas da ltar 'khor der 'dus pa la da ltar chos bstan pas/ 'di ltar srog chags 'bum tshangab bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i r+yang chub tusams skyes so// byang chub sems
dang 'a khrinam skyopa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sprul pa'i zhal zas blangs ba le'u ste dgu ba'o/ a nga de'atshobcom ldan 'das amra bsrung ba'i cholanachos ston pa'i
'khor gyi khyams de'ad rgya chazhange ngas bar gyur to// 'khor dbangagasar rgya kha dog lta bur snang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das 'di ltar am bsrud ba'atshel 'dirgya chazhadeyangs par gyur pa dang/ 'khor thams cad kyang gsar gyi kha dog tu gda' ba 'di su'asnga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal
ba/ kun dga' bo 'dani lo tsabya dri ma mdabar grags pa dang/ 'jam dpal la gzhon nur gyur pa gnyis 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong
ba snga ltas so// de nas li tsakyi dri ma med bar grags pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'daskad ces smras pa// 'jam dwapal sun sutsachen po 'di dgakyang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong 'di phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ tu bu cag bcom ldan 'dasakyi drung du 'dong ngo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bud dus la bab par shes na 'dong ngo// rda
nas laso bya rjes med par grags pas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas las ji ltar 'khor thams cad gang ga' khrid dag dang bcas te/ lag pa g.yas pa' ste da
du bzhi gnas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar dong ste/ der phyin pa dang/ de dag sa la bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun
bskor te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ danas de bzhin gshegs paspos mchog brtsags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'ibyang chub sems dpa' de dgakyang sang ga'akhri las babs
ta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang sang ga' khri las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyizhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du brgyatsan dang/
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang bcom lda'adas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan/
gan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dpa' de dgal chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag rang rang gsung ga'i khri la 'khod cig/ bcom ldan
'das kyis daskad bka' stsal nas/ de dag 'khodado// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ shA ra'i bu la 'di skadatsas bka' stsal to// shar 'i bu khyod kyis sums can gyi mchog byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyis rnam par sprul pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulal/ de la khyod kyis 'dushas ja lta bur
sgyus ]gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das padag dal bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i 'du shes skyes lags so// dza ltar bsamar dang/ gzhal ba dang/ bgrang bar ma nus pa de lta burd dag gis brgyud ba bsam
gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngonam bsnams pa'i rbashag gda'an/ 'di lta bu su'i
dra lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'askul pa// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi lus kyi sgu'akhung bu thams cad nas sri 'byung ba an no// shAri'i bus smras pa/tshodang

[p]]ldan r kun dga' bo kho bo cag galus kyi spru'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'dilta bu'i dri phyung ngo// smras pa/ rId calas byung/ snus pa/ latsa bya rim med par grags pa'i das de bzhin gshags pa/
smos mchog btsugs pa/'asangs rgyas zhing 'jigartan gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog nas zhel zas de blangs te zos so cog thams cad kyi lus las dra redaltabu byung ngo// de nas tshodang ldan pa
kun dag/'khos/ la tsigyi dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// dri 'di ji srid kyi bar du 'chags par 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji srid zas ma zhuba'abar du'o// kun dga' bos smras pa/zasad
yun ja sridan zhubar 'gyur/ smras pa/ zhag bdun phrag bdun gyis zhu bar 'gyur te/ ra nas yang zhag dunatsakhar du dus mdangs rgyas par 'gyuralo// ma zhu ba'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa
kun dga' bo dgamyong gang ngos pa la ma zhugs par zhal zas 'di zisan/dwa dgangos pa la zhugs n 'ju bar 'gyur ro// nges pa la zhugs pa gang gisazhalaMzas 'di zlos pa de dag sems yongs su ma grol
gyi bar du ma 'ju'o// sems can byang chub tu sems maskyod pa gang dgags de zos pa de dag byang chub tus mas bskyodan de 'ju bar 'gyur ro// byang chub tusams bskyod pa gang dag gsazos pa de dag

bzod ba ma thob kyi bar du ma 'ju'o// bzod pa thob pa gang dag gsazos pa de dag skya ba gcig gis thogs kho na'aju bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dpar nasmanablo ldan zhes bya ba stor
lo da na/dug thams cad med par m gyur kyisar du ma 'julta/ sman de phyis 'ju bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa kun dga' bo nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rugamed par ma/
gyur[¬©]bar dubs de 'jubar ma'agyur te/ zasadasagadod 'jubar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das zhal
zas 'a dazhis das rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid do// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhan tu/ ji skadasmras pa bzhunano// kun dga' bo gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed/

pa'i s ngasargyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do// gang dag 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do// gang dag nabu ma kyishang gis sangs rgyas kyi na dzad pa khyad

pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do// gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'imtshan dang gzugs mthong bas sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed pa sha sangs rgyas kyi zhinganams kyang yod do// gang dag na chos

rgyu gos sa sangs rgyas kya mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do// de bzhin du zhal zas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad ba byadapa dang/ de bzhi n du chu dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ gzhalamad

khang dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo gang dag na sprul ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sadas rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/

[z/ ]kun dga' bonamamakhas sangs rgyas kya mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag kyang yod do// da bzhin dunan kha'adang bar snang dag sangs rgyas kya mdzad pa byed da/dalta bu s sems can dadag 'dul ba/
'gyur ro// kun dga' bo d bzhi n du rmi lam dang/ gzugasabarAnadang chu zla dang/ brag cha dad/ sgyum dang/ smag rgyu dad/ dparab stanab dang/ yag dang/ des ba'i tshig ston pas sems can dag
'a das rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// gang dganayag rnam par rig par byed pasusangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'di dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo gang na smra ba dang
brjod pand pa dang/ mkhastan pa dang/ ma brjod pasasems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyad de/ de lta bur yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zlums gyur yodado// kun dga' bo sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod lamadang/ longasaspyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa'i sims can rnams 'dul ba'aphyirasangs rgyas kya mdzad pa ma byed pa nagangayang mad do// kun dga' bo 'dug
bzhi po de dag dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sgo brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhas sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams sangs rgyas kya mdzad pa/

byed do// kun dga' kho 'dan sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'achos kyi sgolta/ chos kyi sgo 'dir zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams cad/
[s/]@#// dad ldan pa'i sa das rgyas kyi zhing rnams la zhum pa'i ngamed/ gong ba'ang med/ yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa sangs rgyas zhing rnams la dga' ba'ang mad
na snyags pa 'dam du de/ dngazhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang rab tu rami ma bskyed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa rnams kyisoms can yongs su smin par bya/

ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su ston pa don ngomatshar to// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dang gzhan du sna tshogs su 'gyur yang/ bya lam gyis khebs pa'i sangs
rgyas zhirinam mkha' la tha dad pa med pa de bzhinadu/ kun dga' bo do bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi gzugs kyisku tha dad du 'gyur yang/ da bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i ishas ni tha dad pa
ma yin/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ sku dang/ mchonadang/ rigs btsun pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ tang ngo 'dzin dang/ shis rub dung
rnam bar grol pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yi shasa mthong ab dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi'ajigs pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snyid
chen po dang/ phan par dgongs pa dang/ spyod lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ lam dang/ cho' tshod dang/ chos ston pa dang/ sems can yongs susmin par byed pa dang/ sems can rnam/
[4]par grol ba dang/ zhang yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mtshungs te/ debasanayang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de bzhan gshegs

pa zhes bya'o// sadas rgyas zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo tshigadagsum bya don rgyas ba dang/ tshig rnam par dbye ba gang yin pa don/ khyodacho'otshadabaskal par 'dug kyang bad par kun chub par sla ba mayani/
no// stod gsum du gtogs pa'i sims can rnams kun dga' bo khyod 'dra bar mang du thos pa dang/ dran pa dang/ gzungs thob ba rnams [‚Äù]nang na mchog tugyurapa kun dga' bo dang 'dra bas
sa mas can de dag thams cad kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bdang da bzhinugshegs pa zhes byab dang/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tshig de gsum gyi don gdon mi za babastan
ban skal pa'i mang kun chub par mazhus so// kun dga' bo de ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nitshod med de/ de bzhin gshags pa rnams kya shes rab dang spobs pa bsam gyis ma khyab bo// de nas
com ldan 'dasal/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'dis da ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'dus dang slan chad bdagamang du thos pa'i mchog go zhes dam ma 'cha'a'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyodazhum pa'isims bskyod cig/ daci'i phyir zhin kun dga' bo khyodanyan thos rnams la dgos te mang du thos ba'i mchog go zhes pas bstanagyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nang na
[s]@#/ nam yin no// kun dga' bo byang chub ems dpa' lta zhog gi/ de dag namakhas ba dag gas tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yan ta kun dag 'bo rgya mtsho thams cad gting ni tshod bzung ba
ba nusakyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang/ ashes dar/ dran pa dang/ gzungs dang/ spobs pa'i gting na tshod bzung bar ma nus so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
rnams la khyod btang snyoms su gyis shig de ci'i phyir zhon/ kun dag/'bolatsa bya drin med par grags pa 'dis snga dro gcig la bkod pa bstan pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa/
thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong dusung/ 'phrul dang rnam par sprul pa'i cho'aphrul thams cad kyis kyang ston mi nus so// danas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsags pa'i

zla sangs rgyas kyi zhin gnas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams tsed kyis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis

zla 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dilangan 'du shes spyod ba adil bas pa rnams spang bar 'atshalalo// de'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan ' dus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi yul dang/
thabs m khas ba nabasam gyis mkhyalta/ de dag soms can thams cad yongs susman par bgyi ba'i smad du/ ji lta jalta bur bzhed pa de lta da lta bur zhade bkod pa ston to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
'jig rten gyi khams spos thamasacad kyi dri mchog raramachis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran par 'gyur ba'i chos kyadzodas shange ba dag cag la stsal bar gsol/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ ragasal dubyang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zad pa dang/ mkhyud pa zhes bya ba yod do// de la khyed kyis bslab par bya'o// de'ang gang zhan/ zad bzhes khyab ni
'dus byas so// mazad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par mi bya/ 'dus ma byas la'ang gnas par ma bya'o// de la 'dus byas mazad panangod lta ste/
byams pa chen po las ma nyams pa'o// snying rje chen po ma btang ba'o// lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par btsud pa'i thams cad mkhyen ma'i sems ma brjod pa'o// sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la
maskyo ba'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba'o// dam pa'i chos so sasu gzungaba'aphyi'i lus dang srog 'dor ba'o// dag brtsi bdag la chog mi shes pa'o// yongs su bsngo bar mkhas pa la 'khod pa'o// chos

tshol ba la la lo med pa'o// chos bstan pa la slob dpon dpe mkhyud ma byed pa'o// ra bzhin gshags pa la bltabadang/ mchod pa'i ringos po la brtson pa'o// bsams bzhin du skyobasamasgrug pa'o// phun sum
tshogs pa dang/ rgyud pa dag lam khangs ma'i dud ba'o// ma bslabs pa rnams mawanasashang/ lobs pa rnams la ston pa ltar 'bangs lar sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rgyas pa rnams la tshul bzhin bar
[r ]@#/ sbyor ba'o// dban pa la dga' zhing rol mchags pa'o// bdag ga ba da ba la ma zhen cing/bal bde ba la gnapa'o// bsam gtan dang/ ting nga 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug ba la
mnar med pa ltar 'dushes pa'o// 'khorab la skyod mos tshal dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur 'du shas kha'o// slong ba rnams la dge ba'ibashes gnyen du'adugosapa'o// bdog pa thams
cad yongs su ga tong la/ thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid rdzogs bar byed par 'du shes pa'o// tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la bskyab par 'du shes pa'o// b.rol tu phyin pa rnams la phamar 'du shes/
pa'o// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams la bdag po g.yog tu 'du shes pa'o// dge ba'i rtsi ba'atshogs thams cad byas chog ma nas shang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingathamasacad kyi yon tan bdag gi zheng du
bsgrub pa'o/ mtshan dang dpabyad bzang po yongs su bkang ba'aphyir gtun pa med pa 'amachod sbyin yongs su gtong ba'o// sdug pa thams cad mkhyad pas lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms brgyan pa'o// lus
dare ngag yongs su dag risoms yongs su dag pas/ bskal pa grangasamed par 'khor ba'o// sems dpa' bsasangs rgyas kyainatan tshad med pa thos kyang zhum par ma'agyurab 'o// nyon mongs pa'i dag
tshar gcad pa 'phyi'i(shes rab mtshon rnon po thogs pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur ba'aphyir phung po dang/ khams dad/ rgya mchad kun shes ba'o// bdudakyilde gzhom pa'i phyir brtson

'a grus 'bar ba'o// dargyalamed pa'i phyir yang shas tshol ba'o// chos gzung ba'i phyir 'dod pa nyung zhadichog shes pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad na mthong na dga' bar bya ba'aphyi'i 'jig rten chos thams cad d

ma 'dras pa'o// 'jig rtan dngamathun par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad las ma nyams pa'o// bya ba thams cad yang dag par bstanaba'aphyir mngon par shes pa skyed pa'o// thos ba thams cad gazung pa'i

phyi'i gzungs dang dran pa dang/ lo shes so// sems can thams cad kyiwi chomagacad pa'i phyir dab ngado mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'o// chos bstan pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med pa'o// spobs

pa thob pa rab tu rAdapas slobs pa thogs pa med pa'o// dag ba bcu'alas kyi lam yongs su dag pas lha dang mi'iphun sum tshogs pa myong ba'o// tshad med pa bzhi rab tu skyod pas tshangs pa'i lam du 'god pa'o//
chos bstan par gsol ba dang/ rdzas su yi rang bar legasaso nasakhyakhyen pasas pas rgyas debyang sarab tu rdzob pa'o// lus dar/ ngag dang/ yadi sdom pa khyad par du 'gro ba dang/ chos thams cad las
chags bas/ songs rgyas spyod lam rab tu thob pa// byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dunasdud pas/ thag pa chen po la yang dag par 'dzud ba'o// yon tan thams cad chud mi za bas bag yod
pa yin ta/ ragis[¬©]bu doltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la brtson zhing/ byang chub sems dapa' 'dus byas zad par mkhyodado// jaltar 'dus ma byas lami gnas shon/ gang gi tsho stong ba nyid
labyang bar byed cing/ stong pa nyid mngon sum du'ang ma byed/ mtshan ma mdab la yongs su khyadangar byed kyang/ mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du'angam byid/ smon pa med pa la lo du/
sur+yang ra byed kyar/ smon pa med pa mngon sum du'ang mkhyid mngon par 'dum byed pa la yongs su byang bar byed kyang/ mngon par 'dum byed pa mngon sum du'ang mkhyod/ ma rtag par so sor
rtog kyang dag ba'artsi bsachog ma shes/ sdugabasdal bar so sor rtog kyang bsams bzhin du skye/ bdagam dpar so sor rtog kyang bdag yongs su 'dor ba'ang ma yin/ zhi bar so sor rtog
kyang shin tu zhi ba'ang ma skyid/ dben par so sor rtog kyang lus dang sems kyang 'bad/ gnas mad par so sor rtog kyang/ dkar po'i chos kyi gtum spong ba'ang ma yin/ 'byung ba med par so
sor rtog kyang sems can rnams kyi khurablangs pa'i ngathogs/ zag pa med par so sor rtog kyang 'khor ba'irgyud las slong bur yang byed/ rgyu ba med par so sor rtog kyang/ sems can yongs su
smanabar bya ba'i phyir sgyubarang 'gyur/ bdag mad par so sor rtogakyang/ soms can la snying rdzachan bo ma 'dor/ ma skyabaso sor rtog kyang/ nyan thos kyings bar yang m ltung/
la gsog dang/ gsob dang/ snyade po med pa dang/ bdag po med pa dang gnas med pa so sor rtog kyang/ bsod nams gsog ma yin pa dang/ ye shesagasob ma yon pa dang/ brnag
pa yongs su rdzogs shing rang byung ba'i gnas su dbang bskur ba dang/ redubyung ba'aye shes la brtson pa dang/ nges pa'i donas nigs rgyas kyi rigs la rab tu gnas ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu
daltar na de lta bu'i chos la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhi 'dus ma byas lomi gnasashing/ 'dus byas kyang zad par mkhyid do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' na bsod
nags kyatshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la m gnas aso// ye shes kyitshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par ma byed do// byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir
'dus ma byas la m gnas so// snyade rngachan po dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par ma byed do// sems can yongs susman par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la ma gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams la mos pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par ma byed do// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs par khyaba'i phyir 'dusam byas la m gnas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs
bar bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad param byed do// thabs lamakhas pa'i phyir 'dus mkhyasalama gnas so// shes rab kyis shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'dus byas zadwapar mkhyadado// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
ongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la ma gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyare 'dusabyas zad bar mi byed do// sems can gyi don myong ba'aphyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so//
chos kyi don yang dag par bstan pas 'dus byas zad par ma byed do// dag ba'ilcapa'i tshogs kyi phyir 'dusamabyas lami gnas so// dgapa'i rtsa ba'i bag chags kyi phyir 'dus byas
zad par 'byed do// smonalam lo ngas su rdzogs bar bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so// smonaba med ba'aphyir 'dus byas zad par ma byed do// bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la
m gnas go/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mkhyad do// mngon parabs ldas rnamakhar rtsen pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la ma gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi yabashesakyi mngon/
pa ra shes pa drug gi phyir 'dus byas khrod bar mi byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su bskang ba'aphyar 'dus ma byas la ma gnas so// dus yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi
byed do// chos kunor kun bsdu ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la ma gnas so// nyi tshe ba'i chos m 'a dod pas 'dus byas zad par mkhyid do// chos kyi sman kun sdud pa'i phyir 'dus mabyas lu ma gnas so// ci
rigs bar chos kyi sman sbyor ba'i phyir 'dus byas zapham khyad do// dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas lam gnas so// dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'aphyir 'dus byas zad
bar mkhyad do// chos kyi thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dusam byas la ma gnas so// 'di ltar chos chung du'osman sbyor ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mkhyad do// da nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad
yongs su shes pa'i phyir 'dus mabyas la ma gnas so// nad thams cad zhi ba'i phyir 'dus byas 'dra bar ma pyid do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par ma byed cing/
'dus byas lam gnas te/ dan byang chub sems pa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgozad pa dang/ mazad pa zhes bya ba yin no// skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis kyang de la brtson par gyis shig/ de
nas byang chub sems dong 'di dag bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tsham zhing mgu lam rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' de dag dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten khamasa' dathams cad phyi ma dang/ spos dang/ bdug ba mang bo thams cad dang/
gtog sa pus mo nub tsam du kha bas par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang mngon par dgram pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
ldan 'adus la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ched du brjod pa brjod cing/ dran s sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas ma snang bar gyur ta/ skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams
cad kyi dri mchog dar 'khod do// zad pa dang mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// kare nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ la tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces
khaza ba ka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gatshad bzhin gshegs pa la blta lor 'dod par gyur pa 'tsho/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar lta/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa/
[n ]dang bcom ldan 'das la/ li tsa byi hrimamad par grags pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tsho bdagad bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar 'chol ba de'i tsho/ de bzhin gshegs
pas mthong bas ltalags so// ston tsamatha'anasam skyag pa dang/ phyima'i mtha ma'apho ba dang da ltar gyi dus la'ang ma nas bar la lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
wAkya'i nga bzhun te/ gzugs ma mchis pa'o// chor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhinakyi tshor bam mchis pa'o// 'du shesar bzhin nyid kyis nga bzhin taM/ 'du shes ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed kyi
