de bzhin nyidi rang bzhinata/ 'du byed mamachis pa'o// rnam pa shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhinata/ rnam bar ngashes pa ma mchis pa'o// khams bzhin ma gnas pa sta/ nam mkha' dang
sgyu mtshungs pa'o/ skyemachod drug namasmyos pa lta/ mig galamalas shan tu 'das pa/ rnapa' lamalas shin tu 'das pa/ snya'alamalas shan tu 'das kha/ lca' lam las shan tu'adas pa/
lus kyilam las gzhi tu 'das pa// yar kyi lam las ni tu 'das pa// khams gsum pa dang ma 'dras la/ dram gsum dang bralal/ rnam par thar pa gsum gyi rdzas su mchis pa/ rig

ka pa lagasum tho ba la/mthob pa yang dag par thob pa/ chos thams cad la ma chags pa 'amathur phyin pa yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha'/ mtha' mamachis pa de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa// de phan tshun du bral/
brgyusamabaskyod pa/ rkyen larag ma lus kha/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyidam mchis pa dang bcasalamalags la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i ng ma lags pa/ mtshan nyid tha dad
kha'angam lags l/ rtogs par 'gyurang 'ang ma lags pa/ kun tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/ rnam par rtogs bar 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/ pha rolana'ang ma lags pa/ tshu
rolana'ang ma lags pa/ dadusana'ang ma lags pa/ 'dana'ang ma lags pa/ pha bi na'ang ma lags pa/ dan 'dam la gas pa/ gzhan na'ang ma lags pa/ rnam pa shes pas 'tshol bar/
bda'ang malags ba/ rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i ng lags b/ mun pa'i dom lags pa/ snang ba'angam lags pa/ mngam mchis pa/ mtshan mamachasal/ nyamachud
ba'ang ma lags pa/ stobs dang ldan pa'i ng ma lags pa ]yul la ma nas shanga phyogs nam gnas pa/ dgo ba'ang ma lags pa/ mi dgaba'ang ma lags/ 'dus byas kyang ma lag
ba/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma lags pa gang gi don du'ang brjod pa ma lags ba/ sbyin par yang ma lags pa/ sor snar yang ma lags l/ tshul khrims su'ang ma lags pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul
khrims su'ang ma lags pa// bzod par ma dam lags pa/ gnod sems su'ang ma lags pa/ brtson 'grus su 'dam lags l/ lakhoras ngam lags pa/ bgam/
gtan du'angamalabs padrugayo bar ram lags ba/ shes rab tshul ng ma lags pa/'chal pa'i debasarag tu 'ang brjod pa ma lo gas pa// bden par yang mal gsab/ brdzun bar yadom
la gas pa/ nges par 'byon pa 'dam lags la/ nges pa'i m 'byanepa 'damalags pa/ 'grobar bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa/ 'gro bar mngagyi ba 'a ma lags pa/ smras pa dang spyod pa
thams cad shin tuchad pa ste/ nad dugyur pa'i ng ma lags pa/ zhing du ma gyur pa'i ng ma lags pa/ sbyin par 'os pa 'ang ma lags ba sbyin par m 'os pa 2 dam lags pa/ gzud
ba'ang ma lags pa/ rog bar bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ 'du ma bgyis pa// grangs dang bral kha/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa/ chos nyid kyis mtshungs pa/
( mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ brtson 'grusamatshungasakhalamachis pa/ gnalabalaashani tu 'das pa/ song ba'ang ma lags pa/zhugs pa'i ngamalags l/ shin tu 'das pa'i ng ma lags
kha (mkhong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ bye brag byed pa dang/ rnam par rig la'ang ma lags pa/ mdud pa zams cad m mchis kha/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes dang mtshungs pa thob pa/chos
thams cad lasnyogasashang chos thams cad la bye brag mamachis pa thob pa// thams cad kha namakho'amamachis pa// ci'angamamatshas ba/ sAgasamam mchase ba/ mi rtag pa/ rnam par m rtog/
ba ma bgyir/ ma skyes dra/ ma 'thon la/ mgyur ba/ kun s mabyung ba/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa// 'byung bar ma gyur ba 'angamalags pa// 'jigs pa ma
mchis pa/ kun gzhi ma mchis pa mya nganamamachis pa/ dga' ba mamachiso pa/ rlabasomamachis pa/ thadad pa bstan pa/ thamasacad kyis brjod par bgyi bam lags pa ste/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun 'a di'i dra ste/ dal daltar pa lta lags so// gang las de ltar mthong ba danas da dgu par mthong ba lags so// gang gsam pa gzhan du mthong ba dan phog
bar mthong ba lags so/ da nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshe dang ldan pa shar 'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu drama med par grags pa 'dis ngas rgyas kyi zhingag da nas shi/
'bos te sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar 'i bu khyod kyis smyos bu dam pa 'dis khyod gang nas sha'aphos te 'dir skyes zhes dris shig/ da nas tshe dang ldan
shAri'idus li tsa byi dril med par gral das pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod sen gnas sha'i phos te 'di'i skyas/ ma medar ragrags pas smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis chos gar mngon sum
kha @#// dubyas pa'i chos de la'achi 'pho 'am skye ba gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/chos de la'achi 'pho 'amaskye ba gang yang ma da do// smras pa/btsun pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin du chos thamasacad/

'chi 'bomadatsang/ skya ba med pa la ci'i phyir na de lta bur khyod gang nas sha'i phos shing/ 'di'i skyes snyam dusams/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i budamad dam/ skyes pa la khyod gang
nas sha 'phos shing/ 'dir smyos zhes sun/ dril lan ji skadacas gdab/ smras pa/ rigasadu sprul pa la 'chi 'pho'angamed/ skya ba'ang mdan/ da tsazhig lan 'don/ smras pa/ btsun
pa shA ra'i bu chos thams cad na sprul pa'i rang bzhin nozhes da bzhin gshegs pasam gsum sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu der bzhinano// smras pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu chos thams cad sprul
baba'i nga bzhaltakhul/ ci'i phyir khyod 'disnyam du khyodag las sha' pos rdo 'dir rgyas snyam dus nas/ btsun pa shar 'ibu 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// skya paM

nas bya ba don de mngon par 'du byed pa'irgyun no/ 'di la byang chub sams dang 'a 'tsho'apo'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed bzad pa'i m byed do// deskya ba'angamadAg pa'i rgyu 'brel bar ma byed do//
tanas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon pa ra dga' banas de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrug ba'i
ka drung nas 'dir 'ongs so// gsol la bcom ldan 'das skyas budam pa 'disangs rgyas kyi zhing de tsam du rnam par dag pa nas mchisate/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nongs pa mang po'askyon chags pa la
mngon par dga' ba ngomatshar to// de nas la phyi bya drima med bar grags pas smras pa// shar 'i bu 'di dzisnyam dusems/ nyi ma'i 'od rnams mun pa dang lhan cig 'grogs sam/ smras pa/dom tshani
no// rigs kyi bu de gnyis ma'i grogasate/ cha ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tumun pa thamasacad med par 'gyur ro// smras pa// ci'i phyir na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma 'char/ smras pa// dan
snad bar bya ba dang/ mun pa bsal ba'i phyir ro// smras pa// btsun pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin dubyang chub soms dpa' d gnas ems can rnams yongs su sbyang ba dang/ angashas kyisnang ba bya ba
dang/ mun pa chen po bsal pa 3phyir/ bsams bzhin dusangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa rnams su skyo ste/ nyonanongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnasashing sems can thams cad kyi
nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i ng rnam par sol to// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad 'jig rtan gyi khams mdon par dga' ba de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa da dung/ byang chub sems dpa' re
dag dang//nyan thos chen po de dag bdag cag gis blta'osnyam du skom par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis 'khor de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugasakyis mkhyenanas/latsabya drima medabar
grags pa la 'di skadacas pa la/'a stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di'i jis rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de dang/ de bzhinagshegs bama'i khrugs pa d mthong bar 'dod/
sa kho'a'adi la khyod kyis ston mi donas latsaphyi drim med par grags las 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag song ba'i khri 'a di las ma langs par 'jig rten gyi khamasa mngon par dga' bde dang/
wA byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong du ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driDa dang/ lha ma yin gnas pa khor yug gi ris bskor ba dang bcas pa dang/ 'bab chu dang/ mtshe'u dang/ chu
ba mgi dang/ mtsho dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'obs dang bcas pa dang/ rarib dang/ ra lag sa kA na kho la reg pa dang/ rtsa pa dang/ 'a ma dang// skar mar bcas pa dad/
lha rar/ klu dar/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba ' gnas su bcas pa dang/ tshadas pa' gnas dang/ 'khor du bcas pa dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
ziljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ mar bcas pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyim du bcas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ricas pa dang/ nyan thos[¬©]'khor dang bcas pa dang/
rgyu da bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub tishang dang/ don de bzhin gshegs pa ma'i khrubs pa'i ng 'khor rgya mtshosnyad kyi nang na bzhugs shang sa'achad pa dang/ gang pasmad g phyogs bcu
nas mnatsana rnams la sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed pa de dag dang/ zhi bo che'i skas gsum 'dzam bu'i gling nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas kyi bar na mngon par 'phags pa'i skas de la/sum cu rtsa gsum/
pa'i lha rnams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs po la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bkon bkur bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu gling du kha ba/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams na/ sum cu
rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta pa'i phyir/ sum rtsa ba/sum ba'a gnas su 'dzag pa de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa tshogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de'i cha 'phung bo nas bzung
sta/ 'og min gnas kyi bar ru rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin ru nyi chor bcad re lag pa g.yas pas blangs nas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba bzhin du thogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar gzhug go/
bcug nas kyang 'khor 'di thams cad la bstan par bya'osnyam mo/ danas li tsa byi rimamar dar grags pa de 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di lta bu 'ardzu 'phrul mngon par
bdu bya ba mngon par byas te/'jig rtan gyi khams mngon par dga' ba da 'chor bcad nas/lag pa g.yas bas blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcug go/ de na nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' dang lha dang/ mi gang dag lha mig dang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag gis skad cher bos pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'tshal te// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag 'chal to// de bzhin
(gshe las ba bdag cag gaskyer mdzod cig ces ga so la pa dang/ 'dul ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/byang chub sags dpa' drim med
ba'agrugs bar khyerang dgara'i u lan un no// danag ltadang ma lasogs pa gzhan dag gis ni dag cag gar phyir mngagasum thod do/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de 'jig gyi khas
T+Tha mimajed 'dir bcug kyang 'jigarten gyi khams 'dagadar ma bribaram ngam gyur to/dog cing gzar ba'ang ma dado// 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de'ang bribam dedaldan dzalta ba bzhin duphyi
na 'ong dpazhan dusnangare/ dazhus bcom ldan 'adasakya thub pas/ 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal/ grogs po dag 'jig rtan gyi khamasa mngon par dga' ba dang/ derazhan gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyizhing bkod pa dang/ nyan thos bkod pa dang/ byang chub sems dang da bkod pa 'di dag la ltos shag/ de dag gsal sol kha/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/
zla sangs rgyas zhing 'di 'drab yongs su gzung par 'dod pa'i byang chub sams dpa' de panAzhigshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su bslab par bya'o// de ltar
'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho' phrul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bstan bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lha dang/ ma dang/ skye dgu las

khri phrag bcu bzhi bla na med pa a dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mas skyes so// kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khamasa mngon par dga' ba dar bar smon lamabatab ste/ bcom ldan 'dus akyang de dag thams cad
'jig rten khams mngon par dga' bar skye bar lung bstan to// daltar latsi trim med par grags pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad 'adorasems can yongs su sman par bya ba nyid yod pa de dag thams cad
sman par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de slar gnas jilta ba bzhin du bzhag go/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i khul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA
ri'ibu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa de mthong m/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'adas bdag gis mthong lags so// sems can thams

cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de 'dra bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyang rigs kyi bu latsabya drim me da par grags pa ji lta ba de 'drab 'ardzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang skyes
bu dam pa 'di lta bu mthong ba thob panarId pa legs par red lags// gang dag thand ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can
dag kyang rnyed pa rab tunadabar 'gyuran/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang/ yid chos pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ mosanas ston pa dang/ radatu
[s ]@#// 'donapa dang/ gzhan dag lang 'chad pa dang/ sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su sbyor ba rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gsugapar thob par gyur pa da
dag kyang chos ran po cha' gter nod par 'gyur go/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kha ton dubgyid pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshags pa 'grogs su gyur ba lags so/ gang dag chos 'di la mos ba rnams la

rim gro dang bsnyenabakur bgyid pa de dgan chos yang dagarar srungab lags so// gang dgachos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te 'chang ba dang/ ra mor bgyid pa de dag gi khyim nA de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs

par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes sum rangs ba dedaganabasodanams thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las thanAtshag bzhipa'i tshogs su bcad pa//

gcig tsam dang/ sdom pa'i chog tsam yang gazhan dag la ston pa de dag ni/ chos kyi mchod sbyakhan po bgyidad lags so// gang dgachos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod pa dang/ 'dun ba dang/ blo gros dang rtog
pa dang/ lta ba dang/ mos pa dag nad nyid de dag la lung bstan pa lags so// 'jigartan gyi khams mngon par dga' kha blangs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcugag pa'o//
skadanas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ston derazhin gshags pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/

0 chos kyi rnam grangs brgya stong mang bo thos kyang ji ltar chos kyi rnam gro sa'adi la rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa rang tubastan pa 'di lta bu sngon nam yang ma thos lags so// bcom/

ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i dzanab dang/ 'chang ba dang klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa de dag kyang the tshom ma mchis par 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du gyur na/ gang dag
bsgom pa'i rnal 'byoral rjes su sbyor ba rnams lta smos kyang ca'atshalato/ de dag gis ngan song thams cad na khecad/ de dag gse bde 'gro'i lam thams cad na/ de dag sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis na

gzig sa/rwadag gas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni bcom de dag gis bdud thams cad na shin tu pham par bgyis/dadag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mna rnamabar sbyangs/rudag byang chub kyi skyo de po lanagenas/
dodag dpazhanagshegs pa'i spyod yul lan yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba de dag la bdag 'khor

thams cad dang bcas bsaram gro dang g.yog bgyi'o/ grong dang/ grongakhyor dang/ grong rdal dwang/ ljongs dar/ mula 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'daspyod pa dang/
'chad pa dang/ rab tu stonub dar chos nyan pa'i slad du bdag g.yog dang bcas tamago/ rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams nadan rab skyed par bgyi/ dad pa rnams nAchos dang ldan pas bsrungazhadibaskyab par
[s/ ]ga/ bgo/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po ba rgya khyon la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// lha'arib nga po khyod kyis legs//

[a ]par smras pa de la/ de bzhin gshags pa 'ang rjes su yi rang ngo// lha'i dbang po 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyibyang chub danachos kyi rnamagrangs 'di
las bstan// lta'adabang bod pas na gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ thanaglags khamal 'dri ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi dumo de dag gisana'adas pa dang/ mon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stod
paN+NaM gsum gyi steng chen ro'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di da bzhanagashigs pas yongs su gang ba 'di lta ste/ dab ranabu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu 'tshol lam/ smag ma'atshol lam/ tal gyi zhing
ma/so ldeng tshol bzhin du rab tugang ba rnams la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhagapar rim gror byas/ bla mar byas (bsta stang dubyas to/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod pa thams
cad dang/ bdaba' byad thams cad i mchod pa dang/ da bzhin gshegs pa do dag lo ngasasumya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i re la'ang mchod pa'i phyir/ gcig tu mkhregs pa ma zhig pa'i sku
gdung mchod rtan rin po che thams cad las byos pa/ rgyur klong chen po bzhiba'a'ajig rtenagyi tshad tsam/ 'phang du na tshangs pa'i 'ajig rten du phyin pa/gdugs dang/ ba dan dang/ grog shang bsgrangs
pas mdzes par ba tu byas te/ de bzhin du da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten so sor byas nas/ dasad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par me tog thams cad dang/ spros thams
cad dang/ rgyal mtshan thams cad dang/ ba dan thams cad kyis mchod pa byas shang rnga dang sal snyan rnams brdungs tamachodan/ lha'adebang po 'di jo snyam dusems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
mod dag pa'i gzhalas bsod nams mang du bskyod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'dasamangalags so// nga dbar gshegs pa mang lags te/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong gis kyang bsod nams kyi phung
po dA' mthur phyin par ma nus lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po khyod mes bar bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// ganga rnamapar thar ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan
ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams shin tu med du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhan/ lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub n chos las byung sta/ dachos kyis mchod par nus kyi/ zangawang gson ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'das kyang 'adi ltar ragi par bya ste/ lha'i
[7/ ]@#// dbang po ston byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos gungs medar/ rgya cha ba/ tshad mad po// bsam gyis khyab par gyurd pa'i dus de 'tshon/ bskal/
pa rnam par sbyong ba la 'jig rten gyi khams cher bkod par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rag pa dang zhabs su ldan ra// bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten

mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'akha lo sgyur ba/ blunamed pa// lha dang ma rnams ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasasman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sta/ d bzhi n gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal bod2tsho'i tshod na bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gyur to// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dunan bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do// byang chub sems dpa'i dge

'dun nabye ba khrag khrig phrag bcuganyasi yod do// lha'arib nga ro da'i tshade'i dusan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba gling bzhi la dbang ba/ rinapo cha sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/
( du 'khu dpa' ba/ rtulaphod pa/ yan luga mchog gi gzugasadang ldan pa// pha rol gyi sdorab tu 'jomapa stong du tshang ba yod do// rgyal po rin chen gdugs das bcom ldan 'das dang shan gshegs pa sman

gyargyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bar gyibaskal pa lnga'abor dub de nga' yobyad thams cad kyis ri mor byas so// lha'i dbang po bal gyibaskal pa lnga po da dag 'das nas// rgyalapo rin chen gdugs kyis ( bu stong

[j]la 'di skad cesasmras so// kye khyod shes par gyis shig/ ngas na de bzhin gshagasar lamachod pa khyosakyis/ da khyed kyis kyang de bzhin gshags pa la mchod par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de
dgar rgyal bo nichanagadugs la lags so zhes smras nas/ domnyan tod dang lhan cig chogs nas/ d bzhi nagshegs pa sman rgyal po la bskal pa kham ldakhar dubadaba'i khyod thams cad
kyis rim gro byas so// de'i nan gnas rgyal bu zlag dugs zhes bya bdagacig pu dben par son gnas / 'di snyam du sams te/ mchod pa de bas mchod pa gzhan chos khyad par du 'phags shing rgya che ba yod
dam snyam pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis par snangad las lha dag 'di skad ces zer ro// skyes bu dam pachod mchod pa namachodapa thams cad zhing na mchog go/ das smras pa chos kyi
mchod pa dag nga An lhas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa smanagyi rgyal bo'i drung dusong la/ chos kyi mchod pa dgang lags zhes zhus shig dang/ bcom ldan 'das des khyod
lu nga ston to// de nas lha'i dbang po// rgyal bu zla gdugs gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa' sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la la khader song phyin
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago bos phyag 'tshalato/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adu gnas / rgyal bu zla gdugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi
rgyal pod la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi mchod pa chos kyimachod pa zhes bgyi ba'i chog mchod pa dgang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
bar rags kyi bu chos kyamachod panag dra bzhin gshags bas gsungs pa'i madosde zab mo khrubamorasnang ba/ 'jig rten thamasad dung mi mthunang rtogs b.rudaka' ba/ mthong bar dka2ba khong du chudabar

dka' ba/ phrab zhib pa/ mdemags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snodakyi nang du gtogs pa gzungs dang mdo sda'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ phyiram ldog pa'ikhor lo ston pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug

las khyungab/ 'dzin pa rnams yongs su bzung ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogasakyi chos dang ldan// byang chub[‚Äù]yan lag sgrub par gatogs pa/ sems can l snying rje chen po 'jug pa// byams ba chen po ston pa/
bdud kyi lte bar gyur pa thams cad med pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan// bdag med pa// sems can m der/ srog medwar/ gang zag med// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon
pachod pa dang/ mngon par 'dum byed pa dang/ ma skyes ba dang/ ma byung ba dngaldan pa/ byang chub kyi stodi bo sgrubal/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ltadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dritha/
dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis rab tu bstodi'i ba sngags ba/ dam ba 'chos kyi rigs rgyunam gi cod ba/ chos kyi mdzod 'dzin ba/

pa'i rig pa la 'jug pa// chos kumedog rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhib las nges par byung ba/ sorasnacan dang/ tshul khrims 'chalab dang/ gnod sems can dang/ lalo
can dang/ brjed ngas ba dang/ shasarab 'chal ba spu 'grong ba dang/ phas kyi rgol ba lta ba ngan pa dang/ dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad sdang bar byed pa/ sas rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/
'khorapa' phyogs kyi gnyen po/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'bad ba yang dag par ston pa da ltabu'amado sde rnams gang yang dag par ston pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ so sor rtogs pa dang/ dam pa 'chos kun sdud
ba dachos mchod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan ya dachos kyi mchod pa ni gong chos la chos su nges par sams pa/ chos la chos bzhin nan tan byed pa dang/ rtan cing 'brel par 'byung poramathun pa//
mthar lta ba brams cad dang bral la// rgya bam dpa/ 'byung ba med pa la bzod pa// bdag med pa/ sems can med par 'jug pa// rgyu dang rkyen dngama'agal/ 'thab pa med pa// rtsod pa med pa/ pa'i ba med
ba/ dar 'dzan ba dang bralal/ don la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru lamartonab/ shesal rton gyi/ rnamakhar shes pa la martenab/ ngas ba'adon gyi mdo sde la rtonagyi/ drang pa'i don kun rdzob la mngon bar m
u@#// zhanang/chos khrid la rtonatsa/ gang zag tu lta ba dmags dar 'dzanib la mngon par ma zhand/ sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khod du chud pa// kun gzhacha dpar 'jug pa//

[DA/ /]kun gzhi yang dag par 'jom pa marag pa rnam par zhi banas/ rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yadam pad ba dang/ 'khrug kha'apar du rnam bzhizhing/ de ltar
rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ain lag bcu gnyis la 'di lta ste/ sems can l lta bsazad ma shes pa mngon par bsgrub bsa mngon du bsgrubacing/lta ba rnams la ma lta ba 'di'i rigs kyi bu bla named
pachos kyi mchod pa zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po de ltar rgyal bu zla gdugs dbcom ldan 'das da bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal bor las chos kyi mchod pa da lta bu thos pa dang/ rdzasasumathun pa'i chos
kyi bzod pa thob bo// gos dang rgyan tsathogs pa bcom ldan 'das de la phulanas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das rdo bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang/ dam pa'i chos yongs
su gzungab dang/dam pa'i chos lamachod pa bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar spro'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ba dag gas bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams bcomanas/bcom ldan 'das
kyidam pa'i chos longs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par gasol/da bzhinagshegs pas do' risam pa mkhyenanas/ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshon/dam pa'i chos kyi

07 grong khyer skyong zhing srung ba dang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyurab ralung bstanato// lha'i dbang po da nas rgyal buzlag dugs de de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs bzhin dudadapas khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung ste//
dge ba'i chos la brtson 'grus brtsamasunas gnas so// dbartson 'grus brtsamasashade dag ba'i chos la rab tu gnas pas/rang bo ma lon bar mngon par shes pa lnga bskyod da/gzungs rnams rtogs bar khong
du chudabar gyur to// despobs pa rgyun ma'achadapa thobs/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags basmanagyi rgyal bo dayongs su mya nganalas 'das nas kyang mngon par shes pa dang/ gzungs kyi stobs kyis

btsom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegos pa sman gyi rgyal po des chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskorab bzhin du/ bar gyi bskal ba dusu'i bar du rjes su bskor to// lha 'dabang po daltar dag slod zla gdugs dam pa'i

chos longs subazung ba la mngon par brtson pas/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag bcun slanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par byas par gyur to// srog chags khrag khri'i phrag bzhi

bcu na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa la btul lo// samasacan tshadan dba rnams n mtho ris su skyo bar byas so// lta'adebadu po ro'atsha da'i dusanA rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal

bor gyur ba de gzhan an pa snyam du'adzan/ lha'i dbang po khyod kyis daltar m blta'o// daci'i phyir zhan/rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa de da'i tshora'i dusan nachan gdugs zhes bya ba'i khor los sgyur
pa 'i rgyalakhoragyur to// rgyal po rin chanagadugs dalta bu stong yod pa de dag ni da ltar rgyaleskal pa bzang po'i phyi nga chub sems dpa 2 'di dag yan tu gar bskal pa bzang po 'dilasangs rgyas

stong tshang bar 'byung ba'o// de las gzhanicung sta/ lhag ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ba 'jig la sogs pa snang mdzad la thug pa 'khor du sto/ tha maranade bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad ces bya ba
'byung ngo// lha'i dbang po pa'i tshor 'dusan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba dang/ rgyal kuzlagadugs zhes bya ba de gzhan Anapa snyam du 'dzanan/

khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ lha'i dbang po dpa' tshada'adus na rgyal po zla gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to// lha'idabang po rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'diltar rig par bya sta/ lha'i dbang po jatsamar/
bzhin gshegs pa rnams lamachod pa'i nang na chos kya mchod pa na mchogacos bya'o// mchog dang dam pa dang/ mchogarab dung/ gnom pa dang/ bla ma dang/ thun med pa zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang
bod bsanang lazang zang gsamamachod par chos kyi mchod pas mchod gi/ nga la zang zing gis ba[W]stang mkhyad par chos kyi lta stang gsar mar gyis shig/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa' sams dpa' chon po byams pa la bka' stsalapa/ byams pa ngas cha named pa mang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang nupa bskal pa bye ba grangs mepar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i di khyod la gtad
do/ cazhis ma'i dus phyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu khyod can gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas/ 'dzam bu'agling du rgyas par 'gyur zhingem nub par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/

byams pama'ongs pa'i dusan/ rigs kyi bu pho dang/ rigasakyi bumadang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyod pa// bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dim thos pas nyams par gyur tu ra/ 'dilta bu'i mdo sde thos nas shin tu dga' zhing dad pa nod par 'gyur ba dang/ spyi bos len par 'gyur ba'i
rigs kyibu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsrung pa'i phyir byams pa khyod kyis de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'diskyes par gyis shag/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgyanA'adi gnyis te/

gnyis gang zhanA tshig dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs la dadapa' phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi tshulawar mos mi skrag cing yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ byams pa dganyis ni byang chub sems

dpa 2 rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag tshig dang tshig 'brusna tshogs la dad cid lhur len pa dadag ni las dang po pa yane tsa/ tshangs par spyad nas rade por ma lon par rig par

bya'o// byams pa gang dgamado sde zabamo ma gos pa phrugs dang snulana'i rgyud tshig dang/ rim pa rab tu dbye ba 'di 'don pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ mos pa dang/ ston par 'gyur pa'i byang chus sa dabu0f09da dgan rede ru
tshangs bar spyad par rig par bya'o// byams pa de la las dad po pa khyed chub sems dpa' n skye gnyis kyis bdag la rma 'byin te/chos zab mo la nges par sems par 'gyur///
gnyis gang zhen/ sngon ma thos pa'i mdo zabamo thosan sbrag ng zatsom du gyur nas rjes suyaring ba mkhyad cing/ 'di lta ste/ bdag cag gis ston m thosan/ dgun gnas 'ongs zhes spong bar byed do/
rigs kyi bu gang dag mdo sde zabamo 'dzin pa dang/ chos zabamo'i snod du gyur pa dang chos zab mo ston pa da dag lam ston mi 'grogs/ bsnyen bkur ma byed tsang/ dodrug la blta stangs
khyadapar rgyu rate/ bar bar du da dag lamasbyin dar mdang rjod do// rgyud gnyis kyis las dang po pa 'a byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyidi larma 'gato/ chos zab mo la ngos par ma rtog go/
rgyu gnyis kyisazab mol mos pa byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la rma 'byineti/ ma skyes pa'i chos la'ang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// gnyis gan gzhon/ las dang po pa spyad nusu/
rodi bo ma lon pa 'byung chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyan shang khyadadu gsod pa 'dzan du ma'i jug/ ma byed maston pa dang/ ga ngazabamo la shin tu dad pas bsub pa la rami byed cing 'jig rten gyi
zang zing sbyin pas naasems M can rjes su 'dzin gyi/chos kyisbyin pas ma yin te/ byams pa zab mol mos pa 'khyang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'di gnyis kyi bdag nyidi la gnod par 'gyur te/ma skyepa'i chos
la bzod pa 'da myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de skad cas bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub samasadaba'akhyoms pas 'di skad ces gsol to//ngomatshar to// bcom ldan 'das
legs par gsungos so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da slan chad de lta bu'i nongs pa rnams spang bar dbya'o// de bzhin gshegs khas blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyang chub bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs kha 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// gzung bar bgyi'o// ma 'ongs pa 'arigs kyi bu pho dang/ rigs kyi bu mo snod du gyur ba de dag lamado sde 'di lta bu lag
tu son par bgyi'o// dran pa dag/gas mdosI 'di 'dra ba'i mdo sde 'di lta bu la mos pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ kun chub pa dang/ 'dzud pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher
'chadabar 'gyur ba'irngan pa nyebar gzhag pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas de dag brtan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dus de'i dus na 'dalta bu'i mdo sde la mos pa dang/ 'jug
pa dan bcom ldan 'dasakhyams pa byang chub sames dpa' byon gyi rlabs lags par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pal lags so zhes bya bdun te/

lags so legs so// byams pa khyod kyi tshig de na deg khar smras te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng khyod kyi dgabar smras pa de la rjes su yared bzhi'i snang ba yin no// den/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis dad du/
gcig tu chibag 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yod su mya ngan las 'dasanas/ sangs rgyas kyizhing so so nas mchis te/ de bzhin
gshigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'ad skyes par bgyi'o// rags kyi bu de dag kyang mos par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen bo dazhas kyar bdaskad ces gsol to/ bcom
ldan ' das grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ul dang/ pho brang 'khor gang dang gad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu spyod pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/
da dag tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i nga stobs dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas tanyan pa'i slad dumachi'o// chos smra ba dang 'khor dpag tshad bcu tshun
zhi chad kun bsrung bar bgyi lta/ cinas kyang chos smra ba de la glags ltar/ glugs chol bas glags mi rnyed par bgyi'o// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'daskad ces bka'
stsal to// dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ gzhan la'ang rgyas par ston cig/ gsol pa// bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'donobazungan/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
rnamagrangs 'di'i mong tsa/ ji ltar bgazung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bod btsan chos kyi rnam grangs 'dodri ma med par grags pas khastan pa dang/ phrugs su sbyar ba snul
00 zhi'i mngon par ba sgrub pa dur/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i li'u zhes kyang bya ba'achos kyi rnam grangs 'di dga' bo khyod kyis zung zhag/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 2dus
dbyas so// latsodri mad par grags pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' khodang 1 byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/

[e } ]/bde 'gror mchis/ skye bo gang zhig mtho ris skyo// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ rtag tu bsod nams 'bal bar 'gyur// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de skad ces

tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhub zhus pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs nyid kyis zhus pa'i lan gsungs ba/kun dga' ra banags tshalaskyud// skye bo gang zhig zam ba byed// chu stang khang dang chu

mag dang// gang zhig ngal bso gnas skor dang// dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan// mkhas shangesar sna dang bral zhing// 'dod pa kun lam chags na// rtag tu sems can phan brtson pa'i// skya bod nang da 'gror
'gro// skya bo do mtho [W]skyo// daniTone dngamtshan rnams su// rtag tu bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// sar sna dang ldan ltar ma 'gro// phyis daspyan pa steramakhyad// brtan rnams sbyin pa a ri ngar//

das 'di'i zhan du bad bar 'gyur// zhangag skyonani rtswayin ltar// skyes bu 'di la 'dod chags skyon// dubasachags dang bula rnams la// byin dang 'bras bu chen bor 'gyur// gang zhagasangs rgyas chos rnams dang//

dga' dun dag dngamachod rten dang// skyes pa'i m yang na bud med dag/ tshul khrims ldan pa'i m labyani// gang dang gang du skye 'gyur ba// jaltar m Argyal po bzhi// lha rnams kyin M mchog 'gyur zhing// lhag pa'i

rgyal bo byed par gyur// 'khor khar yongs su 'khor ngan// sbyin pa ma gtogasaganyanamadapas// blo ldan phun tshogs 'dod bams// radatu 'badad sbyin pa byin// gang zhag mda' rgyang gang tsam zhig/ sa 'di
sbyin pa rab gtong g/ den lha yi gnas song nas// mtho ris dag tu bskal par dga'u// gang zhig kun dga' rab tsam/sanasbyin par gtong byed pa// tshangs pa mdunanar bskyod de// mtho ris/
dgatubaskal bar dga'// brgyadun gtsug lag khang gi phyir/ san sbyin par gtong byed pa// tshangs pa'i bsod nams rab bskyodad// mthoras dag tubaskal par dga'// sa na 'bru A 'phreng bcags//
rmos pamtshan mar bcas kyi nan/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu// dan skyi ba nyams ma 'gyur// tshul khrims ldan la khyad par du// 'bras bu zhing gang gis 'byin// gangagasbyin pad asan// 'bras bum
zad das thob 'gyur// sanasA lu bu ram shang// nas ni ljang bas brgyan pa dag/ grab zhag sbyin par byed pa de// lha mchog bad ba rab 'phal 'gyur// ral grasangag gdan dang gdugs// rta mchog
glang po mchog rnams dang// sasbyin pa yame tog ste// brgya byin 'bras bu thar pa yan// gang zhig gnalinapa dang// gang zhig san star byed pa// gnyis ka phan byed an pa'i phyir// nges par mtho ris
dgatu 'gro// brgyatsan ji ltar chu lan/ til mar thigs pas khyab byed pa// dadazhani san sbyin pa la// yang dag brtan las bsod nams 'phal// jaltar 'o ma yod pa 'a ba// 'oma'abyin pas ba shugaso//
bskal bzang d bzhi n sagatong ba// sa yis yongs su gsos par 'gyur// da pazhan sarab sbyin palas// zhodadamar gsar chu bo dang// 'oma'i chun 'bab pa yis// tsham pa 'byed pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyal
po 'dod chagasakyis gdungs nas// sdug pa gang zhig byas gyur la// dor phyed tsam zhu gnodagyul// byanangs ba da'agror 'gro bar gyur// rgyal bo 'dod chags kyis gdungs te//sdug
bag ngazhig tu gyur pa// dor byed tsam zhig dga' dunal// byanapasabade 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// rtsalas sa na yongs su brtag/ mayi phyogs las ba 'u brtags te// rtan ma phyogs las brtag/ tshul khrims
'chobasami rnams so// bsam gtanas rang sbyin pa las// gang zhagezlog par byed pa dang// de dag bsdus 'joms ri bo ri// ramyal bar mna'agro bar 'gyur// sa dngamanyamapa' nab khyod// sbyin dang mnyam/
ba'i gter med la// bden dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams med// brdzunang sa gzhan pa'i sdige ba med// de nas rgya byin stobs ldan pa'i ]bad sogs bdag pos lus btud de// ranI mnarar pazhin sa bya bas// dkon
mchog gsum la kun tu mchod// sa'amado rdzogs so/// rgyagaratsha mkhanapo pad+ma kar warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tshab dag slong rin chen bazang pos bsgyur cing zhus togatan la phab pa//
'kharagasal 'chang ba kun tu sbyod pa'i chog/ 'kharagasal yang dag par len par 'dod pas/ btsun ba gcig gi drung du pus mo btsugs te 'daskad du bya'o// btsunab
dgongs su gsol/bdagamang 'dazhes bgyi ba dang btsun pa las 'khar gsil 'chang ba'i slob dpon du gsol lo zhes lan gsum du bzlas par bya'o// des kyang 'di skad du dgongs shig/ tshodang ldan pa khyod

ma bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'khar gsal yang dag par blangs te chos bzhin spyod par byed dam/lag pa yongs su mi gtsang bas dgazung bar m/ dge 'dun gyi gnas su 'jug pa'i mgo dang ma rtse

dbyung bar byas pa gzhag par mkhya/gal te khyim pa'i khyim du 'jug na ma rtsa rgyab logs subastanabar bya gal ti snga dro khyim pa'i khyim dubasod snyoms la 'gro dgos ba'i khyon tshogs byungan 'khar gsil lan gsum

du dkrol bar bya'o// lan gsum du dkrol te ma 'ongs na lan lta'i bar du dkrol bar bya'o// lan lnga' khar dudakrol tam 'ongs na lan bdun cu bar du dkrol bar bya'o// lan bdun bar du dkrol tu ma 'os na khyim gzhan du

lan bdun gyi bar dud khrol bar bya'o// khyim bdun gyi bar du tsan tachog par gyur na yang derawas bya ba bya'o zhes lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ 32kharagasale btsad pa'i chos shurtsa lnga yod de/sa la sbrul yod pa

brgyud pa'i phyirebacang bar bya ba dang/ rgas pa'i phyir bcang bar bya ba dang/ bsod snyoms spyod pa 'phyor bcar bar bya ba dang/ 'byung zhing 'jugabana' du sku gzugs mthong ba'atshos dbyung bar bya ba dang/ 'khor gsal thogs nas

dge 'dun gyi zheng du 'jugaparamakhya ba dang/ dro el phan chad 'khar gsal thogasanas 'gro bar ma bya ba dang/ phrag pa gnyis la bkal tamago bo gnyis la dpyad pa ma bya ba dang/ phrag pas bkur bar mkhyeb dang/ lag/

par dkyog par ma bya ba dang/ 'khar gsal thogs nas bshang ga sar 'gro bar mkhye ba dang/ mkhan po dngaslob dpon 'khar gsal thogs te 'gro ba'i rjes zhan du 'gro bar mkhu ba dang/ gang zaga bzhi yan chod 'khar gsal
thogs te 'gro ba'i rjes nas 'khar gsil thogs te ba grolar gi bya ba dang/ yonabadag gi khyim du phyi na 'khar gsilalus dang bral bar mkhya ba dang/ yon bdag gi sgor phyin pa dang lan

gsum du nga krol bar bya'o// gal te ma 'ongasan lan lnga bar du da krol bar bya'o// lan lda'i bar dudakrol tem 'ongasan lan bdun gyi bar du dkrol bar bya'o// lan bdun gyi khor dudakrol te ma'o san khyim gzhan

dung krol bar bya ba dang/ bdag phyi ru khyu na'akhar gsale lag po g.yas pa la snyas te gzhag par bya ba dang/ gnas khangan bzhag pa'i tshe sa la 'og bar mi bya ba dang/ rtag tu gar la ba ri khri'i drung du nye bar gzhug par

bya ba dang/ skabs skabs su phyi bdar bya ba dang/ 'khar gsil gyi mgo ya yo med par bya ba dang/ bsod snyoms la 'gro ba'i dge tshul lam khyim pa las bral bar ga bya ba dang/ nad pa'i sa mtshan mo gnas na
'khar gsil bkur bar bya ba dang/ lamarang bor skyel du 'gron 'khar gsil bkur bar bya ba dang/ lama'adi po nas mgron du gnyer ba yod de/ deba'agro 'di 'dug dgos bar rgyun 'khar ga la bkur bar bya ba

kyi dang gshed du 'gro dgos par gyur na 'khar gso'i bkaMr khar bya ba dang/ bdag gi drung du bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la regacing sa la rami khribir khya'o// 'khar gsil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga
rdzogs so/// bags pa'i khar gsalegyi mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/

wa0 dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis 'khar gsil 'di yongs su bcang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'khar gsi'i 'di bsnams so// ma khyon pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams kyis kyang 'khar gsil 'di bsnams so// da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'akhar gsal 'debasnams ba len te nga da ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khar gsil bsnams pa de bge

du/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang nyan thos rnams la 'khar gsil bcang bar bya'o zhes ston par mdzad pas// deng mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/

sas rgyas rnams kyi chos ji lta ba bzhin du khyengal bstan pa yin gyis/ khyed kyis kyang 'khar gsil kha cang ba du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes kyang bya'o//

yon tan gyi 'khar pa zhes kyang bya ste/ 'phags pa'i ye shes rab tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes bya'o// yon tan gyi gzhi sgrub pa'i phyir yon tan gyi 'khar ba zhes bya'o// 'khar gsil 'di ni

'phags pa'i gang zag gi rigs can skyes bu dam par mtshon pa'i lam gyi chos la phyogs pa'i rgyal mtshan rjes su dran pa rnam par gzhag pa'i don gyi spyod pa yin pas/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos bzhin du
bcong bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ gosatshagasabacos nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig rtagazar te thal mo sbyar nas pus mos btsugs te
khacom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'khar gsil zhes bgyi/ ji ltar ni ba cang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang bka' bzhin du spyod par 'tshal/
dun lo nas gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'od srungs pa paka' stsal pa// legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas bshad par bya'o// de la 'khar gsil zhes bya ban yang ba yin to/ gang gis

'kha dra ba 'di la brten pa de dag nyon mongs pa bsal nas khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir yang ba zhes bya'o/'khar gsil zhes bya ba na snang bar byed ba yin te/ 'khar gsal 'dzin pa'i gang zag

gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi'i snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o// 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni phyir mi ldog par byed pa yin te/ 'khar gsil 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag srid pa

gsum las nges par 'byung zhing/ yang mngon par zhen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog bar byed pa zhes bya'o// 'khar gsilazhes bya ba ni khong du chud par byed pa yin te/ gong 'khar gsil 'dzin par byed pa
yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal dang/ stong pa dang/ khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris par khong du chud pa dang/ bden pa bzhi dang/ rtenacing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis po 'di dag gsal bar

rtogs bar 'agyur ba'i phyir khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal med par byed pa yin te/ gang 'khar gsil 'dzin pa de dag da rgya'i las rab tu spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nga

rgyalamed par byed pa zhes bya'o// khakhar gsi'o zhes bya ba ni rgyang bsris ba yin te/ gang 'khar gsal 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag 'dod ba lnga thag ring du byed pa de dag 'dod pas srid pa'i kun nas

dkris pa sbyong ba dang/ bung po lnga po rnams rnam par 'thor ba dang/ srid pa lnga bo dag yongs su spong ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs shing du byed kyi las kyang ring du spong ba'i phyir rgyang bsringes ba zhes bya'o//

'khar gsil zhes bya ba len par byed pa yin te/ gang 'khar gsil 'dzin par byed pa de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes pa rin bo tsha glangs bas rnam par grol ba thob par

'gyur ba'i phyir len par byed pa zhes bya'o// 'kharagasal zhes bya ba'i yongs su sgrub par 'gyur ba yin te/ gang 'khar gsil 'dzin pa dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sde snod mngon par sgrub pa dang/ ji ltar snyan

pa bsgrubs pas mnyams par phun sumatshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon bar 'grub par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'od srungs 'kha gsal zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i don rgya che zhing nad
bas yongs su rdzogs par brjod mi nus kyang/ khyed kyis re zhig de bzhin du longs su gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ 'od srungs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khar gsil zhes bya ba'i
donan de lta bu lags na/ ci'i slad du ye shes kyi 'khar ba zhes bgyi banas/ dran bar gzhag pa'i don gyi spyod pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi don gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad du gsog
a// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ 'khar gsil zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi spyod bsgrub pa dang/ mang du thos pa rgya cher sgrub pa dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang/

dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag ba med pa rnam par thogs pa medabar khong du chud cing/ shes rab mngon par 'grub par byed ba'i phyir ye shesakyi'akhas

spyi ba zhes kyang bya'o// tshul khrims dam por srung ba dang/ bzod pa dang/ bsam gtan la sogs rtse gcig tu g.yeng bamed par sgom pa dang/ rtog tu bsod nams kyi las bsgrubs pas mgo yod lame 'bar ba bzhin

skad cig tsam du yang mi gtong ba'i phyir yon tan gyi 'khar ba zhes bya'o// 'kharagasal 'di yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa de dag gang gi spyod pa rnam ba bcu drug po 'di lta ste/bden ba bzhi bo sdug bsngal kha dang/ kun
'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang/ lam dang/ tshad ba bzhi bo byams pa dang/ snying dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ bsam gtan bzhi po bsam gtan dang po dang/ bsam gtanaganyis pa dang/ bsam gtan
gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bshi bonam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i sbya mched dang/ 'du shes med

'du shes med man gyi skye mched kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzhan yang spyod pa sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phun sum tshogs shing chos de dag gsal bar rnam par

cha00/ byed pa dang/ bdag nyidakyi lus kyis mngon sum du byas bas sgra'i rjes su ma 'brang ba dang// chos de dag bdag nyid rnam par rtsen pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar ba'i

sgor 'jug ba la yang dbang du gyur cing dga' ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa zhes bste/ nang yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyi rol 'khar gsil 'dzin pa yin te/ 'disan gang gdon mi za bar 'phags/
pa'i yon tan tshul khrims dang/ brjod pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ rig pa gsum dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po rnams phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ gad

zag de 'phags pa yin par mtshon pa nyid kyis gus pa skyed par 'gyurab 'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i gang zag gi rtogs zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa mtshonapa zhes bya ba ni/ naban ye shes kyi ngo bo 'di dang ldan pa sa sa/

ba zhes bya ste/ gang brag de 'phags pa yin par mtshon pa nyid kyis gus pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i nang na yo shes kyi ngo ba nyid dang ldan pas yon tan gyi gzhi sgrub pa dang/ chos gang nas
du rtsol zhing legs bar sgrub par byed do zhes ston par byed pa'i phyir skyes bu dam par mtshon pa zhes bya'o// gang zag gsal kha de ring por ma thogs pa shes rab kyis mngon bar sgrub nas/ dus ma

byas kyi gnas rab tu zhi zhing dben bamya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba don dam pa'i gnas kyi lamadu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ zhes shes rab byed pa'i phyir lam gyi chos la phyogs pa'i rgyal maMtshan zhes bya'o//
@#// rjes su dran pa rnam bar gzhag pa ba don gyi spyod pa zhes bya bani/ 'khar ba 'di rim pa gsum dang ldan par dum bu gsum gyi che ba mthong ba nyid kyis ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal rjes/
su dran nas/ tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab sgrol bar byed pa dang/ gnod pagasum po rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chade rjes su dran nas/ dug gsum po 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang//
gtajug yongs susel bar byed pa dang/ khams gsum po dag mi rtag pa yane pa nyid du rjes su dran nag/ kon mchog gsum la mngon par yid ches shing gus pa dang/ srid pa gsum gsal ba dang/
dag pa gtsang ba dang/ las rnam gsum rnam par sbyang ba dang/ rig pa gsum dang ldan par mi 'dod ba dang/ rnam par thar ba gsum la 'jug pa dang/ rjes su dran pa drug gi gnas gsum thob pa dang//
shas thag ring du byed pa gsum rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dum bu gsum rim bar rnam par gzhag pa yin no// gzhan yang bzhi gral du byas pa ni/ skye ba rnam ba bzhi yongs su bcad pa dang/ bden pa bzhi

rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi la 'jug par bya ba dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su dgu bar bya ba dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rab tu bstan pa dang/

yang ga ba'i spong ba bzhi brtan par bya ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rkang ba bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bzhi gral du rnam par gzhag pa yin no// dbus kyi shing gtogs khar rnam ba lta gzhag pa ni lta ba lnga po dag spang ba dang/ 'gro

0 ba lnga po dag gi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi'akhrug pa longs su sbyong ba dang/ dbang po lnga sgom pa dang/ stobs lnga dang ldan par bya ba dang/ sgrib pa lnga po dag bsal ba dang/ phung po lnga po dag rnam par bshig bdang/ cha lnga da

ldan ba'i chos kyi skuthob par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa ltar gzhog ba yin no// sril sbrel bcu gnyis su bstan pa ni/ rtenacing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis su dran par bya zhing thogs pa med par bya ba dang/ sgo//
bcuganyis pau0f38sam la/tan bsgom par bya ba dang/ sems la skyonamed par rjes su dran par bya'o// rim pa gsum dang bsgril du bsdus te grangs bdun du bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi chos rjes su dran par bya ba dang 'phags pa'i nor bdun mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// mar rtsi gtogs par brgyad du bstan pa ni/ lam yan lag brgyad pa rjes
su khastan bar bya ba dang/ rnam par thar ba brgyad thob par bya ba dang/ mi khom pa brgyad yongs su bsal ba'i phyi rnam pa brgyad pa yin no// 'aTaragasal gyi don mdor bstan pa de lta bu yin/
pas khyed kyis legs par yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i gsung rab l ji skad bstan pa bzhin du 'tshal
lo/ zhes gsol lo// de nas 'od srungs chen pos/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kun
mtshus ba zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkatshastsalakha/ kha cig 'khar ba mtshungs kyang spyod ba mi mtshungs bas kha cig gi tshonan bzhi
bsgril du byas pa'o// kha cig gatshin n gnyis bsgril du byas pa ste/ sril sgril gyi grangs lan byi brag tu gyur ba medakha/ ni deng 'dire bzhi bsgril sal sa'i khacu gnyis su byas pa'i bstan
ba de spyod do// gnyis bsgril du byas ban de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs kyis rnam par gzhag pa yin te/ sems can rnams bden pa gnyis po kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang/ don dam pa'i
bden pa'i rjes su dran par bya ba'i ched du don 'di rnams la zhag pa yazhin// de'i tshebcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor
stong nyis brgya dang/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams shin tu dga' zhing gus par mngon par bstod do// khabags pa 'khar gsil zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgyu@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ka lcami tu sa ban ma su rta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bston pa'i do/

sangs rgyas dpyad chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcomaM ldan 'das grong khyer ku shan/ gyad kyi nya' khongashingesalazung gi tsholan/ nan thos kyi dag

bdun dang bcas bar bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba khon 'dus kyi dge slong rnams la bka' stsalakha/ dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ dge ba'i grogs po

dang/ dge ba'i ston dang gnas par bya'i/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ sdig pa'i grogs bo dang/ sdig pa'i ston dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'di'i bdag gcig pu dben par mchis naas nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pan sems pa 'di lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste//
dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ dge ba'i grogs po dang/ dge ba'i sten 'don tshongs par spyod pa'i phyid lags kyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang/ sdig pa'i ston ni de lta ma lags so
snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ kun dga' po khyod 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ dge ba'i grogs po dang/ dge ba'asten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i khyod yin gyi/
sdig ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang/ sdig pa'i nyin de ltam yin no zhes ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ dgo ba'i grogs po dang/

dge ba'i ston 'di'i tshos bar spyod ba'i ril bo dang/ ma 'dres ba dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su byang pa yazhigyi/ sdig ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang/ sdig pa'i ston
'dand ltamasazhano// dpa'i phyir zhan/kun dga' bo bshes gnyen dang/ ngo la brtan nas sems can skyor ba chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur po dang/ sems can rga ba dang na ba dang/ 'chib dang

ba mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don ba dang/ sdug bsngal b dang/ yadam bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams larga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'donapa dang sdugabasngal ba dang//
mdamabad ba dang/ 'khrug pa'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bsan rnam grangs kho nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dwag pa'i bashes
dang/ dag pa'i grogs po dang/ dgaba'i ston 'a rin tshongs par spyod la rol po dang/ ma 'dris pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su byang ba yin gyi/ sdige ba'i
bshas gnyon dang/ sdug pa'i grogs po dang/ sdig pa'i stan 'din da lta ma yin non kun dga' bo khyod kyis daltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces khaka'alanas/
dge slong dedag yar ngasato/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dag pa'i bshes gnyen bston pa'i madordzogs so//
rgyagar skad du/ Ar+yatathA ga tA namakhud+d+ha'i rtagu No t+tad+ham cu ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs kha rnams kyis ngas rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam gra
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dada' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagags thos pa dus gtsagan/ bcom ldan 'das yul mnyam dag gan/ chos kyi dgon pa byang chub snyadabo

na/ nor bu rdo rjes smras pa'i pad+ma' stodipo' seng ga'akhri la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chanapo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod pa med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra
rab snyad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs cig go/ de'atsho byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dusab de nyidadu/ byang chub sems dab2sams dpa' chen
po 'od basam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes khyung 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po red bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus
snyan las la ngasato/ byang chung saMms dpa' tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kyi rgyal ba'asras dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad kyi bskal pa dun/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa 'od dpag med kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kyargyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams bad bca'agyakhasal ba dan/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs lam 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyazhinge 'jig rten khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ kyi rgyal ba'asras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khamasa mngon par dga'
rdo rje sAng bos rab tu ltadun pa' se ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur sgrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin
[DI]na zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dgra gung 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smug gi rgyal mtshan gyi skal pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAn tu rnam par gdon mi za bar/
pad+mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'usangs rgyas zhonge 'jagartan gyi khams phyir ma ldig pa' 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kyi rgyal ba'asrasu dga' jig rten gyi khams phyir ma ldog pa'i 'khor
lo dbyangs kyi skal pa de na/ bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go rgyalaba'i sras dag 'jig
@# rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'akhaskal pa do na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ga' sangs rgyas kyi zhinga'ajig rten gyi khamasamar ma ldan gyinyin zhag gcig go/
kyi rgyalaba'i spus dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar mi ldan gyi bskal pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das de pazhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyisangs rgyas kyizhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
bzang bo'anyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'asras dgagang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'akhaskal pa da ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas
pa'i sku'asangs rgyas zhing 'jig rtan gyi khams 'du' banaraka' ba'anyin zhag gtsag go/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' khar dka' ba'abaskal pa de na//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhanagshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros 'od war rgyal po'i sangs rgyas zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyun gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kyi
rgyul ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyanaba'i bskal pad na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtan gyi khams med
gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyinyin zhag gcig go/ su rgyal kha'askyes dag gang 'jig rtan gyi khams brtag cing bgang b.la'ajug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcur tshad
ba'i rdulakhrarab snyad 'das pa'i pha rolan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gdan/
byung chub sems dpa' kun tu bazang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su sbyong ba'akhyad par can 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kyargyal ba' sras dag rigs kyi du bam/
rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyisangs rgyas kyizhing gi yon tan brjod pa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang dum/ 'dzin tes/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed
[$17 ]u@#// dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtshorab 'byams dag gi/
[A ]angs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa'i madun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'khyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi ra ru skyo ba dran par 'gyur
ro// bu bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chanapo'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dga'
zhing de skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor tsharikyil 'khor thams cad byang chung sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i
rgyal pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa da bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ngas rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so//
[7]@#// rgyugar skad du/ Ar+yaatha bste ronAm d+harmapar ya/ bodazhadan/ 'phags pa don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ gangs rgyas dang
byang chub soms dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagags thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'adas mnyan yod no/ rgyalaMkhu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ dag slong rnams la smras pa// tshodang ldan pa dag khyed la chos thog mar dgakha/ bar du dag ba/
tha mar dag pa/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang bo/ ma'adres pa/ yongs surdzogs pa// yongs su dag/ yongasasu byar ngo/ tshangs par spyod pa bstan par bya ste/
'di lta ste/ don rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'chos kyi rnam pas rab tu bshad kyis/ rdo legs par rab tu nyon la yid lazud zhage dang bshadra do// don rgyas ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang
zhan/ tshorar ldan pa dag dal ba tshogs pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni'aphags pa'i chos thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di lta su/ bdag gi 'byor pa dang/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa dang/
ma nyid rang/ ul dbus su skyes pa dang/ dbang po rnams m tshang ba med pa nyid dang/ las kyi morda' ma btang ba nyid dang/ gnas la dad par gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas rnams
byung pa dang/ dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ chos bstan pa rnams gnas pa dang/ gnas pa rnams rjes su 'jug ba dang/ gzhan la so sor snying brtsa ba ste/ de ltar n tsho dang
ldan pa dag ral patshogs pa btsuganyis po 'di dgazhi'aphags pa'i chos 2 thob par 'gyur ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag smra ba'i dge slong gtam smra bas gzhan dag la rnam pa shus
[@#// gtam ste/ 'di lta ste/ dus su dang/ gus pa dang/ 'tsham pa dang/ mtshan s 'byor ba dang/ rjes su 'brel ba dang/ ramadar/ 'dod pa dang/
ba'amagu ba dung/ spro ba dang/ mi smed pa dang/ rigs pa dang/ 'bral ba dang/ ma 'chol ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin gyisims dang/ phan pa dang/ phan pa'i saMms dang/ snyad
brtsi ba'i soms dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshogs su bcad pa'i m brten par bya'o// gtamado dga mkhan/ bdag labastod par mabya/ gzhan la smad par m bya bar/
[‚Äì ]gtamakhya'o// tshodang ldan pa dag chos nyan par 'dod pas rnam pa bcu drug gis mnyan par bya ste/ 'di lta sta/ dusasu chos mnyan par bya ba dang/ bkur bya ba dang/ gus par nyan pa
dang/ ma rangs pa med pa dang/ bsgo ba bzhan nyan pa dang/ klan ka ma tshol ba dang/ chos la gus par bya ba dang/ chos smra ba'i gang brag la gus par bya ba dang/ chos la ma banus
pa dang/ chos smra ba'i gang zag lam b.rus pa dang/ bdag la ma bar s pa dang/ rtsa gcig pa'i sems dang/ kun shasapar bya ba'asims dang/ rna blags te mnyan pa dang/ sams/
bsdus pa dang/ soms thams cad kyis bsams tachos mnyan par bya'o// ded ltar chos yang dag bar nyan ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor byab la dad cing sams dang ba skye
[m ]khar 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la sems mchog tu dga' ba dang yaredas pa skyabar 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa gcor bya ba zang zademed pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur
ro// mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor byab la/ lte ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhing/ sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang/ somanyi rnams sa la pa dang/ lta ba drang bor byed par 'gyur ro//
mya ngan las 'das pa gtsor bya ba la/ sems rnal 'byor du 'gyur ba dang/ rtul ba dang/ rjes su brtson pa dang/ sbyong ba dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang don gyi mchog thob par 'gyur ro// mya
ngan las 'das pa gcor bya ba la/ 'du byed thams cad zhib dang/ stong pa nyid dudamags pa dang/ srid pa zad pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ myang n las 'das pa la
samasarab tu'ajug cing dang ba dang/ yang dag par gnas pa dang/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// myang n las 'das pa gtser byab dang/ phung po mi rtag pa nyid dang phung bo gsog nyid dang/ phung
po gso ba nyid dang/ phung bo snyade pomed ba nyid dang/ phung po 'jig pa nyid la sems rab tu 'jug cade dang ba dang/ mdadag par gnas pa dang/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das
pa gtsor bya ba dang// 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzhishas par bya ba lamig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa gtso'abyapa la/ rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar chos yang dag par nyanan/ sgrogs pa la'ang mthoma'i tsham/ chos[¬©]gtagyi ro'ang myong bar 'gyur/ ston pa la'ang
chos nyid rim gro byed/ bdag gi donayang rjes su 'a thob/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i ng 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos 'di dwaganadi'a shes rab yongs su sman par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di lta ste/
dgo ba'akhoshos gnyonalabastanab dang/ dag pa'i ngang tshul 'di dang/ sams shes rab can nyid dang/ bka' blo bde ba nyid dang/ gus par nyan ba dang/ yongs su 'dri ba dang/ dam ba'i//
ga tu byed pa dang/ skyo bar bya ba'achos rnams la skyob dang/ de bzhin du kun tu skyo ba la'ang tshul bzhin du yade la byed pa dang/ mi dag chos thams cad
lha spong bas/ dgo ba'achos rnams la tshul bzhin durab tu 'jog pa dang/ de rnamakhar byang ba dang/ ting nga 'dzin la dbang 'thob cing/ tshul bzhin du'ang yod la byed pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
!/ 'bags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhinayid la byas pa'i bdag nyade kyis/ 'dunas bcu bo 'di lta sta/ mi sdug khu'a'adunas dang (ma rtag pa'i 'adushes dwang/ ma rtag pa
la sdug bsngal ba'i 'dushes dang/ sdug bsdal la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang zasalama'aphrod pa'i 'adushes dang/ 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'adu shes dang/
[z]snad pa'i 'du shes dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba' de du shes dang 'gog pa' 'du shes dang/ 'chi ba'a'i dushas dag bsgom par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dgam sdug par du shes kyi bar du gcod
pa'i chos zhi'i nu bzhi ste/ 'daste ste/ bud med dang lhan cig gnas pa der/ dran pa g.yengs pas bud medal lta ba dang/ bag med pa dang/ 'dod chags shas che ba nyid dang/ sdug pa'i mtshan
ma'i rjes su brtson pa dang/ ma gtsang ba laso sor ma rtog pa dang/ las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa'i gang zag dang lhan ge sbyor ba dang/ de dag dang mthun par byed pa dang/ gus par mnyan
pa dang/ lo ngas suma'adri ba dang/ dbang po rnams kyi sgom bsrungs pa dang/ chos kyi tshod ma rag pa dang/ dngan pa la mngon par ma dga' ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin la so sor rtog
pa'o// ma rtag pa'i dushes7bar du gcod pa na 'du byed la rjes su chags pa'o// martag pa la sdug bsngal ba'anyidu shes kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos na drug sta/ 'di lta ste/ le lo dang/
'gyod pa dang/ al ba dang/ bgamed pa dang/ ma rtson ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhanaso sor ma rtog pa'o// sdugabasngal bal bdag med pa'i 'adu shesakyi bar du gcod ba nabadag tu lta ba'o// zas la
ma'i brod pa'i'adushes[‚Äù]bar du gcod panarol srid pa'o// 'jigartan thams cad la mngon par m de ga'o baTa'adu shosakyi bar dugacod panaDi'ajig rten gyi sne tshogs dag la 'dun pa dang/ 'dod
chags kyi rjes su chags pa'o// snang ba'i 'du shes kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos ni bcu gcig lta/ 'ad lta ste// thatshom dang/ mde la mi byed pa dang/ lus kyi gnas ngan len/
[T ]dang/ gnyidedang/ rmugs pa dang/ ha cang brtson 'grus grags pa dang/ ha cang brtson 'grus zhan pa dang/ dga' ba dang// spobs pa mad pa dang/ 'du shesan+nachogs dang/ ha cang smra ba mang/
bdang/ gzugs rnams la nges par rtogs pa nyid do// 'dod chags dang bral pa'i dushosarir du gcodapa kun tu 'dod chags pa'o// 'gogaba'akhe du shes kyi bar dugacod pa na/ chos l
zhwa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'o// 'chi ba 'a'i du shosapar dugacod pa na/ gson pa la'achums ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag chos gsum po gcas spras byed pa dang/ 'dun ba spong ba dang/ del/
mang du gnas pan bar du gcod pa ma bcom pa de dag yang dag par 'dzems pa'o// tshodang ldand chos rag chos b.rubazhin mi sdug pa'i 'du shes la gces spras byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ budamad
dang lhan cigama gnas pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gnas pas bud med lamalta ba dang/ bag yod pa dang/ 'dod chags shas chungab dang/ sdug pa'i mtshan ma'i rjes su maM brtsonub dang/ ma sdug pa la so

sor rtog pa dang/ las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa 'gang zag dang lhan cig ma sbyor ba dang/ de dag dngamathun par ma byed pa dang/ gus par mnyan pa dang/ yongs su 'dri ba dang/ dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdams pa
nyid dang/ zas kyi tshod rig ba nyid dang/ dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin du las so sor rtogs pa'o// cho dang ldan pa dag mi sdug pa'i 'dushes kun tu bstan sgo nas lanamad du/
byas na/'dod pa'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur ro// mi rtagapa'i 'du shes kun tu bstanabasgoms lan mang du byas na/'du byed myong bar 'gyur ro// mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes kun tu bstan
bsgo mas lanamang du byas na la lo dar 'gyodapa spong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba la bdagamer pa'i 'adu shos kun tu pa stanabasgoms lan mang du byas na/ bdag tu ltab sbyong bar 'gyur ro// zas la ma
'phrod pa'i 'du shes kun tu pa ston pa sgoms lan mang du byas na/rol srid pa spodabar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par ma dga' ba 'dushes kun tu bstanubasgoms lan mang du byas na/
'jig rtan gyisna tshogs dag la 'dun pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi rjes su chags pa spong bar 'gyur ro// snanga'a'i dus kun tu bstan pasgoms lan mdadu byas na/ e shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chag
dang bral ba'i dugs kun tu ba ston bsgoms lan mang dubyas na/ kun tu 'dod chags ba spong bar 'gyur ro// 'gog pa'i 'dunas kun tu bstan khasgomus lan mad du byas na/ phung po zad par 'gyur ro//
'chi ba'i 'du shes kun tu bstan bsgoms lanamang du byas na/ gson pa la 'chums pa spong bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin byed pa 'di dag nyid
la bar du gcod pa'i chos nyi shu ste/ 'di lta ste/mi brtson pa dang/ ma brtson pa dang 'grogs pa dang/ yongs suma'adri ba dang/ ma mthun pa'ilung dang/ lug ltar lkugs pa/
na nyid dang/ sred ba can nyidi dang/ bya ba mang ba nyid dang// las mtha' nyes par byas pa nyid dang/ bzhi pa btang ba nyid dang/ bar du gcod pa rnams thos na nyam dag dang/ khongs pa dang mi mthun/
par 'dzin pa nyidi dad/ brjed ngas pa nyidi dad/ bag mdung dar yul du ma gnas pa dang/ dbang po rnams sgom bsrungs pa de dang/ zas kyi tshod ma rig pa nyid dang/ namagya chastod dang nas//

[>gyi tshasmad la mi nyal bar sbyor bar rjes su ma brtson pa nyid dang/ dban bu la mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ ji lta babazhin la so sorami rtog pa'o// tshodang ldan pa dag bar du gcod pa ma bcom pa de
dag ya nga dag par 'joms bar 'gyur ba'i gces spras byed pa'i chos n de ru gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa thob pa dang/ phan tshun mthong ba nyid dang/ mngon par spro ba dang/ rnam par 'byed pa
rgyudangargyal ba dang/ chos rnams kyi mtshon ma'arjesasu 'brang ba dang/ bdag la mi kharas pa dang/ gus par nyan pa dang/ yongs su 'dri ba dang/ dAbanab la mngon par dga' ba dang ji lta ba bzhinal/

so sor rtog pa'o// tshodang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag ra ra tshul bzhin yade la byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi gces spras byed pa'i chos nyi shu ste/'di lta ste/brtson pa dang/ brtson pa dang 'grogs

pa dang/ yongs su 'dra pe dang/ mthunar 'i lu ra dang/ lug ltar lkugs pa ma yin pa nyid dang/ srid pa can ma yin pa nyid dang/ bya ba ma mang ba nyid dang/ las kyi mtha' la gas par byas pa nyid dang/ brtsonar ma btang

ba nyid dang/ bar du gcod pa rnam thos nanyam ma nga ba dang ma khengs pa dang/ mthun par 'dzin pa nyid dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid dang/ bgayod pa dang yul du gnas pa dang/ dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsrungs pa nyid dang

zas[‚Äù]chod rig pa nyid dang/ nam gyi cha stod dang/ namagyi cha smad la ma nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa nyid dang/ dpon ba la mngon par dga' ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin la so sor rtog pa'o// tsha dang ldan pa dag gnas nyishurtsa gat+ti

bo 'di dag nareb tu byung bas yang dang yad duso sor brtag par bya sta/bdag ni khyim ra bu rjes spungs pa/ma sdug ba'o zhes gnas 'di rab tu byur bas ang dang yang du so sor brtag par bya'o//bdagan mi'i drang ras blaras pa lta bdag

gi cha byad dang bya ba gzhan yin no// bdag gi 'tshob ni gzhan la rag las pa ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar dub dag gi 'di lta ste chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang//mal stan dang/ na pa'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad pha rolas btsal
dgos pa'o// bdag ni ji sride'i bar du bdag ma rnams kyi 'dod pa dag las ldog pa byas pa'o//bdag na josId 'tsho'i bar ma rnams kyi rtsed mo'i dga' badag las ldog bar khyas pa'o//cig bdag gi ba dag
tshul khrims dgags masmad dam/cig ba dag la chos pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas ba rnams kyis chos nyid kyis ma slad dam/ci bdag nyidi ma skad dam/ma nyams par spong ngam/ mi ga yul 'khor
[7 ]@#// gyibasod snyoms don yod pa ra tha pa'i m/cig gcig du kun dga' ra ba stongapara mngon par dga' 'am/bdag ji lta bu'igyur pas nyin mtshan 'da'/cig 'du byed thams cad zhi ba/stong ba nyidaru/

[F ]dmigs pa/sud pa zad pa/'dod chags dang bral ba'amya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gi sems rab tu 'jug pa dang/ dang ba dang/ yang dag par gnas pa dang/ rnam par grol bar gyur tam/cigaphung bom rtag pa nyidi dang/

burapo gsog nyid dang/ bud po gsob nyid dang/ phung po snying bo med pa nyid la bdag gi sems rab tu 'jug pa dang/ dad pa dang/ yang dag par gnas pa dang/ rnam par grol bar tam/cig bdag 'chiba'i tsho tshangs pa

mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la dris na/yul ul po ma yin zhing/ bag tsha ba med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med par yang dag par luraston par lung bstan par bya ba dag gang yin

pa dge slong ga 'dris bu bzha las 'bras bu gang yang rung ba zhig 'thob bam/bdag naskyo ba'i chos can te/ skye ba'achos nyid las ma 'das pa/ rga ba'i sacan ]na pa'i chos can/'chi ba'achos can ta/bdag ga'idod chags dang

dang/ sdug pa dang/ 'bangs pa dang/ yid du'ong ba thams cad dang 'phye ba dang/ med pa dang/ 'bul ba dang/ maldan par 'agyur pa'o// ba dgan las bdag gire bya ba las kyi skye gnas pa/las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las

bstan par bya ba ste/ las dge ba 'am/mi dge ba gang dang gang byed la/las de dang de nyid kyi skal ba can du'agyur ro snyam du gnasa'adireb tu byung bas yang dang yang duso sor brtag par bya'o// gnas nyi shu rtsa/

[s (]gnyis po 'di dgal yang dang yad duso sor rtog pa da' dge sbyong gi 'du sha yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dag sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogasan/'du shes bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur to/rtag bar rgyun du

byed pa dang/ rgyun du 'jug pa dang/ brnag soms dang gnod sems mad pa dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang nga rgyal med pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang po'i tsho dang/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang tho ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa

dgasams dang/ yod dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yun ring por gzugs la chags pa dang/ sgra lachags pa dang/ dri la chags pa dang/ ro la chags pa dang/ reg bya la chags pa dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/

rig bya dag gas kun tu bsags pa nye bar bsags pa dan/so sor brtags pas 'di lta sta/ ma'ichib3 rengs lanyapar rnam par bzhagapa ma yin par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa dgaso so'i skya bos rnam pa nyi shus sa mas

skyo bar bya ste/bdag ni rtogs pas gsog yin no//ma dulatar 'chi bar 'agyur ro// g.yang sar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs ma shes pa'o//

las ma shes pa'o//ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa'o// yang srid panasdug bsngal ba'o// dal bun sum tshogs pa ni rnyed par dka' ba'o//2dod par gsod par byed par rtag tu rjes su bcings pa'o/ bdag ni 'gro ba las ma 'das pa'o//

bdag na ngan song dag las yongs sum grol ba'o//bdag nalta bar gyur ba dang gtumed pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// bdagan mtshams med pa'i las rnams m bya ba'aphyir gags pa ma byas pa'o//bdag naskye ba'i

@#// 'khorab thog ma dang tha mad pa'i matha' ma byas pa'o/mthar m byas na byed pa gzhan med do//mkhyago na ba de ba'i ri bo med do//las byas po rnams na chud zab ma da do//bdag ni ma rag par gyur cing mi/

sa mkhas pa 'chi ba'i dus byed bar 'gyur ro zhes so so'i skye bos sems skyo bar bya'o//de rnam pa nyi shud rnams kyis khams skyo/shan tu skyo/skya// shanetu skyag/ bkag/shin tu bkagan/ rnam pa gzhan nyi shus samasa myur du

myuraborayang dag par gnas to/dasems kyi mtshan ma yod la byed pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so//dasams byanamed pa 'am/sems rtsa gcig pa 'am/ting nge 'dzana mtshon ma 'am/tade ngo 'dzazhi/

la gnas pa 'amtshan ma 'am/tading 'dzan las ldang ba'amtshan ma'am/zha gnas kyi[Ô∏Ω]tshan ma 'am/rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma'am btang snyoms kyimtshan ma 'am/spyod yul ma yin pa spang ba'am/spyod yul la gus

ba'am/mdor bstan pa 'am/dmags kyis bsal kha'am/ kun tu skyo ba mngab ma/bla ma la bstan pa'i m/yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa'i soms myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so//da dbugasabajub pa dang/'gyur ba dran pa

bsgom pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so//dwa dran b nya bar gazhag pa rnams sgom pa'i goms myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so//tshodang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos da ltar ang dag par tshul bzhin yod

latsud pa'i bdag nyid khyo'i 'du gcod pa khecu gcig tu rig par bya ste/'di ltaste/yang dang yang du chogs par 'du ba dang/zas lo 'du pa nyid dar/ las la dga' ba nyid dang/ smra ba la dga' ba nyid dang/ 'du 'dzigetam la dga' ba nyin dang/ 'du 'dzi

0 ba dga' ba de dang/ ba dag tu 'dzin pa dang/ 'phyar ba dang/ bag med pa dang/ yul du ma gnas pa'o// tshodang ldan pa dag bar du gcod pa ma bcom pa de dag a nga dag par 'jon pa mkhas pa bcu la bslab par bya ste/'di lta ste/tang de

'dzan mkhas pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la mkhas pa dang/ tanger 'dzan la sa ldang pa la mkhas pa dang/ rab tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa dang btang snyoms la mkhas pa dang/ skyemachad lamakhas pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/

mngon par sgrub ba la mkhas pa 'od/tshodang ldan pa dag 'bags pa nyan thos de ltar mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa la mchog tu dga' dngos bo bcu gsum skya ba naskye sta/dad ba can da ston pa 'am/chos sam/dga' dun nam/bdag

gatshul khrimaMs sam/gzhan gyi tshul khrims sam/ba dag gas sbyin par bya ba'i chos rnams m/bdag gi sbyin pa 'am/gzhan gyi rtogs pa yi de la byed pa na/ mchog tu dga' ba skya ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga'

ba'i dngos po man no//bcom na'adus de bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po stsal ba'o zhes mchog tu dga' bskyong 'di'i dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no//bcom ldan2das de bdag gis bde ba'i chos mang

po sgrub pa'o zhes mchog tu dga' ba skyo ba 'di na ded pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no//bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis sdig pa ma rig ba'achos rnam pa du masal ba'o zhes mchog tu dga' bskya ba 'di ni dad pa/

can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis dag pa'i chos rnam pa dum sgrub ba'o zhes mchog tu dga' skyo ba 'di ni dad can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'-idangos po yin no/tshe dang ldan pa dag
u// 'phags pa nyan thos chos bzhale rtan na/chos lta sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/'dun pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dben pa dang phyi rim ldog pa'o// chos lta

bo gang dag pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyurazhan/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dag 'dra dang/ shanitusbyangs pa dang/ bde ba dang ting nga 'dzano// tshodang ldan pa dag de chos lnga po de dag kun tu bsags/

shang nyabar bsagasan/ zug rngu brgyad med par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyithug rdzudang/ zhe sdang gi zug rngu dang/ gti mug gi zug rngu dang/ nga rgyalamazug rngu dang/ srid pa'i zug rngu dang/
zla lta ba'azug rdzudang/ the tsom dang som nyi'i zug rngu'o// zug rngubargyad po 'di dag med par gyur na/ ma slob pa'i chos bcu'athob par 'gyur te/ ma slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta pa nA da//
ts+tso yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i tshol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa/
dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ a nga dag pa/ rnam par grol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i yo shes so// da ma slob pa'i chos bcu po de dag skyes shade thob ste ldanun 'phags par 'gyur ti/yang lag
pa ldasmad pa/yan lag drug dang ldan// bsrung ba gcig pa// ston pa bzhi dang ldan pa/so sor bdonapa bsal babasal ba spungs pa kun tu rtog pa'-irtog pa dang ran+tadaro//
